snātā nāsā agra jāgrat maṇiḥ asita paṭā sūtriṇī baddha veṇī
sa uttaṃsā carcita aṅgī sragviṇī padma hastā
tāmbūla āsya ūru bindu stavakita cibukā kajjala akṣī su citrā
rādhā alakta ujjvala aṅghriḥ sphuriti tilakinī ṣoḍaśa akalpinī iyam
atha dvādaśa ābharaṇa āśritā
divyaḥ cūḍāmaṇi indraḥ puraṭa viracitāḥ kuṇḍala dvandva kāñci
niṣkāḥ cakrī śalākā yuga valaya ghaṭāḥ kaṇṭha bhūṣā ūrmikāḥ ca
hārāḥ tāra anukāra bhuja kaṭaka tulā koṭayaḥ ratnak ptāḥ

original: tuṅgā pādāṅgurīya-cchavir iti ravibhir bhūṣaṇair bhāti rādhā // RUnm_4.10 ///
analyzed: tuṅgā pāda aṅgurīya chaviḥ iti ravibhiḥ bhūṣaṇaiḥ bhāti rādhā
atha vṛndāvana īśvaryāḥ kīrtyante pravarāḥ guṇāḥ
madhurā iyam nava vayāḥ cala apāṅga ujjvala smitā
saṅgīta prasara abhijñā ramya vāc narma paṇḍitā
vinītā karuṇā pūrṇā vidagdhā pāṭava anvitā
lajjā śīlā su maryādā dhairya gāmbhīrya śālinī
guru arpita guru snehā sakhī praṇayi tā vaśā

original: bahunā kiṃ guṇās tasyāḥ saṅkhyātītā harer iva // RUnm_4.15 //
analyzed: bahunā kim guṇāḥ tasyāḥ saṅkhyā atītāḥ hareḥ iva
iti aṅga ukti manaḥ sthāḥ te para sambandha gāḥ tathā

original: guṇā vṛndāvaneśvaryā iha proktāś caturvidhāḥ // RUnm_4.16 //
analyzed: guṇāḥ vṛndāvana īśvaryāḥ iha proktāḥ caturvidhāḥ
mādhuryam cāru tā navyam vayaḥ kaiśora madhyamam
sādhu mārgāt acalanam maryādā iti uditam budhaiḥ
lajjā ābhijātya śīla ādyaiḥ dhairyam duḥkha sahiṣṇu tā

original: vyaktatvāl lakṣitatvāc ca nānyeṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kṛtam // RUnm_4.19 //
analyzed: vyakta tvāt lakṣita tvāt ca na anyeṣām lakṣaṇam kṛtam
tatra madhurā
yathā vidagdhamādhave

original: balād akṣṇor lakṣmīḥ kavalayati navyaṃ kuvalayaṃ
analyzed: balāt akṣṇoḥ lakṣmīḥ kavalayati navyam kuvalayam
mukha ullāsaḥ phullam kamala vanam ullaṅghayati ca

original: daśāṃ kaṣṭām aṣṭā-padam api nayaty āṅgika-rucir
analyzed: daśām kaṣṭām aṣṭāpadam api nayati āṅgika ruciḥ

original: vicitraṃ rādhāyāḥ kim api kila rūpaṃ vilasati // RUnm_4.20 //
analyzed: vicitram rādhāyāḥ kim api kila rūpam vilasati
atha navavayāḥ

original: śroṇiḥ syandanatāṃ kṛśodari kuca-dvandvaṃ kramāc cakratāṃ
analyzed: śroṇiḥ syandana tām kṛśa udari kuca dvandvam kramāt cakratām

original: bhrūś cāpa-śriyam īkṣaṇa-dvayam idaṃ yāty āśugatvaṃ tava /
analyzed: bhrūḥ ca apa śriyam īkṣaṇa dvayam idam yāti āśu ga tvam tava

original: saināpatyam ataḥ pradāya bhuvi te kāmaḥ paśūnāṃ patiṃ
analyzed: saināpatyam atas pradāya bhuvi te kāmaḥ paśūnām patim

original: dhunvan jitvara-māninaṃ tvayi nijaṃ sāmrājya-bhāraṃ nyadhāt // RUnm_4.21 //
analyzed: dhunvan jitvara māninam tvayi nijam sāmrājya bhāram nyadhāt
atha capalāpāṅgī
taḍit ati cala tām te kim dṛś antāt apāṭhīt

original: vidhu-mukhi taḍito vā kiṃ tavāyaṃ dṛgantaḥ /
analyzed: vidhu mukhi taḍitaḥ vā kim tava ayam dṛś antaḥ
dhruvam iha guru tā abhūt tvad dṛś antasya rādhe

original: varam atijavināṃ me yena jigye mano'pi // RUnm_4.22 //
analyzed: varam ati javinām me yena jigye manaḥ api
atha ujjvala smitā
tava vadana vidhau vidhauta madhyām
smita sudhayā adhara lekhikām udīkṣya
sakhi laghuḥ agha bhid cakora varyaḥ
pramada mada uddhura buddhiḥ ujjihīte
atha cāru saubhāgya rekhā āḍhyā
agha hara bhaja tuṣṭim paśya yat candralekhā
valaya kusuma vallī kuṇḍala ākāra bhāgbhiḥ
abhidadhati nilīnām atra saubhāgyarekhā
vitatibhiḥ anuviddhāḥ suṣṭhu rādhām pada aṅkāḥ
atha gandha unmādita mādhavā
vallī maṇḍala pallava alibhiḥ itas saṅgopanāya ātmanaḥ

original: mā vṛndāvana-cakravartini kṛthā yatnaṃ mudhā mādhavi /
analyzed: mā vṛndāvana cakravartini kṛthāḥ yatnam mudhā mādhavi
bhrāmyadbhiḥ sva virodhibhiḥ parimalaiḥ unmādanaiḥ sūcitām

original: kṛṣṇas tāṃ bhramādhipaḥ sakhi dhuvan dhūrto dhruvaṃ dhāsyati // RUnm_4.25 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ tām bhrama adhipaḥ sakhi dhuvan dhūrtaḥ dhruvam dhāsyati
atha saṅgīta prasara abhijñā
kṛṣṇa sāra hara pañcama svare
muñca gīta kutukāni rādhike
prekṣata itra hariṇā anudhāvitām

original: tvāṃ na yāvad atiroṣaṇaḥ patiḥ // RUnm_4.26 //
analyzed: tvām na yāvat ati roṣaṇaḥ patiḥ
atha ramya vāc
su vadane vadane tava radhike
sphurati kā iyam iha akṣara mādhurī
vikala tām labhate kila kokilaḥ
sakhi yayā adya sudhā api mudhārtha tām
atha narma paṇḍitā
vaṃśyāḥ tvam upādhyāyaḥ
kim upādhyāyī tava atra vaṃśī vā
kula yuvati dharma haraṇāt
asti yayoḥ na aparam karma
yathā vā
deva prasīda vṛṣa vardhana puṇya kīrte
nirmañchanam tava bhaje ravi pūjanāya

original: snātāsmi hanta mama na spṛśa na spṛśāṅgam // RUnm_4.29 //
analyzed: snātā asmi hanta mama na spṛśa na spṛśa aṅgam
atha vinītā

original: api gokule prasiddhā bhrū-bhramibhiḥ parijanair niṣiddhāpi /
analyzed: api gokule prasiddhā bhrū bhramibhiḥ parijanaiḥ niṣiddhā api

original: pīṭhaṃ mumoca rādhā bhadrikām api dūrataḥ prekṣya // RUnm_4.30 //
analyzed: pīṭham mumoca rādhā bhadrikām api dūratas prekṣya
yathā vā vidagdhamādhave
bhūyas bhūyas kali vilasitaiḥ sa aparādhā api rādhā
ślāghyena aham yat agha ripuṇā bāḍham aṅgīkṛtā asmi

original: tatra kṣāmodari kim aparaṃ kāraṇaṃ vaḥ sakhīnāṃ
analyzed: tatra kṣāma udari kim aparam kāraṇam vaḥ sakhīnām
datta āmodām praguṇa karuṇā mañjarīm antareṇa
atha karuṇā pūrṇā
tārṇa sūci śikhayā api tarṇakam
viddha vaktram avalokya sa asrayā
lipyate kṣatam avāpta bādhayā
kuṅkumena kṛpayā asya rādhayā
atha vidagdhā
ācāryā dhātu citre pacana viracanā cāturī cāru cittā

original: vāg-yuddhe mugdhayantī gurum api ca girāṃ paṇḍitā mālya-gumphe /
analyzed: vāc yuddhe gurum api ca girām paṇḍitā mālya gumphe

original: pāṭhe śārī-śukānāṃ paṭur ajitam api dyūta-keliṣu jiṣṇur
analyzed: pāṭhe śārī śukānām paṭuḥ ajitam api dyūta keliṣu jiṣṇuḥ
vidyā vidyoti buddhiḥ sphurati rati kalā śālinī rādhikā iyam
atha pāṭava anvitā
yathā vidagdhamādhave
chinnaḥ priyaḥ maṇi saraḥ sakhi mauktikāni
vṛttāni aham vicinuyām iti kaitavena
mugdham vivṛtya mayi hanta dṛś anta bhaṅgīm

original: rādhā guror api puraḥ praṇayād vyatānīt // RUnm_4.34 //
analyzed: rādhā guroḥ api puras praṇayāt vyatānīt
atha lajjā śīlā
vraja narapati sūnuḥ

analyzed: sphurati rahasi tāmyati eṣa tarṣāt

original: virama janani lajje kiñcid udghāṭya vaktraṃ
analyzed: virama janani lajje kiñcid udghāṭya vaktram

original: nimiṣam iha manāg apy akṣi-koṇaṃ kṣipāmi // RUnm_4.35 //
analyzed: nimiṣam iha manāk api akṣi koṇam kṣipāmi
atha su maryādā

original: prāṇān akṛtāhārā sakhi rādhā-cātakī varaṃ tyajati /

original: na tu kṛṣṇa-mudira-muktād amṛtād vṛttiṃ bhajed aparām // RUnm_4.36 //

original: āhūyamānā vrajanāthayāsmi yukto'bhisāraḥ sakhi nādhunā me /
analyzed: āhūyamānā vraja nāthayā asmi yuktaḥ abhisāraḥ sakhi na adhunā me

original: na tādṛśīnāṃ hi gurūttamānām ājñāsv avajñā valate śivāya // RUnm_4.37 //
analyzed: na tādṛśīnām hi guru uttamānām ājñāsu avajñā valate śivāya

original: vaṣṭi tvām eva tanvann akhila-madhurimotsekam asyāṃ mukundaḥ /
analyzed: vaṣṭi tvām eva tanvan akhila madhurima utsekam asyām mukundaḥ

original: diṣṭyā parvodagāt te svayam abhisaraṇe cittam ādhatsva vatse
analyzed: diṣṭyā parva udagāt te svayam abhisaraṇe cittam ādhatsva vatse

original: yuktyāpy uktā mayeti dyumaṇi-sakha-sutā prāhiṇod eva citrām // RUnm_4.38 //
analyzed: yuktyā api uktā mayā iti dyumaṇi sakha sutā prāhiṇot eva citrām

original: tīvras tarjati bhinna-dhīr gṛha-patiś chadma-jñayā padmayā
analyzed: tīvraḥ tarjati bhinna dhīḥ gṛhapatiḥ chadma jñayā padmayā

original: hāraṃ hārayati hari-praṇihitaṃ kīśena bhartuḥ svasā /
analyzed: hāram hārayati hari praṇihitam kīśena bhartuḥ svasā

original: mallīṃ lumpati kṛṣṇa-kāmya-kusumāṃ śaivyā priyā varkarī
analyzed: mallīm lumpati kṛṣṇa kāmya kusumām śaivyā priyā varkarī

original: rādhā paśya tathāpy atīva sahanā tuṣṇīm asau tiṣṭhati // RUnm_4.39 //
analyzed: rādhā paśya tathā api atīva sahanā tuṣṇīm asau tiṣṭhati
atha gāmbhīrya śālinī
kalaha antaritā pade sthitim
sakhi dhīra adya gatā api rādhikā
bahis
su durūhā lalitā dhiyā api abhūt
atha suvilāsā
tiryak kṣipta calat dṛś añcala ruciḥ lāsya ullasat bhrū latā
kunda ābha smita candika ujjvala mukhī gaṇḍa ucchalat kuṇḍalā
kandarpa āgama siddha mantra gahanām ardham duhānāḥ giram

original: hāriṇy adya harer jahāra hṛdayaṃ rādhā vilāsormibhiḥ // RUnm_4.41 //
analyzed: hāriṇī adya hareḥ jahāra hṛdayam rādhā vilāsa ūrmibhiḥ
atha mahābhāva parama utkarṣa tarṣiṇī
aśrūṇām ati vṛṣṭibhiḥ dvi guṇayanti arkātmajā nirjharam

original: rādhā veṇu-dhara pravāta-kadalī-tulyā kvacid vartate // RUnm_4.42 //
analyzed: rādhā veṇudhara pravāta kadalī tulyā kvacid vartate
atha gokula prema vasatiḥ
prema santatibhiḥ eva
vedhasā nu vṛṣabha anunandinī
yādṛśām padam itā manāṃsi naḥ
snehayati akhila goṣṭha vāsinām
atha jagat śreṇī lasat yaśāḥ
utphullam kila kurvatī kuvalayam deva indra patnī śrutau
kundam nikṣipatī viriñcī gṛhiṇī roma oṣadhī harṣiṇī
karṇa uttaṃsa sudhāṃśu ratna sakalam vidrāvya bhadra aṅgi te

original: lakṣmīm apy adhunā cakāra cakitāṃ rādhe yaśaḥ-kaumudī // RUnm_4.44 //
analyzed: lakṣmīm api adhunā cakāra cakitām rādhe yaśaḥ kaumudī
atha guru arpita guru snehā
na sutā asi kīrti dāyāḥ
kintu mama evā iti tathyam ākhyāmi
prāṇimi vīkṣya mukhaḥ te
kṛṣṇasya iva iti kim trapase
atha sakhī praṇaya adhīnā
upadiśa sakhi vṛnde vallava indrasya sūnum

original: kim ayam iha sakhīnāṃ mām adhīnāṃ dunoti /
analyzed: kim ayam iha sakhīnām mām adhīnām dunoti

original: kalayati lalitāyāḥ kiṃ na śauṭīrya-dhāṭīm // RUnm_4.46 //
analyzed: kalayati lalitāyāḥ kim na śauṭīrya dhāṭīm
atha kṛṣṇa priyāvalī mukhyā
yathā lalitamādhave
santu bhrāmyat a pāḍga bhaṅgi khuralī khelā bhuvaḥ su bhruvaḥ

original: svasti syān madirekṣaṇe kṣaṇam api tvām antarā me kutaḥ /
analyzed: svasti syāt madirā īkṣaṇe kṣaṇam api tvām antarā me kutas
tārāṇām nikurumbakena vṛtayā śliṣṭe api soma ābhayā

original: nākāśe vṛṣabhānujāṃ śriyam ṛte niṣpadyate svaś-chaṭā // RUnm_4.47 //
analyzed: na ākāśe vṛṣabha anujām śriyam ṛte niṣpadyate svar chaṭā
atha santatāśravakeśavā
ṣaṣ aṅghribhiḥ arditān kusuma sañcayān ācinot
akhaṇḍam api rādhike bahu śikhaṇḍakam tvad girā
amuñca nava pallava vrajam udañcat arka ujjvalam

original: karotu vaśago janaḥ kim ayam anyad-ājñāpaya // RUnm_4.48 //
analyzed: karotu vaśagaḥ janaḥ kim ayam anyat ājñāpaya
yasyāḥ sarva uttame yūthe sarva sat guṇa maṇḍitāḥ
samantāt mādhava ākarṣi vibhramāḥ santi subhruvaḥ

original: tās tu vṛndāvaneśvaryāḥ sakhyaḥ pañca-vidhā matāḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ tu vṛndāvana īśvaryāḥ sakhyaḥ pañcavidhāḥ matāḥ

original: sakhyaś ca nitya-sakhyaś ca prāṇa-sakhyaś ca kāścana /
analyzed: sakhyaḥ ca nitya sakhyaḥ ca prāṇa sakhyaḥ ca kāścana

original: priya-sakhyaś ca parama-preṣṭha-sakhyaś ca viśrutāḥ // RUnm_4.50 //
analyzed: priya sakhyaḥ ca parama preṣṭha sakhyaḥ ca viśrutāḥ
sakhyaḥ kusumikā vindhyā dhaniṣṭhā ādyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
nitya sakhyaḥ ca kastūrī maṇi mañjarikā ādayaḥ
prāṇasakhyaḥ śaśimukhī vāsantī lāsikā ādayaḥ
gatāḥ vṛndāvana īśvaryāḥ prāyeṇa imāḥ sva rūpa tām
parama preṣṭha sakhyaḥ tu lalitā sa viśākhikā
raṅgadevī sudevī ca iti aṣṭau sarva gaṇa agrimāḥ

original: āsāṃ suṣṭhu dvayor eva premṇaḥ parama-kāṣṭhayā /
analyzed: āsām suṣṭhu dvayoḥ eva premṇaḥ parama kāṣṭhayā

original: kvacij jātu kvacij jātu tad-ādhikyam ivekṣate // RUnm_4.55 //
analyzed: kvacid jātu kvacid jātu tad ādhikyam iva īkṣate
iti śrī śrī ujjvala nīlamaṇau
śrī rādhā prakaraṇam

original: yūthe'py avāntara-gaṇās teṣu ca kaścid gaṇas tri-caturābhiḥ /
analyzed: yūthe pi avāntaragaṇāḥ teṣu ca kaścid gaṇaḥ tri caturābhiḥ

original: iha pañca-ṣābhir anyaḥ saptāṣṭābhis tathety ādyāḥ // RUnm_5.1 //
analyzed: iha pañcaṣābhiḥ anyaḥ sapta aṣṭābhiḥ tathā iti ādyāḥ

original: nāsau nāṭye rase mukhye yat paroḍhā nigadyate /
analyzed: na asau nāṭye rase mukhye yat paroḍhā nigadyate
tat tu syāt prākṛta kṣudra nāyikā ādi anusārataḥ
tathā ca uktam

original: neṣṭā yad aṅgini rase kavibhir paroḍhā
analyzed: neṣṭā yat aṅgini rase kavibhiḥ paroḍhā
tat gokula ambuja dṛśām kulam antarena
āśāṃsayā rasa vidheḥ avatāritānām
kaṃsāriṇā rasika maṇḍala śekhareṇa
vraja indra nandana tvena suṣṭhu niṣṭhām upeyayuḥ

original: yāsāṃ bhāvasya sā mudrā sad-bhaktair api durgamā // RUnm_5.4 //
analyzed: yāsām bhāvasya sā mudrā sat bhaktaiḥ api durgamā
yathā lalitamādhave

original: gopīnāṃ paśupendra-nandana-juṣo bhāvasya kas tāṃ krtī
analyzed: gopīnām paśupa indra nandana juṣaḥ bhāvasya kaḥ tām krtī
vijñātum kṣamate durūha padavī sañcāriṇaḥ prakriyām

original: āviṣkurvati vaiṣṇavīm api tanuṃ tasmin bhujair jiṣṇubhi*
analyzed: āviṣkurvati vaiṣṇavīm api tanum tasmin bhujaiḥ jiṣṇubhi

original: ryāsāṃ hanta caturbhir adbhuta-ruciṃ rāgodayaḥ kuñcati // RUnm_5.5 //
analyzed: ryāsām hanta caturbhiḥ adbhuta rucim rāga udayaḥ kuñcati
bhujā catuṣṭayam kvāpi narmaṇā darśayan api
vṛndāvana īśvarī premṇā dvi bhujaḥ kriyate hariḥ
yathā
rāsa ārambha vidhau nilīya vasatā kuñje mṛga akṣī gaṇaiḥ

original: dṛṣṭaṃ gopayituṃ svam uddhura-dhiyā yā suṣṭhu sandarśitā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭam gopayitum svam uddhura dhiyā yā suṣṭhu sandarśitā

original: rādhāyāḥ praṇayasya hanta mahimā yasya śriyā rakṣituṃ
analyzed: rādhāyāḥ praṇayasya hanta mahimā yasya śriyā rakṣitum

original: sā śakyā prabhaviṣṇunāpi hariṇā nāsīc catur-bāhutā // RUnm_5.7 //
analyzed: sā śakyā prabhaviṣṇunā api hariṇā na āsīt catur bāhu tā
api ca
sāmānyāyāḥ rasa ābhāsa prasaṅgāt tādṛś api asau

original: bhāva-yogāt tu sairindhrī parakīyaiva sammatā // RUnm_5.8 //
analyzed: bhāva yogāt tu sairindhrī parakīyā eva sammatā
yathā ca prāñcaḥ śṛṅgāratilake

original: sāmānyā vanitā veśyā sā dravyaṃ param icchatā /
analyzed: sāmānyā vanitā veśyā sā dravyam param icchatā

original: guṇa-hīne ca na dveṣo nānurāgo guṇiny api /
analyzed: guṇa hīne ca na dveṣaḥ na anurāgaḥ guṇini api

original: śṛṅgārābhāsa etāsu na śṛṅgāraḥ kadācana // RUnm_5.9 // iti /
analyzed: śṛṅgāra ābhāsaḥ etāsu na śṛṅgāraḥ kadācana iti

original: svakīyāś ca paroḍhāś ca yā dvidhā parikīrtitāḥ /
analyzed: svakīyāḥ ca paroḍhāḥ ca yāḥ dvidhā parikīrtitāḥ

original: mugdhā madhyā pragalbheti pratyekaṃ tās tridhā matāḥ // RUnm_5.10 //
analyzed: mugdhā madhyā pragalbhā iti pratyekam tāḥ tridhā matāḥ

original: bheda-trayam idaṃ kaiścit svīyāyā eva varṇitam /
analyzed: bheda trayam idam kaiścid svīyāyāḥ eva varṇitam
tathā api sat kavi granthe dṛṣṭa tvāt tat an ādṛtam
tathā prācīnaiḥ ca uktam
udāhṛti bhidām kecid sarvāsām eva tanvate

original: tās tu prāyeṇa dṛśyante sarvatra vyavahārataḥ // RUnm_5.12 //
analyzed: tāḥ tu prāyeṇa dṛśyante sarvatra vyavahārataḥ
iti
tatra mugdhā
mugdhā nava vayaḥ kāmā ratau vāmā sakhī vaśā
rati ceṣṭāsu sa vrīḍa cāru gūḍha prayatna bhāj

original: priyāpriyoktau cāśaktā māne ca vimukhī sadā // RUnm_5.14 //
analyzed: priya apriya uktau ca aśaktā māne ca vimukhī sadā

viramati śaiśava śiśire
praviśati yauvana madhau viśākhāyāḥ
dīvyati locana kamalam
vadana sudhā aṃśuḥ ca visphurati
yathā vā

original: bālya-dhvānta sakhe prayāhi tarasā rādhā-vapur dvīpata-
analyzed: bālya dhvānta sakhe prayāhi tarasā rādhā vapuḥ dvīpata

original: stāruṇya-dyumaṇer yad eṣa vijayārambhaḥ puro jṛmbhate /
analyzed: stāruṇya dyumaṇeḥ yat eṣa vijaya ārambhaḥ puras jṛmbhate

original: kṛṣṇa-vyomni rucir darottaralatā tārā-dyutau kāpy uraḥ-
pūrvādrau suṣamonnatiḥ smita-kalā paśyādya vaktrāmbuje // RUnm_5.16 //
analyzed: pūrva adrau suṣama unnatiḥ smita kalā paśya adya vaktra ambuje
nava kāmā yathā
bāle kaṃsa bhidaḥ smara utsava rase prastūyamāne chalāt

sa vyājam vanamālikā viracane pi ullāsam ālambase

original: raṅgaḥ ko'yam avātarad vada sakhi svānte navīnas tava // RUnm_5.17 //
analyzed: raṅgaḥ koyam avātarat vada sakhi svānte navīnaḥ tava
ratau vāmā yathā
nava bālikā asmi kuru narma na īdṛśam
padavīm vimuñca śikhi piñcha śekhara

maravinda bandhu duhituḥ nata bhruvaḥ

yamunā puline vilokanāt me
calitām smera sakhī gṛhīta hastām
ayi muñca karam mama iti kañjat
vacanām khañjana locanām smarāmi
sakhī vaśā
vraja rāja kumāra karkaśe

original: nalinīṃ kaḥ kurute janaḥ kṛtī // RUnm_5.20 //
analyzed: nalinīm kaḥ kurute janaḥ kṛtī

original: na svīkṛtā sakhi mayā srag ihāsti kaundī
analyzed: na svīkṛtā sakhi mayā sraj iha asti kaundī

original: ced vṛndayā caṭulayā kim ahaṃ kariṣye // RUnm_5.21/
analyzed: ced vṛndayā caṭulayā kim aham kariṣye
sa vrīḍa rata prayatnā yathā

analyzed: dvitrāṇi etya padāni kuñja vasateḥ dvāre vilāsa unmukhī

original: svāntaṃ hanta jahāra hāri-hariṇī-netrā mama śyāmalā // RUnm_5.22 //

roṣa kṛta bāṣpa maunā yathā

tvām vakṣyate katham a dakṣiṇam akṣam eva

original: vaktraṃ pidhāya kurutām iyam aśru-mokṣam // RUnm_5.23 //

original: mṛdvī tathākṣamā ceti sā māne vimukhī dvidhā // RUnm_5.24 //

yathā rasa sudhākāre

original: bhrūbhedo'pi tad īkṣaṇa-vyasaninā vyasmāri me cakṣuṣā /

cāṭu uktāni karoti dagdha rasanā rukṣa akṣrepī udyatā

original: sakhyaḥ kiṃ karavāṇi māna-samaye saṅghāta-bhedo mama // RUnm_5.25 //

akṣamā yathā
ābhīra paṅkaja dṛśām bata sāhasikyam

original: yā keśave kṣaṇam api praṇayanti mānam /
analyzed: yā keśave kṣaṇam api praṇayanti mānam
māna iti varṇa yugale ipi mama prayāte
karṇa aṅganam vahati vepathum antarātmā
atha madhyā

original: madhyā syāt komalā kvāpi māne kutrāpi karkaśā // RUnm_5.27 //
analyzed: madhyā syāt komalā kvāpi māne kutra api karkaśā
tatra samāna lajjā madanā yathā
vikirati kila kṛṣṇe netra padmam sa tṛṣṇe
namayati mukham antar smeram āvṛtya rādhā

original: tad api sarasijākṣī tasya modaṃ vyatānīt // RUnm_5.28 //
analyzed: tat api sarasija akṣī tasya modam vyatānīt
prodyat tāruṇya śālinī yathā
bhruvoḥ vikṣepaḥ te kavalayati mīna dhvaja dhanuḥ
prabhā ārambham rambhā śriyam upahasati uru yugalam

original: varorūṇāṃ rādhe taruṇimani cūrāmaṇir asi // RUnm_5.29 //

kiñcid pragalbhā uktiḥ
yathā uddhava sandeśe

patyuḥ kṛṣṇa bhramara kuruṣe kiṃtarām antarāyam

original: puṣpaiḥ pāṇḍu-cchavim aviralair yāhi puṃnāga-kuñjam // RUnm_5.30 //

original: svairaṃ gauri riraṃsayā mayi dṛśaṃ dīrghāṃ kṣipaty acyute /

uru rata utsukā yathā

original: baddhuṃ bandhura-gātri kṛṣṇa-hariṇaṃ śaṅke tvam ākāṅkṣasi // RUnm_5.47 //

avacinu kusumāni prekṣya cāruṇi araṇye
viracaya punar ebhiḥ maṇḍanāni ujjvalāni

original: ryuvatiṣu mama bhīmaṃ rautu saubhāgya-bherī // RUnm_5.48 //
analyzed: ryuvatiṣu mama bhīmam rautu saubhāgya bherī
ati prauḍhā uktiḥ
yathā padyāvalyām

original: tiṣṭhan dvāre ramaṇi vimanāḥ khidyate padmanābhaḥ /

original: tvaṃ connidrā kṣapayasi niśām rodayantī vayasyā
analyzed: tvam ca unnidrā kṣapayasi niśām rodayantī vayasyā

original: śilpaṃ te paricitya tapsyati gṛhīty aṅgī kṛtā na srajaḥ /

original: āhūtāsmi gṛhe vrajeśitur iti kṣipraṃ vrajantyā vaca-

original: stasyāśrāvi na bhadrayeti vinayair mānaḥ pramāṇīkṛtaḥ // RUnm_5.54 //

original: vaktuṃ suṣṭhu na hi kṣamāsmi kaṭhinair maunaṃ dvijair grāhitā /
analyzed: vaktum suṣṭhu na hi kṣamā asmi kaṭhinaiḥ maunam dvijaiḥ grāhitā

original: kā tvāṃ projjhya calet khaleyam aciraṃ śvaśrūr na ced āhvaye-
analyzed: kā tvām projjhya calet khalā iyam aciram śvaśrūḥ na ced āhvaye

original: ditthaṃ pālikayā harau vinayato manyur gabhīrīkṛtaḥ // RUnm_5.55 //
analyzed: pālikayā harau vinayataḥ manyuḥ gabhīrīkṛtaḥ

original: muhuś cumbārambhe mukham api na sācīkṛtam abhūt /

original: parīrambhe candrāvali na ca vapuḥ kuñcitam idaṃ

original: kva labdhā mānasya sthitir iyam anālokita-carī // RUnm_5.56 //

original: santarjya niṣṭhuraṃ roṣād adhīrā tāḍayet priyam // RUnm_5.57 //

yathā

original: mugdhāḥ kaṃsaripo vayaṃ racayituṃ jānīmahe nocitaṃ

original: sākṣepaṃ cakitekṣaṇas tvam asakṛt karṇotpalais tāḍyase // RUnm_5.58 //
analyzed: sa ākṣepam cakita īkṣaṇaḥ tvam asakṛt karṇa utpalaiḥ tāḍyase
atha dhīra adhīra pragalbhā
dhīra adhīra guṇa upteā dhīra adhīra iti kathyate
yathā

original: sphurati na mama jātu krodha-gandho'pi citte
analyzed: sphurati na mama jātu krodha gandhaḥ api citte

original: vratam anu gahanābhūt kintu maune manīṣā /
analyzed: vratam anu gahanā abhūt kintu maune manīṣā

original: aghahara laghu yāhi vyāja āstāṃ yad etāḥ
analyzed: agha hara laghu yāhi vyāje āstām yat etāḥ

original: kusuma-rasanayā tvāṃ bandhum icchanti sakhyaḥ // RUnm_5.60 //
analyzed: kusuma rasanayā tvām bandhum icchanti sakhyaḥ
yathā vā

original: kṛtāgasi harau puraḥ sphurati taṃ bhramad-bhrū-latā
analyzed: kṛta āgasi harau puras sphurati tam bhramat bhrū latā

original: na tena tam atāḍayat kim api yāhi yāhīti sā
analyzed: na tena tam atāḍayat kim api yāhi yāhi iti sā

tad priyāṇām yathā

original: vādyaṃ kiṅkiṇim āharaty upacayaṃ jñātvā nitambo guṇī
analyzed: vādyam kiṅkiṇim āharati upacayam jñātvā nitambaḥ guṇī

original: svasya dhvaṃsam avetya vaṣṭi balibhir yogaṃ hrasan-madhyamam /
analyzed: svasya dhvaṃsam avetya vaṣṭi balibhiḥ yogam hrasat madhyamam
vakṣaḥ sādhu phala dvayam vicinute rāja upahāra kṣamam

original: rādhāyās tanu-rājyam añcati nave kṣauṇī-patau yauvane // RUnm_10.13 //
analyzed: rādhāyāḥ tanu rājyam añcati nave kṣauṇīpatau yauvane
tat mādhuryam
āśāste patitum kaṭākṣa madhupaḥ mandam dṛś indīvare
kiñcid vrīḍa visa aṅkuram mṛgayate cetaḥ marāla arbhakaḥ
narma ālāpa madhu chaṭā adya vadana ambhoje tava udīyate

original: śaṅke sundari mādhavotsava-karīṃ kāñcid daśām añcasi // RUnm_10.14 //
analyzed: śaṅke sundari mādhava utsava karīm kāñcid daśām añcasi
atha navyam
dara udbhinna stanam kiñcid cala akṣam manthara smitam

original: manāg abhisphurad-bhāvaṃ navyaṃ yauvanam ucyate // RUnm_10.15 //
analyzed: manāk abhisphurat bhāvam navyam yauvanam ucyate
yathā
uraḥ stoka ucchūnam vacanam udayat vakrima lavam
dava udghūrṇā dṛṣṭiḥ jaghana taṭam īṣat ghanataram

original: manāg vyaktā romāvalir apacitaṃ kiñcid udaraṃ
analyzed: manāk vyaktā roma āvaliḥ apacitam kiñcid udaram

original: hareḥ sevaucityaṃ tava suvadane vindati vayaḥ // RUnm_10.16 //
analyzed: hareḥ sevā aucityam tava su vadane vindati vayaḥ
tat mādhuryam

original: vāraṃ vāraṃ vicarasi harer adya viśrāma-vedyā-
analyzed: vāram vāram vicarasi hareḥ adya viśrāma vedyā

original: mudbhrāntāsi sphurati pavane tad vapur gandha-bhāji /
analyzed: mud bhrāntā asi sphurati pavane tat vapuḥ gandha bhāji

original: bāle netre vikirasi muhur naicikīnāṃ padavyāṃ
analyzed: bāle netre vikirasi muhur naicikīnām padavyām

original: bhāvāgnis te sphuṭam iha mano-dhāmni dhūmāyito'sti // RUnm_10.17 //
analyzed: bhāva agniḥ te sphuṭam iha manaḥ dhāmni
atha vyaktam
vakṣaḥ pravyakta vakṣojam madhyam ca su vali trayam

original: ujjvalāni tathāṅgāni vyakte sphurati yauvane // RUnm_10.18 //
analyzed: ujjvalāni tathā aṅgāni vyakte sphurati yauvane
yathā
rathāṅga mithunam navam prakaṭayati uroja dyuti
rvyanakti yugalam dṛśoḥ śaphara vṛttim indra āvali
bibharti ca bali trayam tava taraṅga bhaṅga udgamam

original: tvam atra sarasīkṛtā taruṇima-śriyā rājasi // RUnm_10.19 //
analyzed: tvam atra sarasīkṛtā taruṇima śriyā rājasi
tat mādhuryam
bhrājante vara danti mauktika gaṇāḥ yasya ullikhadbhiḥ nakhaiḥ
kṣiptāḥ puṣkara mālayā āvṛta rucaḥ kuñjeṣu kuñjeśu amī
śauṭīrya abdhiḥ uroja pañjara taṭe saṃveśayantyā katham

original: sa śrīmān hariṇekṣaṇe harir abhūn netreṇa baddhas tvayā // RUnm_10.20 //
analyzed: sa śrīmān hariṇa īkṣaṇe hariḥ abhūt netreṇa baddhaḥ tvayā
atha pūrṇam

original: nitambo vipulo madhyaṃ kṛśam aṅgaṃ vara-dyuti /
analyzed: nitambaḥ vipulaḥ madhyam kṛśam aṅgam vara dyuti

original: pīnau kucāv uru-yugmaṃ rambhābhaṃ pūrṇa-yauvane // RUnm_10.21 //
analyzed: pīnau kucau uru yugmam rambhā ābham pūrṇa yauvane
yathā
dṛśoḥ dvandvam vakrām harati śaphara ullāsa laharī
makhaṇḍam tuṇḍa śrīḥ vidhu madhurimāṇam damayati
kucau kumbha bhrāntim muhur avikalām kandalayata

original: stavāpūrvaṃ līlāvati vayasi pūrṇe vapur abhūt // RUnm_10.22 //
analyzed: stava apūrvam līlāvati vayasi pūrṇe vapuḥ abhūt
tat mādhuryam

original: na vitrastā kā te pratiyuvatir āsīn mukha-rucā
analyzed: na vitrastā kā te pratiyuvatiḥ āsīt mukha rucā

original: dadhāra staimityaṃ praṇaya-ghana-vṛṣṭyā tava na kā /
analyzed: dadhāra staimityam praṇaya ghana vṛṣṭyā tava na kā

original: vraje śiṣyā kābhūn na hi tava kalāyām iti hare-
analyzed: vraje śiṣyā kā abhūt na hi tava kalāyām iti hare

original: rnikuñja-svārāje tvam asi rasike paṭṭa-mahiṣī // RUnm_10.23 //
analyzed: tvam asi rasike paṭṭamahiṣī
tāruṇyasya nava tve pi kāsāñcid vraja subhruvām
śobhā pūrti viśeṣeṇa pūrṇa tā iva prakāśate
atha rūpam
aṅgāni a bhūṣitāni eva kenacid bhūṣaṇa ādinā

original: yena bhūṣitavad bhāti tad rūpam iti kathyate // RUnm_10.25 //
analyzed: yena bhūṣita vat bhāti tat rūpam iti kathyate
yathā dānakelikaumudyām
trapate vilokya padmā
lalite rādhām vinā api alaṅkāram
tat alam maṇi maya maṇḍana
maṇḍala racanā prayāsena
yathā vā vidagdhamādhave

original: nītaṃ te punar uktatāṃ bhramarakaiḥ kastūrikā-patrakaṃ
analyzed: nītam te punar ukta tām bhramarakaiḥ kastūrikā patrakam
netrābhyām viphalīkṛtam kuvalaya dvandvam ca karṇāpitam
hāraḥ ca smita kānti bhaṅgibhiḥ alam piṣṭa anupeṣīkṛtaḥ

original: kiṃ rādhe tava maṇḍanena nitarām aṅgair asi dyotitā // RUnm_10.27 //
analyzed: kim rādhe tava maṇḍanena nitarām aṅgaiḥ asi dyotitā
atha lāvaṇyam
muktāphaleṣu chāyāyāḥ tarala tvam iva antarā

original: pratibhāti yad aṅgeṣu lāvaṇyaṃ tad ihocyate // RUnm_10.28 //
analyzed: pratibhāti yat aṅgeṣu lāvaṇyam tat iha ucyate
yathā
jagat amala ruciḥ vicitya rādhe
vyadhita vidhiḥ tava nūnam aṅgakāni
maṇi maya mukuram kuraṅga netre
kiraṇa gaṇena viḍambayanti yāni
yathā vā

original: śṛṇu sakhi tava karṇe varṇayāmy atra nīcai-
analyzed: śṛṇu sakhi tava karṇe varṇayāmi atra nīcais
mukha candram mā vṛthārāt vivarṇam

original: iyam urasi murārer asti nānyā mṛgākṣī
analyzed: iyam urasi murāreḥ asti nā anyā mṛgākṣī
marakata mukura ābhe biimbitā asi tvam eva
atha saundaryam
yaḥ sanniveśaḥ yathocitam

original: susliṣṭa-sandhi-bandhaḥ syāt tat saundaryam itīryate // RUnm_10.31 //
analyzed: su sliṣṭa sandhi bandhaḥ syāt tat saundaryam iti īryate
yathā
akhaṇḍa indoḥ tulyam mukham uru kuca dyotitam uro

original: bhujau srastāv aṃse kara-parimitaṃ madhyam abhitaḥ /
analyzed: bhujau srastau aṃse kara parimitam madhyam abhitas
parisphārā śroṇī krama laghima bhāj ūru yugalam

original: tavāpūrvaṃ rādhe kim api kamanīyaṃ vapur abhūt // RUnm_10.32 //
analyzed: tava apūrvam rādhe kim api kamanīyam vapuḥ abhūt
atha abhirūpa tā
yad ātmīya guṇa utkarṣaiḥ vastu anyat nikaṭa sthitam

original: sārūpyaṃ nayati prājñair ābhirūpyaṃ tad ucyate // RUnm_10.33 //
analyzed: sārūpyam nayati prājñaiḥ ābhirūpyam tat ucyate
yathā
magnā śubhre daśana kiraṇe sphāṭikī iva sphurantī
lagnā śoṇe kara sarasije padmāragī iva gauri
gaṇḍa upānte kuvalaya rucā vā aindranīlī iva jātā

original: sūte ratna-traya-dhiyam asau paśya kṛṣṇasya vaṃśī // RUnm_10.34 //
analyzed: sūte ratna traya dhiyam asau paśya kṛṣṇasya vaṃśī
yathā vā
vakṣoje tava campaka chavim avaṣṭambha ūru kumbha upame
rādhe kokanada śriyaḥ kara tale sindūrataḥ sundare
drāk indindira bandhureṣu cikureṣu indīvara ābhām vahan
nakaḥ kairava korakaḥ vitanute puṣpa trayī vibhramam
atha mādhuryam

original: rūpaṃ kim apy anirvācyaṃ tanor mādhuryam ucyate // RUnm_10.36 //
analyzed: rūpam kim api anirvācyam tanoḥ mādhuryam ucyate
yathā

original: kim api hṛdayam abhra-śyāmalaṃ dhāma rundhe
analyzed: kim api hṛdayam abhra śyāmalam dhāma rundhe

original: dṛśam ahaha viluṇṭhaty āṅgikī kāpi mudrā /
analyzed: dṛśam ahaha viluṇṭhati āṅgikī kā api mudrā
caṭulayati kula strī dharma caryām bakāreḥ

original: sumukhi nava-vivartaḥ ko'py asau mādhurīṇām // RUnm_10.37 //
analyzed: su mukhi nava vivartaḥ kopī asau mādhurīṇām
atha mardavam
mārdavam komalasya api saṃsparśa asaha tā ucyate

original: uttamaṃ madhyamaṃ proktaṃ kaniṣṭhaṃ ceti tat tridhā // RUnm_10.38 //
analyzed: uttamam madhyamam proktam kaniṣṭham ca iti tat tridhā
tatra uttamam
abhinava nava mālikām ayam sā
śayana varam niśi rādhikā adhiśiśye
na kusuma paṭalam darā api jaglau
tad anubhavāt tanuḥ eva sa vraṇā āsīt
madhyamam yathā
citram dhaniṣṭhe tanuvāsasā upi
cīnasya pīna stani saṅgamena
liptā iva te lohitacandanena
mūrtiḥ bindunā sakhi lohitā āsīt
āmodam āmodanam ādadhānam
nilīna nīla alaka cañcarīkam
kṣaṇena padmā mukha padmam āsīt
tviṣā raveḥ komalayā api tāmram
atha nāma yathā
taṭa bhuvi ravi putryāḥ paśya gaura aṅgi raṅgī
sphurati sakhi kuraṅgī maṇḍale kṛṣṇasāraḥ
iti bhavat abhidhānam śṛṇvatī sā mad uktau
su tanuḥ a tanu ghūrṇā pūra pūrṇā babhūva
atha caritam

original: anubhāvāś ca līlā cety ucyate caritaṃ dvidhā /
analyzed: anubhāvāḥ ca līlā ca iti ucyate caritam dvidhā
agrenubhāvāḥ vaktavyāḥ līlā iyam kathyate adhunā
atha cāru vikrīḍā
rāsa kandūka khelā ādyā cāru krīḍā atra kīrtitā
tatra rāsaḥ
tam vilāsavati rāsa maṇḍale
puṇḍarīka nayanam sura aṅganāḥ
prekṣya sambhṛta vihāra vibhramam
babhramuḥ madana sambhrama ūrmibhiḥ
kandūka krīḍā
aruṇa rucim udasya kṣepiṇīm kuñcita agrām
sarabhasam abhidhāvan vibhramat dīrgha veṇiḥ
viracayati mukundaḥ kanduka āndola nṛtya
dvipula nayana bhaṅgī vibhramaḥ kautukam naḥ
tāṇḍavam
pracala pracalāka kuṇḍaloyam
hariḥ adya naṭan pataṅga putrī
taṭa raṅge mama raṅgam ātanoti
veṇu vādanam
yathā lalitamādhave
jaṅghā adhas taṭa saṅgi dakṣiṇa padam kiñcid vibhugna trikam
sāci stambhita kandharam sakhi tiras sañcāri netra añcalam
vaṃśīm kuṭmalite dadhānam adhare lola aṅgulīsaṅga tām

original: riṅgad-bhrū-bhramaraṃ varāṅgi paramānandaṃ puraḥ svīkuru // RUnm_10.49 //
analyzed: riṅgat bhrū bhramaram vara aṅgi parama ānandam puras svīkuru
godohaḥ yathā padyāvalyām
aṅguṣṭha agrima yantrita aṅguliḥ asau
rārdrīkṛtya payodhara añcalam alam sadyas payaḥ bindubhiḥ
nyak jānu dvaya madhya yantrita gahṭī vaktra antarāla skhala

original: ddhārādhvāna-manoharaṃ sakhi payo gāṃ dogdhi dāmodaraḥ // RUnm_10.50 //
analyzed: ddhārā adhvāna manoharam sakhi payaḥ gām dogdhi dāmodaraḥ
parvata uddhāraḥ
udyamya kandukita mandara sodara adrim

original: savyaṃ karaṃ kaṭim anu sthagayann asavyam /
analyzed: savyam karam kaṭim anu sthagayan a savyam
smera ānanaḥ cala dṛś añcala cañcarīka
mama hariḥ caṭulīcakāra
gohūtiḥ
piśaṅgi maṇika stani praṇata śṛṅgi piṅga īkṣaṇe
iti sva surabhī kulam muhur udīrṇa hīhī dhvani

original: rvidūra-gatam āhvayan harati hanta cittaṃ hariḥ // RUnm_10.52 //
analyzed: āhvayan harati hanta cittam hariḥ
gamanam
sahacari dara cañcat cāru cūḍā ruciḥ mām
madayati gati mudrā mādhurī mādhavasya
atha maṇḍanam
caturdhā maṇḍanam vāsaḥ bhūṣā mālya anulepanaiḥ
atha vastram yathā
ambaram racita dhairya saṃvaram
ramyam ambara maṇi prabhā ujjvalam
subhru kim na hi kaṭīra maṇḍale
puṇḍarīkanayanasya paśyasi
yathā vā
amala kamala rāga rāgam etat tava
jayati sphuṭam adbhutam dukūlam
mama hṛdi nija rāgam atra rādhe

original: dadhad api yad dviguṇaṃ babhūva raktam // RUnm_10.56 //
analyzed: dadhat api yat dviguṇam babhūva raktam
bhūṣā yathā
praharatu hariṇā kadamba puṣpam
priya sakhi śekharitam yat aṅgaja astram
bata katham amunā avataṃsitā usau
mama hṛdi bidhyati nīlakaṇṭha pakṣaḥ
yathā vā
hāreṇa tāra dyutinā kapolaḥ
preṅkholinā kuṇḍalayoḥ yugena
uttuṅga bhāsā kanaka aṅgadena
mām lālitā iyam lalitā dhinoti
mālya anulepane
yathā rasasudhākare
āloklaiḥ anumīyate madhukaraiḥ keśeṣu mālya grahaḥ

original: kāntiḥ kāpi kapolayoḥ prathayate tāmbūlam antargatam /
analyzed: kāntiḥ kā api kapolayoḥ prathayate tāmbūlam antargatam
aṅgānām anubhūyate parimalaiḥ ālepana prakriyā

original: veṣaḥ ko'pi vidagdha eṣa sudṛśaḥ sūte sukhaṃ cakṣuṣoḥ // RUnm_10.59 //
analyzed: veṣaḥ kaḥ api vidagdhaḥ eṣa sudṛśaḥ sūte sukham cakṣuṣoḥ
yathā vā
anaṅga rāgāya babhūva sadya
stava aṅgarāgaḥ upi kim aṅganāsu
uddāma bhāvāya tathā kim āsīt
dāmā api dāmodara tāvakīnam
atha sambandhinaḥ

original: lagnāḥ sannihitāś ceti dvidhā sambandhino matāḥ // RUnm_10.61 //
analyzed: lagnāḥ sannihitāḥ ca iti dvidhā sambandhinaḥ matāḥ
tatra lagnāḥ
pada aṅka ādyāḥ vipañci ādi nikvāṇāḥ śilpa kauśalam

original: ity ādayo'tra kathitā lagnāḥ sambandhino budhaiḥ // RUnm_10.62 //
analyzed: iti ādayaḥ utra kathitāḥ lagnāḥ sambandhinaḥ budhaiḥ
tatra vaṃśīravo
dānakelikaumudyām
veṇoḥ eṣa kala svanaḥ taru latā vyājṛmbhaṇe dohadam
sandhyā garja bharaḥ pika dvija kuhu svādhyāya pārāyaṇe
ābhīra indu mukhī smara anala śikhā utseke sa līlā anilaḥ
rādhā dhairya dharādhara indra damane unmīlati
yathā vā rasasudhākare
padyāvalyām
maṇḍape paṭuḥ aṭat madhu vrate
saṃjagau śravaṇa cāru gopikā
māna mīna vaḍiśena veṇunā

original: uddīpanānāṃ sarveṣāṃ madhye pravaram īryate // RUnm_10.65 //
analyzed: uddīpanānām sarveṣām madhye pravaram īryate
śṛṅgīravaḥ
kaṃsārāteḥ pibatu muralī tasya sat vaṃśa janmā
sā vaktra indum sphuṭam akuṭilā pañcama udgāra gurvī
āsvādya amum tvam api viṣamā bhaṅgura aṅgāra kālī

original: tuṅgaṃ śṛṅgi dhvanasi yad idaṃ tat tu duḥkhākaroti // RUnm_10.66 //
analyzed: tuṅgam śṛṅgi dhvanasi yat idam tat tu
atha gītam
māna analam me śamayan samiddham
gāna amṛtam varṣati kṛṣṇa meghaḥ
mā krudhya vātyā asi sakhi prasīda
dūre naya amum nija vibhrameṇa
saurabham
milati parimala ūrmiḥ kasya roma śriyā asau
mama tanu latikāyām kurvatī kuḍmalāni
sakhi viditam iha agre mādhavaḥ prādurāsīt

original: bhuvi surabhitayā yaḥ khyātim aṅgīkaroti // RUnm_10.68 //
analyzed: bhuvi surabhi tayā yaḥ khyātim aṅgīkaroti
yathā vā
madayati hṛdayam kim api akāṇḍe
mama yat idam nava saurabham varīyaḥ
tat iha kusuma saṃgrahāya rādhā
śikhari taṭe śikhara dvijā viveśa
bhūṣaṇa kvaṇaḥ
kalahaṃsa nādam iha haṃsa gāminī
niśamayya haṃsa duhituḥ taṭa antare
tava nūpura dhvani dhiyā pariplavā

original: kalasīṃ na veda śirasaś cyutām api // RUnm_10.70 //
analyzed: kalasīm na veda śirasaḥ cyutām api
yathā vā lalitamādhave
madhurima laharībhiḥ stambhayati ambare yā
smara mada sarasānām sārasānām rutāni
iyam udayati rādhā kiṅkinī jhaṅkṛtiḥ me
hṛdi pariṇamayantī vikriyā āḍambarāṇi
pada aṅka ādyāḥ
yathā dānakelikaumudyām
pada tatibhiḥ alam kṛtā ujjvalā iyam
dhvaja kuliśa aṅkuśa paṅkaja aṅkitābhiḥ
nakhara luṭhita kuṭmala avanālī

original: kim api dhinoti dhunoti cāntaraṃ me // RUnm_10.72 //
analyzed: kim api dhinoti dhunoti ca antaram me
vipañcīnikvāṇaḥ
yathā lalitamādhave
śabda brahma śriyam muhur duhatī
vahati mudam mama mahatī
miha mahitā śyāmalā amahatī
śilpa kauśalam yathā
vara kusuma niveśa prakriyā sauṣṭhavena
hṛdi vinihita kampā nirmimīte sraj eṣā
niśita śara parīta smāra tuṇīḥ aśaṅkām
atha sannihitāḥ
nirmālya ādyāḥ sannihitāḥ barha guñjā adri dhātavaḥ
naicikīnām samudayaḥ laguḍī veṇuśṛṅgīkāḥ
tad preṣṭha dṛṣṭiḥ godhūliḥ vṛndāraṇyam tad āśritāḥ
govardhanaḥ ravisutā tathā rāsasthala ādayaḥ
tatra nirmālya ādyāḥ
yathā vidagdha mādhava ādau
aṅga uttīrṇa vilepanam sakhi samākṛṣṭi kriyāyām maṇi

original: rmantro hanta muhur vaśīkṛti-vidhau nāmāsya vaṃśī-pateḥ /
analyzed: rmantraḥ hanta muhur vaśīkṛti vidhau nāma asya vaṃśīpateḥ

original: nirmālya-srag iyaṃ mahauṣadhir iha svāntasya sammohane
analyzed: nirmālya sraj iyam mahā oṣadhiḥ iha svāntasya sammohane

original: kāmaṃ śyāmala-sundaro mayi sakhi svairī sahasraṃ samāḥ /
analyzed: kāmam śyāmala sundaraḥ mayi sakhi svairī sahasram samāḥ

original: kintu bhrānti-bharād api kṣaṇam idaṃ tatra priyebhyaḥ priye
analyzed: kintu bhrānti bharāt api kṣaṇam idam tatra priyebhyaḥ priye

original: ceto janmani janmani praṇayitād āsyaṃ na me hāsyati // RUnm_11.27 //
analyzed: cetaḥ janmani janmani praṇayitāt āsyam na me hāsyati
atha svabhāva jāḥ tatra līlā
priya anukaraṇam līlā ramyaiḥ veśa kriyā ādibhiḥ
yathā viṣṇupurāṇe
duṣṭakāliya tiṣṭha adya kṛṣṇā ūham iti ca aparā

original: bāhum āsphoṭya kṛṣṇasya līlā-sarvasvam ādade // RUnm_11.29 //
analyzed: bāhum āsphoṭya kṛṣṇasya līlā sarvasvam ādade
yathā vā chandomañjaryām
mṛgamada kṛta carcā pīta kauṣeya vāsā
rucira śikhi śikhaṇḍā baddha dhammilla pāśā
anṛju nihitam aṃse vaṃśam utkvāṇayantī
kṛta madhuripu veṣā mālinī pātu rādhā
atha vilāsaḥ
gati sthāna āsana ādīnām mukha netra ādi karmaṇām

original: tātkālikaṃ tu vaiśiṣṭyaṃ vilāsaḥ priya-saṅgajam // RUnm_11.31 //
analyzed: tātkālikam tu vaiśiṣṭyam vilāsaḥ priya saṅga jam
yathā

original: ruṇatsi purataḥ sphuraty aghahare kathaṃ nāsikā-
analyzed: ruṇatsi puratas sphurati agha hare katham nāsikā
śikha grathita mauktika unnamana kaitvena smitam
nirāsthat aciram sudhā kiraṇa kaumudī mādhurīm

original: manāg api tavodgatā madhura-danti danta-dyutiḥ // RUnm_11.32 //
analyzed: manāk api tava udgatā madhura danti danta dyutiḥ
yathā vā
adhyāsīnam amum kadamba nikaṭe krīḍā kuṭīra sthalī
mā ābhīra indra kumāram atra rabhasāt ālokayantyāḥ puras
digdhāḥ dugdha samudra mugdha laharī lāvaṇya nisyandibhiḥ

original: kālindī tava dṛk-taraṅgita-bharais tanvaṅgi gaṅgāyate // RUnm_11.33 //
analyzed: kālindī tava dṛś taraṅgita bharaiḥ tanvaṅgi gaṅgāyate
atha vicchittiḥ
ākalpa kalpanā alpā api vicchittiḥ kānti poṣa kṛt
yathā
mākanda patreṇa mukunda cetaḥ
pramodinī māruta kampitena
raktena karṇa ābharaṇīkṛtena
rādhā mukha ambhoruham ullalāsa
yathā vā harivaṃśe
ekena amala patreṇa kaṇṭha sūtra avalambinā
rarāja barhi patreṇa manda māruta kampinā
sakhī yatnāt iva dhṛtiḥ maṇḍanānām priyā āgasi

original: serṣyāvajñā vara-strībhir vicchittir iti kecana // RUnm_11.37 //
analyzed: sa īrṣyā avajñā vara strībhiḥ vicchittiḥ iti kecana
yathā
mudrām gāḍhatarām vidhāya nihite dūrīkuruṣva aṅgade

original: granthiṃ nyasya kaṭhoram arpita-matiḥ kaṇṭhān maṇiṃ bhraṃśaya /
analyzed: granthim nyasya kaṭhoram arpita matiḥ kaṇṭhāt maṇim bhraṃśaya
mugdhe kṛṣṇa bhujaṅga dṛṣṭi kalayā durvārayā dūṣite

original: ratnālaṅkaraṇe manāg api manas tṛṣṇāṃ na puṣṇāti me // RUnm_11.38 //
analyzed: ratna alaṅkaraṇe manāk api manaḥ tṛṣṇām na puṣṇāti me
atha vibhramaḥ

vibhramaḥ hāra mālya ādi bhūṣā sthāna viparyayaḥ
yathā vidagdhamādhave
dhammilla upari nīlaratna racitaḥ hāraḥ tvayā āropitaḥ
vinyastaḥ kuca kumbhayoḥ kuru valaya śreṇī kṛtaḥ garbhakaḥ

original: aṅge carcitam añjanaṃ vinihitā kastūrikā netrayoḥ
analyzed: aṅge carcitam añjanam vinihitā kastūrikā netrayoḥ

original: kaṃsārer abhisāra-sambhrama-bharān manye jagad vismṛtam // RUnm_11.40 //
analyzed: kaṃsāreḥ abhisāra sambhrama bharāt manye jagat vismṛtam
yathā vā śrī daśame

original: limpantyaḥ pramṛjantyo'nyā añjantyaḥ kāś ca locane /
analyzed: limpantyaḥ pramṛjantyaḥ anyāḥ añjantyaḥ kāḥ ca locane
vyatyasta vastra ābharaṇāḥ kāścid kṛṣṇa antikam yayuḥ
adhīnasya api sevāyām kāntasya anabhinandanam

original: vibhramo vāmatodrekāt syād ity ākhyāti kaścana // RUnm_11.42 //
analyzed: vibhramaḥ vāma tā udrekāt syāt iti ākhyāti kaścana
yathā

original: tvaṃ govinda mayāsi kiṃ nu kavarī-bandhārtham abhyarthitaḥ
analyzed: tvam govinda mayā asi kim nu kavarī bandha artham abhyarthitaḥ

original: kleśenālam abaddha eva cikura-stomo mudaṃ dogdhi me /
analyzed: kleśena alam a baddhaḥ eva cikura stomaḥ mudam dogdhi me

original: vaktrasyāpi na mājjanaṃ kuru ghanaṃ gharmāsu me rocate
analyzed: vaktrasya api na mājjanam kuru ghanam me rocate

original: naivottaṃsaya mālatīr mama śiraḥ khedaṃ bhareṇāpsyati // RUnm_11.43 //
analyzed: nā evā uttaṃsaya mālatīḥ mama śiraḥ khedam bhareṇa āpsyati
atha kilakiñcitam
garva abhilāṣa rudita smita asūyā bhaya krudhām
saṅkarīkaraṇam harṣāt ucyate kilakiñcitam
yathā
mayā jāta ullāsam priya sahacarī locana pathe
balāt nyaste rādhā kuca mukulayoḥ pāṇi kamale
udañcat bhrū bhedam sa pulakam avaṣṭambhi valitam

original: smrāmy antas tasyāḥ smita-rudita-kānta-dyuti mukham // RUnm_11.45 //
analyzed: smrāmi antar tasyāḥ smita rudita kānta dyuti mukham
yathā vā dānakelikaumudyām
antar smera tayā ujjvalā jala kaṇa vyākīrṇa pakṣma aṅkurā
kiñcid pāṭalita añcalā rasikatā utsiktā puras kuñcatī
ruddhāyāḥ pathi mādhavena madhura vyābhugna tārā uttarā

original: rādhāyāḥ kilakiñcita-stavakinī dṛṣṭiḥ śriyaṃ vaḥ kriyāt // RUnm_11.46 //
analyzed: rādhāyāḥ kilakiñcita stavakinī dṛṣṭiḥ śriyam vaḥ kriyāt
atha moṭṭāyitam
kānta smaraṇa vārttā ādau hṛdi tad bhāva bhāvataḥ
prākaṭyam abhilāṣasya moṭṭāyitam udīryate
yathā

original: na brūte klama-bījam ālibhir alaṃ pṛṣṭāpi pālī yadā
analyzed: na brūte klama bījam ālibhiḥ alam pṛṣṭā api pālī yadā

original: cāturyeṇa tad-agratas tava kathā tābhis tadā prastutā /
analyzed: cāturyeṇa tad agratas tava kathā tābhiḥ tadā prastutā
tām pīta ambara jṛmbhamāṇa vadana ambhojā kṣaṇam śṛṇvatī

original: bimboṣṭhī pulakari viḍambitavatī phullāṃ kadamba-śriyam // RUnm_11.48 //
analyzed: bimboṣṭhī pulakari viḍambitavatī phullām kadamba śriyam
atha kuṭṭamitam

original: bahiḥ krodho vyathitavat proktaṃ kuṭṭamitaṃ budhaiḥ // RUnm_11.49 //
analyzed: bahis krodhaḥ vyathita vat proktam kuṭṭamitam budhaiḥ
yathā

original: karauddhatyaṃ hanta sthagaya kavarī me vighaṭate
analyzed: kara auddhatyam hanta sthagaya kavarī me vighaṭate

original: dukūlaṃ ca nyañcaty aghahara tavāstāṃ vihasitam /

original: kim ārabdhaḥ kartuṃ tam anavasare nirdaya madāt
analyzed: kim ārabdhaḥ kartum tam anavasare nirdaya madāt

original: patāmy eṣā pī̀ade vitara śayituṃ me kṣaṇam api // RUnm_11.50 //

yathā vā

analyzed: na bhrū latām kuṭilaya kṣipa nā eva hastam

original: vaktraṃ ca kaṇṭakita-gaṇḍam idaṃ na rundhi /

prīṇātu sundari tava adhara bandhujīve
pītvā madhuni madhure madhusūdnā usau
atha bibbokaḥ

original: bibboko māna-garvābhyāṃ syād abhīṣṭe'py anādaraḥ // RUnm_11.52 //
analyzed: bibbokaḥ māna garvābhyām syāt anādaraḥ

svīkāritām paśya śikhaṇḍamaulinā
śyāmā ati vāmā hṛdayaṅgamām api
srajam dara āghrāya nirāsa helayā
yathā vā

original: sphuraty agre tiṣṭhan sakhi tava mukha-ksipta-nayanaḥ
analyzed: sphurati agre tiṣṭhan sakhi tava
pratīkṣām kṛtvā ayam bhavat avasarasya agha damanaḥ

original: hasantīva kṣīve tvam iha vanamālāṃ racayasi // RUnm_11.54 //

na vṛthā adya su śikṣitām api
svayam adhyāpaya gauri śārikām
atha lalitam

original: sukumārā bhaved yatra lalitaṃ tad-udīritam // RUnm_11.56 //
analyzed: sukumārā bhavet yatra lalitam tat udīritam

original: sollāsaṃ pada-paṅkaje diśi diśi preṅkholayanty ujjvalā /

gandha ākṛṣṭa dhiyaḥ kareṇa mṛdunā vyādhunvatī ṣaṭpadān

original: rādhā nandati kuñja-kandara-taṭe vṛndāvana-śrīr iva // RUnm_11.57 //
analyzed: rādhā nandati kuñja kandara taṭe vṛndāvana śrīḥ iva
atha vikṛtam

original: vyajyate ceṣṭayaivedaṃ vikṛtaṃ tad vidur budhāḥ // RUnm_11.58 //

tatra hriyā yathā
niśamayya mukunda mad mukhā
atra sundarī
na girā abhinanda kintu sā
pulakena eva kapola śobhinā
yathā vā

original: stvam asi kulajā sādhvī vaktraṃ prasīda vivartaya /

analyzed: iti pathi mayā narmaṇi ukte hareḥ nava vīkṣaṇe

original: sadayam udayat-kārpaṇyaṃ mām avaikṣata rādhikā // RUnm_11.60 //

original: tad-vijñapti-samutsukāpi vijahau maunaṃ na sā māninī /

m iti mad uddhara jalpa vivṛttayā
bhrūkuṭi bhaṅguram arkasutā taṭe

alaṅkārāḥ nigaditāḥ viṃśatiḥ gātra citta jāḥ

original: amī yathocitaṃ jñeyā mādhave'pi manīṣibhiḥ // RUnm_11.63 //

original: kaiścid anye'py alaṅkārāḥ proktā nātra mayoditāḥ /

muneḥ a sammata tvena kintu dvitayam ucyate

original: maugdhyaṃ ca cakitaṃ ceti kiñcin mādhurya-poṣaṇāt // RUnm_11.64 //
analyzed: maugdhyam ca cakitam ca iti kiñcid mādhurya poṣaṇāt
tatra maugdhyam

original: jñātasyāpy ajñavat pṛcchā priyāgre maugdhyam īritam // RUnm_11.65 //
analyzed: jñātasya api ajña vat pṛcchā priya agre maugdhyam īritam
yathā muktācarite

original: kās tā latāḥ kva vā santi kena vā kila ropitāḥ /
analyzed: kāḥ tāḥ latāḥ kva vā santi kena vā kila ropitāḥ

original: nātha mat-kaṅkaṇa-nyastaṃ yāsāṃ muktāphalaṃ phalam // RUnm_11.66 //
analyzed: nātha mad kaṅkaṇa nyastam yāsām muktāphalam phalam
cakitam

original: priyāgre cakitaṃ bhīter asthāne'pi bhayaṃ mahat // RUnm_11.67 //
analyzed: priya agre cakitam bhīteḥ asthāne api bhayam mahat
yathā

dhāvati śravaṇa campakam mama
iti udīrya madhupāt viśaṅkitā
sasvaje hariṇa locanā harim
iti alaṅkāra vivṛtiḥ
atha udbhāsvarāḥ

original: udbhāsante svadhānīti proktā udbhāsvarā budhaiḥ // RUnm_11.69 //

analyzed: jṛmbhā ghrāṇasya phulla tvam niśvāsa ādyāḥ ca te matāḥ

yathā
nairañjanyam upeyatuḥ parigalat moda aśruṇī locane

original: yogautsukyam agād uraḥ sphurad iti prekṣyodayaṃ saṅgināṃ
analyzed: yoga autsukyam agāt uraḥ sphurat iti prekṣya udayam saṅginām

original: rādhe nīvir iyaṃ tava ślatha-guṇā śaṅke mumukṣāṃ dadhe // RUnm_11.71 //
analyzed: rādhe nīviḥ iyam tava ślatha guṇā śaṅke mumukṣām dadhe
uttarīya sraṃsanam yathā

original: tava hṛdi mama rāgāt ko'pi rāgo gariṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: tava hṛdi mama rāgāt kopi rāgaḥ gariṣṭhaḥ

original: sphurati tad apasṛtya vyaktam etaṃ karomi /
analyzed: sphurati tat apasṛtya vyaktam etam karomi

original: iti khalu hṛdayāt te rādhike rodhakāri
analyzed: iti khalu hṛdayāt te rādhike rodha kāri

original: cyutam iva purato me mañju māñjiṣṭha-vāsaḥ // RUnm_11.72 //
analyzed: cyutam iva puratas me mañju māñjiṣṭha vāsaḥ
dhammilla sraṃsanam yathā
sphurati muradviṣi puratas
durātmanām api vimukti de gauri
na adbhutam idam yadi īyuḥ
saṃyaminaḥ te kacāḥ muktim
gātra moṭanam yathā
vraja aṅgane vallava puṅgavasya
puras kuraṅgī nayanā sa līlam
api aṅga bhaṅgam kila kurvatī iya
manaṅga bhaṅgam tarasā vyatānīt
jṛmbhā yathā
puṣpaiḥ avetya viśikhaiḥ bhavatīm asādhyām
sādhvīm adhītya madanaḥ kila jṛmbhaṇa astrām

original: yad goṣṭha-sīmani muhuḥ sakhi jṛmbhase'dya // RUnm_11.75 //
analyzed: yat goṣṭha sīmani muhur sakhi jṛmbhasedya
ghrāṇa phulla tvam yathā
racita śikhara śobhā ārambham ambhoruha akṣī
śvasita pavana dolā āndolinā mauktikena

original: mama manasi vilagnā darśanād eva rādhā // RUnm_11.76 //
analyzed: mama manasi vilagnā darśanāt eva rādhā
yadi api ete viśeṣāḥ syuḥ moṭṭāyita vilāsayoḥ
śobhā viśeṣa poṣi tvāt tathā api pṛthak īritāḥ
atha vācikāḥ

original: ālāpaś ca vilāpaś ca saṃlāpaś ca pralāpakaḥ /
analyzed: ālāpaḥ ca vilāpaḥ ca saṃlāpaḥ ca pralāpakaḥ
anulāpa upalāpaḥ ca sandeśaḥ ca atideśakaḥ
apadeśa upadeśau ca nirdeśaḥ vyapadeśakaḥ
kīrtitāḥ vacana ārambhāḥ dvādaśā amī manīṣibhiḥ
tatra ālāpaḥ
yathā
kā strī aṅga te kala pada āyata mūrcchitena
sammohitā rya padavīm na calet trilokyām
trailokya saubhagam idam ca nirīkṣya rūpam
yat go dvija druma mṛgān pulakāni abibhrat
yathā vā vidagdhamādhave

original: kaṭhorā bhava mṛdvī vā prāṇās tvam asi rādhike /
analyzed: kaṭhorā bhava mṛdvī vā prāṇāḥ tvam asi rādhike

original: asti nānyā cakorasya candralekhāṃ vinā gatiḥ // RUnm_11.82 //
analyzed: asti nā anyā cakorasya candralekhām vinā gatiḥ
atha vilāpaḥ
vilāpaḥ duḥkha jam vacaḥ
yathā śrī daśame

original: paraṃ saukhyaṃ hi nairāśyaṃ svairiṇy apy āha piṅgalā /
analyzed: param saukhyam hi nairāśyam svairiṇī api āha piṅgalā

original: taj jānatīnāṃ naḥ kṛṣṇe tathāpy āśā duratyayā // RUnm_11.84 //
analyzed: tat jānatīnām naḥ kṛṣṇe tathā api āśā duratyayā
saṃlāpaḥ

original: uttiṣṭhārāt tarau me taruṇi mama taroḥ śaktir ārohaṇe kā
analyzed: uttiṣṭha ārāt tarau me taruṇi mama taroḥ śaktiḥ ārohaṇe kā

original: sākṣād ākhyāmi mugdhe taraṇim iha raver ākhyayā kā ratir me /
analyzed: sākṣāt ākhyāmi mugdhe taraṇim iha raveḥ ākhyayā kā ratiḥ me

original: vārteyaṃ nau-prasaṅge katham api bhavitā nāvayoḥ saṅgamārthā
analyzed: vārtā iyam nau prasaṅge katham api bhavitā na āvayoḥ saṅgama arthā

original: vārtāpīti smitāsyaṃ jita-girim ajitaṃ rādhayārādhayāmi // RUnm_11.86 //
analyzed: vārtāpi iti smita āsyam jita girim ajitam rādhayā ārādhayāmi
pralāpaḥ
vyartha ālāpaḥ pralāpaḥ syāt

original: hare bhavantaṃ lalitā litā litā // RUnm_11.88 //
analyzed: hare bhavantam lalitā litā litā
anulāpaḥ
anulāpaḥ muhur vacaḥ

yathā lalitamādhave

atra cintā marṣayoḥ
atha śāvalyam
yathā vidagdhamādhave

mṛdula latā nava pallavam daśantam

atha viṣayāḥ

original: tasyāḥ pārśve gurubhir abhitas tvat-prasaṅgo nyavāri /
analyzed: tasyāḥ pārśve gurubhiḥ abhitas tvad prasaṅgaḥ nyavāri

original: śrutvā dūre tad api bhavataḥ sā tulā-koṭi-nādaṃ
analyzed: śrutvā dūre tat api bhavataḥ sā tulā koṭi nādam

original: hā kṛṣṇety aśruta-caram api vyāharanty unmadāsīt // RUnm_14.54 //
analyzed: hā kṛṣṇā iti aśruta caram api vyāharantī unmadā āsīt
sambhoga icchā viśeṣaḥ usyāḥ rateḥ jātu na bhidyate

original: ity asyāṃ kṛṣṇa-saukhyārtham eva kevalam udyamaḥ // RUnm_14.55 //
analyzed: iti asyām kṛṣṇa saukhya artham eva kevalam udyamaḥ

original: pūrvasyāṃ sva-sukhāyāpi kadācit tatra sambhavet // RUnm_14.56 //
analyzed: pūrvasyām sva sukhāya api kadācid tatra sambhavet

original: iyam eva ratiḥ prauḍhā mahābhāva-daśāṃ vrajet /
analyzed: iyam eva ratiḥ prauḍhā mahābhāva daśām vrajet

original: yā mṛgyā syād vimuktānāṃ bhaktānāṃ ca varīyasām // RUnm_14.57 //
analyzed: yā mṛgyā syāt vimuktānām bhaktānām ca varīyasām
yathā śrī daśame
etāḥ param tanubhṛtaḥ bhuvi gopa vadhvaḥ
govinde eva nikhila ātmani rūḍha bhāvāḥ

original: vāñchanti yad bhava-bhiyo munayo vayaṃ ca
analyzed: vāñchanti yat bhava bhiyaḥ munayaḥ vayam ca
kim brahma janmabhiḥ ananta kathā rasasya

original: syād dṛḍheyaṃ ratiḥ premā prodyan snehaḥ kramād ayam /
analyzed: syāt dṛḍhā iyam ratiḥ premā prodyan snehaḥ kramāt ayam

original: syān mānaḥ praṇayo rāgo'nurāgo bhāva ity api // RUnm_14.59 //
analyzed: syāt mānaḥ praṇayaḥ rāgaḥ anurāgaḥ bhāvaḥ iti api

original: bījam ikṣuḥ sa ca rasaḥ sa guḍaḥ khaṇḍa eva saḥ /
analyzed: bījam ikṣuḥ sa ca rasaḥ sa guḍaḥ khaṇḍaḥ eva saḥ

original: sa śarkarā sitā sā ca sā yathā syāt sitopalā // RUnm_14.60 //
analyzed: sa śarkarā sitā sā ca sā yathā syāt sitopalā

original: ataḥ prema-vilāsāḥ syur bhāvāḥ snehādayas tu ṣaṭ /
analyzed: atas prema vilāsāḥ syuḥ bhāvāḥ sneha ādayaḥ tu ṣaṭ
prāyas prema śabdena sūribhiḥ
yasyāḥ yādṛśa jātīyaḥ kṛṣṇe prema abhyudañcati

original: tasyāṃ tādṛśa-jātīyaḥ sa kṛṣṇasyāpy udīyate // RUnm_14.62 //
analyzed: tasyām tādṛśa jātīyaḥ sa kṛṣṇasya api udīyate
tatra premā
sarvathā dhvaṃsa rahitam sati api dhvaṃsa kāraṇe

original: yad-bhāva-bandhanaṃ yūnoḥ sa premā parikīrtitaḥ // RUnm_14.63 //
analyzed: yat bhāva bandhanam yūnoḥ sa premā parikīrtitaḥ
yathā
śape tubhyam dharma sthiti manyu sarantyā sakhi mayā

original: viśuddhām ugrābhir muhur api nirasto bhaṇitibhiḥ /
analyzed: viśuddhām ugrābhiḥ muhur api nirastaḥ bhaṇitibhiḥ

original: sa mugdhe śyāmātmā tyajati na hi me vartma bata māṃ
analyzed: sa mugdhe śyāma ātmā tyajati na hi me vartma bata mām
jagāra āpad ghorā viracayatu śāstim gṛhapatiḥ
yathā vā
rādhāyāḥ sakhi sat guṇaiḥ anudinam rūpa anurāga ādibhiḥ
sāndrām labdhavatoḥ api vyasani tām vyākṣipta kāntā antaraiḥ

original: prāpa kvāpi parasparopari yayor na mlānatāṃ yas tayo-
analyzed: prāpa kvāpi paraspara upari yayoḥ na mlāna tām yaḥ tayoḥ

original: staṃ candrāvali-candrakābharaṇayoḥ ko vetti bhāva-kramam // RUnm_14.65 //
analyzed: stam candra āvali candraka ābharaṇayoḥ kaḥ vetti bhāva kramam
sa tridhā kathyate prauḍha madhya manda prabhedataḥ
tatra prauḍhaḥ
vilamba ādibhiḥ ajñāta cittavṛttau priye jane

original: itara-kleśa-kārī yaḥ sa premā prauḍha ucyate // RUnm_14.67 //
analyzed: itara kleśa kārī yaḥ sa premā prauḍhaḥ ucyate
yathā

original: gatvā brūhi nikuñja-sadmani sakhe khinnāṃ mama preyasīṃ
analyzed: gatvā brūhi nikuñja sadmani sakhe khinnām mama preyasīm

original: mā kālātyayam ākalayya kamale mayy apratītiṃ kṛthāḥ /
analyzed: mā kāla atyayam ākalayya kamale mayi apratītim kṛthāḥ

original: duṣṭaṃ dānavam atra gokula-śiraḥ-śūlaṃ cikitsann ahaṃ
analyzed: duṣṭam dānavam atra gokula śiraḥ śūlam cikitsan aham

original: drāg eṣa praṇayena pallava-mayīṃ labdho'smi śayyāṃ tava // RUnm_14.68 //
analyzed: drāk eṣa praṇayena pallava mayīm labdhaḥ asmi śayyām tava
atha madhyaḥ

original: itarānubhavāpekṣāṃ sahate yaḥ sa madhyamaḥ // RUnm_14.69 //
analyzed: itara anubhava apekṣām sahate yaḥ sa madhyamaḥ
yathā
sarva ārambha manoharām sapadi me candrāvalīm
raṅgaḥ śārada śarvarī samucitaḥ paryāptim evā āyayau
tām kandarpa camū camatkṛti kara krīḍā ūrmi kirmīritām

original: rādhāṃ hanta tathāpi cittam adhunā sākṣān mamāpekṣate // RUnm_14.70 //
analyzed: rādhām hanta tathā api cittam adhunā sākṣāt mama apekṣate
atha mandaḥ

original: sadā paricitatvādeḥ karoty atyantikāt tu yaḥ /
analyzed: sadā paricita tva ādeḥ karoti atyantikāt tu yaḥ

original: naivopekṣāṃ na cāpekṣāṃ sa premā manda ucyate // RUnm_14.71 //
analyzed: na eva upekṣām na ca apekṣām sa premā mandaḥ ucyate
yathā

original: anumīya rūḍhamānām ānaya bhāmāṃ sakhīm aśoka-latām /
analyzed: anumīya rūḍha mānām ānaya bhāmām sakhīm aśoka latām

original: bhavati premavatīnāṃ manāg upekṣāpi doṣāya // RUnm_14.72 //
analyzed: bhavati premavatīnām manāk upekṣā api doṣāya
athavā

original: prauḍhaḥ premā sa yatra syād viśleṣasyāsahiṣṇutā // RUnm_14.73 //
analyzed: prauḍhaḥ premā sa yatra syāt viśleṣasya a sahiṣṇu tā
yathā uddhava sandeśe

original: nirmāya tvaṃ vitara phalakam hāri kaṃsārimūrtyā
analyzed: nirmāya tvam vitara phalakam hāri kaṃsāri mūrtyā

original: vāraṃ vāraṃ diśasi yadi māṃ mānanirvāhanāya /
analyzed: vāram vāram diśasi yadi mām māna nirvāhanāya
yat paśyantī bhavana kuhare ruddha karṇa antarā aham

original: sāhaṃkārā priyasakhi sukham yāpayiṣyāmi yāmam // RUnm_14.74 //
analyzed: sa ahaṃkārā priya sakhi sukham yāpayiṣyāmi yāmam

original: kṛcchrāt sahiṣṇutā yatra sa tu madhyama ucyate // RUnm_14.75 //
analyzed: kṛcchrāt sahiṣṇu tā yatra sa tu madhyamaḥ ucyate
yathā

original: avitatham asau kiṃ drāghīyān gamiṣyati vāsaraḥ
analyzed: avitatham asau kim drāghīyān gamiṣyati vāsaraḥ

original: sumukhi sa niśārambhaḥ kiṃvā sameṣyati maṅgalaḥ /
analyzed: su mukhi sa niśā ārambhaḥ kiṃvā sameṣyati maṅgalaḥ
smita mukha śaśī godhūlibhiḥ karambita kuntalaḥ

original: kṣapayati dṛśām ārtiṃ yatra vrajeśvara-nandanaḥ // RUnm_14.76 //
analyzed: kṣapayati dṛśām ārtim yatra vrajeśvara nandanaḥ

original: sa mandaḥ kathito yatra bhavet kutrāpi vismṛtiḥ // RUnm_14.77 //
analyzed: sa mandaḥ kathitaḥ yatra bhavet kutra api vismṛtiḥ
yathā
pratipakṣa jana īrṣyayā na me
smṛtiḥ āsīt vanamālya gumphane
sakhi kim karavai gavām puras
ghana hambā dhvaniḥ eṣa jṛmbhate
atha snehaḥ
āruhya paramām kāṣṭhām premā cit dīpa dīpanaḥ

original: hṛdayaṃ drāvayann eṣa sneha ity abhidhīyate /
analyzed: hṛdayam drāvayan eṣa snehaḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: atrodite bhavej jātu na tṛptir darśanādiṣu // RUnm_14.79 //
analyzed: atrā udite bhavet jātu na tṛptiḥ darśana ādiṣu
yathā kramadīpikāyām
tat ati madhura rūpa kamra śobhā
mṛta rasa pāna vidhāna lālasābhyām
praṇaya salila pūra vāhinīnām
alasa vilola vilocana ambujābhyām
yathā vā
jyotsna śīdhum hari mukha vidhoḥ api analpam pibantau

original: nāntas tṛptiṃ tava katham api prāpnuto dṛk-cakorau /
analyzed: nā antar tṛptim tava katham api prāpnutaḥ dṛś cakorau

original: āghūrṇantau mada-kalatayā suṣṭhu mugdhau yad etau
analyzed: āghūrṇantau madaka latayā suṣṭhu mugdhau yat etau

original: bhūyo bhūyas tam iha vamato bāṣpa-pūra-cchalena // RUnm_14.81 //
analyzed: bhūyas bhūyas tam iha vamataḥ bāṣpa pūra chalena

original: aṅga-saṅge viloke ca śravaṇādau ca sa kramāt /
analyzed: aṅga saṅge viloke ca śravaṇa ādau ca sa kramāt

original: kaniṣṭho madhyamaḥ śreṣṭhas trividho'yaṃ manodravaḥ // RUnm_14.82 //
analyzed: kaniṣṭhaḥ madhyamaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ trividhaḥ yam manaḥ dravaḥ
tatra aṅgasaṅge yathā
asi ghana rasa rūpaḥ tvam pālī lāvaṇya sāra maya mūrtiḥ

original: mādhava bhavad-āśleṣe bhavitā nāsyāḥ kathaṃ dravatā // RUnm_14.83 //
analyzed: mādhava bhavat āśleṣe bhavitā na asyāḥ katham drava tā
viloke yathā

original: asyās tvad-vadane saroja-suhṛdi vyaktiṃ purastād gate
analyzed: asyāḥ tvad vadane saroja suhṛdi vyaktim purastāt gate
na āścaryam drava tām avindata manaḥ haiyaṅgavīnam yadi

original: kintv āścaryam idaṃ mukunda milite śyāmā-mukhendau bhava-
analyzed: kintu āścaryam idam mukunda milite śyāmā mukha indau bhava

original: ccetaś candra-maṇir dravan jalatayā bhūyo babhūvācalaḥ // RUnm_14.84 //
analyzed: ccetaḥ candramaṇiḥ dravan jala tayā bhūyas babhūva acalaḥ
śravaṇe yathā
śruti parisara kakṣām yāti nāmnaḥ tava ardhe
muradamana dṛś ambhā udārayā dhauta gātrī

original: skhalati kuvalayākṣī jṛmbhate stambhate ca // RUnm_14.85 //
analyzed: skhalati kuvalayākṣī jṛmbhate stambhate ca
ādi śabdena smaraṇe yathā
kṛṣṇavartmani kṛta abhiniveśaḥ
sāmprataḥ tvam asi kampita gātrī
sneha pūra paripāka mayam te

original: kiṃ bhaviṣyati mano na vilīnam // RUnm_14.86 //
analyzed: kim bhaviṣyati manaḥ na vilīnam

original: sa ghṛtaṃ madhu cetyuktaṃ sneho dvedhā svarūpataḥ // RUnm_14.87 //
analyzed: sa ghṛtam madhu ca iti uktam snehaḥ dvedhā svarūpataḥ
tatra ghṛta snehaḥ
ātyantika ādara mayaḥ snehaḥ ghṛtam iti īryate

original: bhāvāntarānvitao gacchan svādodrekaṃ na tu svayam /
analyzed: gacchan svāda udrekam na tu svayam
ghanībhavet nisarga ati śītalāt mithas ādarāt

original: gāḍhādaramayas tena snehaḥ syād ghṛtavad ghṛtam // RUnm_14.89 //
analyzed: gāḍha ādara mayaḥ tena snehaḥ syāt ghṛta vat ghṛtam
yathā
abhutthāya vidūrataḥ madhubhñdā yā āśliṣyate sādaram

original: yā snehena vaśīkaroti guruṇā pāvitrya-pūrṇena tam /
analyzed: yā snehena vaśīkaroti guruṇā pāvitrya pūrṇena tam

original: kṣipraṃ yāti sitopaleva vilayaṃ tat-keli-vṛṣṭyā ca yā
analyzed: kṣipram yāti sitopalā iva vilayam tad keli vṛṣṭyā ca yā

original: yuktā hanta kayopamātum api sā candrāvalī me sakhī // RUnm_14.90 //
analyzed: yuktā hanta kayā upamātum api sā candrāvalī me sakhī
yathā vā
nijam agharipuṇā aṃse nyastam ākṛṣya savyam
bhujam iha nidadhānā dakṣam asra ukṣita akṣī
pada yugam api baṅkam śaṅkayā vikṣipantī
prati yuvati vayasyām smerayāmāsa gaurī
ādaraḥ gaurava utthaḥ syāt iti anyonya āśrita dvayam

original: ratyādau sad api snehe suvyaktatvād ihocyate // RUnm_14.92 //
analyzed: rati ādau sat api snehe su vyakta tvāt iha ucyate
svayam prakaṭa mādhuryaḥ nānā rasa samāhṛtiḥ
matta toṣma dharaḥ snehaḥ madhu sāmyāt madhu ucyate
yathā

original: rādhā snehamayena hanta racitā mādhurya-sāreṇa sā
analyzed: rādhā sneha mayena hanta racitā mādhurya sāreṇa sā

original: saudhīva pratimā ghanāpy uru-guṇair bhāvoṣmaṇā vidrutā /
analyzed: saudhī iva pratimā ghanā api uru guṇaiḥ bhāva ūṣmaṇā vidrutā

original: yan-nāmany api dhāmani śravaṇayor yāti prasaṅgena me
analyzed: yad nāmani api dhāmani śravaṇayoḥ yāti prasaṅgena me

original: sāndrānandamayī bhavaty anupamā sadyo jagad-vismṛti // RUnm_14.95 //
analyzed: sāndra ānanda mayī bhavati anupamā sadyas jagat vismṛti
atha mānaḥ
snehaḥ tu utkṛṣṭa tā avāptyā mādhuryam mānayan navam

original: yo dhārayaty adākṣiṇyaṃ sa māna iti kīrtyate // RUnm_14.96 //
analyzed: yaḥ dhārayati a dākṣiṇyam sa mānaḥ iti kīrtyate
yathā
sravat asra bhare kṛte dṛśau me
tava godhūlibhiḥ eva gopa vīra
adhunā vadana anilaiḥ kim
rvirama iti bhrūkuṭim babhāra su bhrūḥ

original: udātto lalitaś ceti māno'yaṃ dvividho mataḥ // RUnm_14.98 //
analyzed: udāttaḥ lalitaḥ ca iti mānaḥ yam dvividhaḥ mataḥ
tatra udāttaḥ
udāttaḥ syāt ghṛta snehaḥ dhārayan gahana kramam
dākṣiṇya bhāga dākṣiṇyam vāmya gandham ca kutracid
tatra dākṣiṇya udāttaḥ yathā

original: rādheti skhilābhidhe mayi haṭhād biddhāntarāpy ārtibhir
analyzed: rādhā iti skhila abhidhe mayi haṭhāt biddha antarā api ārtibhiḥ
mad vailakṣya śamāya sā dvi guṇayantī āsya aravinde smitam

original: jalpe ca mradimānubiddham adhikaṃ mādhuryam ātanvatī
analyzed: jalpe ca mradima anubiddham adhikam mādhuryam ātanvatī
citrāṇi iva cakāra mad priya suhṛd vṛnāni candrāvalī
atha vā amya gandha udāttaḥ
yathā śrī viṣṇupurāṇe
kācid bhrū bhaṅguram kṛtvā lalāṭa phalakam harim
vilokya netra bhṛṅgābhyām papau tad mukha paṅkajam
yathā vā
akṣa saṃsadi jitā api mṛga akṣī
mādhavena parirambha paṇena
bhugna dṛṣṭiḥ iha vipratipannām
tam karaṇe rurudhe pariripsum
atha lalitaḥ
madhusnehaḥ tu kauṭilyam svātantrya hṛdayaṅgamam
bibhran narma viśeṣam ca udīryate
tatra kauṭilya lalito
yathā śrī daśame
ekā bhrū kuṭim ābaddhya prema saṃrambha vihvalā
ghnatī iva aikṣat sandaṣṭa daśanacchadā
yathā vā
adatta me vartmani manmatha unmadā
svayaṃgraha āśleṣam asau sakhī tava
iti uktavantam kuṭilībhavat mukhī
kṛṣṇam vataṃsena jaghāna maṅgalā
yathā vā
citram cira sparśa sukhāya cucuke
kurvantam akṣipram iyam cala īkṣaṇā
svinna aṅgulīkam pulaka āñcita śriyā
savyena cikṣepa kucena keśavam
atha narmalalito
yathā dāna kelikaumudyām

original: mithyā jalpatu te kathaṃ nu rasanā sādhvī-sahasrasya yā
analyzed: mithyā jalpatu te katham nu rasanā sādhvī sahasrasya yā
bimba uṣṭha amṛta sevanāt agharipo puṇyā prayatnāt abhūt

original: kasmād eva balṃt-karotu ca karaḥ soḍhuṃ kṣamaḥ subhruvāṃ
analyzed: kasmāt eva ca karaḥ soḍhum kṣamaḥ subhruvām

original: raktaḥ suṣṭhu na nIvi-bandham api yaḥ kā vānya-bandhe kathā // RUnm_14.107 //
analyzed: raktaḥ suṣṭhu na nivibandham api yaḥ kā vā anya bandhe kathā
atha praṇayaḥ

original: māno dadhāno viśrambhaṃ praṇayaḥ procyate budhaiḥ // RUnm_14.108 //
analyzed: mānaḥ dadhānaḥ viśrambham praṇayaḥ procyate budhaiḥ
yathā
kuca upānte spṛṣṭā muravijayinā tad bhuja śira
stiras nyasta grīvā bhruvam anṛju dṛṣṭiḥ vibhujatī
paṭena asya mlānīkṛta puraṭa bhāsā pulakinī

original: pramodāsrair dhautaṃ nija-mukham iyaṃ mārṣṭi sumukhī // RUnm_14.109 //
analyzed: pramoda asraiḥ dhautam nija mukham iyam mārṣṭi su mukhī
svarūpam praṇayasya asya viśrambhaḥ kathitaḥ budhaiḥ

original: viśrambho'pi dvidhā maitraṃ sakhyaṃ ceti nigadyate // RUnm_14.110 //
analyzed: viśrambhaḥ api dvidhā maitram sakhyam ca iti nigadyate
tatra maitram

original: bhāvajñaiḥ procyate maitraṃ viśrambho vinayānvitaḥ // RUnm_14.111 //
analyzed: bhāva jñaiḥ procyate maitram viśrambhaḥ vinaya anvitaḥ
yathā śrī daśame
kācid kara ambujam śaureḥ jagṛhe iñjalinām mudā

original: kācid dadhāra tad-bāhum aṃse candana-rūṣitam // RUnm_14.112 //
analyzed: kācid dadhāra tad bāhum aṃse candana rūṣitam
yathā vā
na hi saṅkuca paṅkaja īkṣaṇaḥ
pādayoḥ te nidadhātu nūpurau
anayoḥ dhvanibhiḥ vilajjatām
kalahaṃsī iva vipakṣa kāminī
atha sakhyam
visrambham sādhvasa unmuktaḥ sakhyam sva vaśa tā mayaḥ
yathā
sarabhasam adhi kaṇṭham arpitābhyām
danuja ripoḥ nija bāhu vallarībhyām
niṭilam avanamayya tasya karṇe

original: sakhi kathitaṃ kim iva tvayā rahasyam // RUnm_14.115 //
analyzed: sakhi kathitam kim iva tvayā rahasyam
yathā vā śrī viṣṇupurāṇe

original: yadi te tad-vacaḥ satyaṃ satyātyarthaṃ priyeti me /
analyzed: yadi te tat vacaḥ satyam satya atyartham priya iti me
mad geha niṣkuṭa arthāya tadā ayam nīyatām taruḥ
yathā vā
vinyasya vakṣoruha koraka dvayīm
vakṣaḥ sthale kaṃsaharasya hāriṇīm

original: likhaty asau candra-mukhī sakhī mama // RUnm_14.117 //
analyzed: likhati asau candra mukhī sakhī mama
yathā vā śrī daśame

original: tato gatvā vanoddeśe dṛptā keśavam abravīt /
analyzed: tatas gatvā vana uddeśe dṛptā keśavam abravīt

original: na pāraye'haṃ calituṃ naya māṃ yatra te manaḥ // RUnm_14.118 //
analyzed: na pāraya iham calitum naya mām yatra te manaḥ

original: janitvā praṇayaḥ snehāt kutracin mānatāṃ vrajet /
analyzed: janitvā praṇayaḥ snehāt kutracid māna tām vrajet

original: snehān mānaḥ kvacid bhūtvā praṇayatvam athāśnute // RUnm_14.119 //
analyzed: snehāt mānaḥ kvacid bhūtvā praṇaya tvam atha aśnute
atas praṇayamānayoḥ

original: ity atra pṛthag evāsau viśrambhodāhṛtiḥ kṛtā // RUnm_14.120 //
analyzed: iti atra pṛthak evā asau viśrambha udāhṛtiḥ kṛtā
udātta lalitābhyām tu maitrī asakhye
dve sumaitrī asusakhī ākhye yathāsaṅkhyam udīrite
tatra sumaitryam
ālīpuraḥ kathayitum rajanī rahasyam
tatra udyate madhuripau mṛdulā bhramat bhrūḥ
utkṣipya tat mukha puṭa āvaraṇāya hastam
nyañcat mukhī samavariṣṭa punar vara akṣī
yathā vā
kṣipte varṇaka bhājane taraṇijā pure parīhāsataḥ

original: kṛṣṇena bhruvam āracayya kuṭilām ālokayantī tiraḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣṇena bhruvam āracayya kuṭilām ālokayantī tiras
tārā vakṣasi citram ardha likhitam śrīvatsa vibhrājite

original: kāśmīreṇa ghana-śriyā nija-kucākṛṣṭena pūrṇaṃ vyadhāt // RUnm_14.123 //
analyzed: kāśmīreṇa ghana śriyā nija kuca ākṛṣṭena pūrṇam vyadhāt
atha su sakhyam
dyūte sakṛt pāna vidhau paṇīkṛte
jitvā dvis oṣṭham pibati svam acyute
babandha kaṇṭhe kuṭilīkṛta īkṣaṇā
tam vāmayā dos latayā asya vallavī
yathā vā
āviṣkurvati visphurat nava nakha ullekham sva vakṣaḥ taṭam
kṛṣṇe pīta dukūla saṅkalanayā smitvā sakhīnām puras

original: abhraśyāmam uro rurodha valita-bhrūr ānanaṃ dhunvatī
analyzed: abhra śyāmam uraḥ rurodha valita bhrūḥ ānanam dhunvatī
romāñca udgama kañcukena kucayoḥ dvandvena gāndharvikā
atha rāgaḥ

original: duḥkham apy adhikaṃ citte sukhatvenaiva rajyate /
analyzed: duḥkham api adhikam citte sukha tvena eva rajyate

original: yatas tu praṇayotkarṣāt sa rāga iti kīrtyate // RUnm_14.126 //
analyzed: yatas tu praṇaya utkarṣāt sa rāgaḥ iti kīrtyate
yathā
tīvra arka dyuti dīpitaiḥ asi latā dhārā karāla asribhiḥ
r mārtaṇḍa upala maṇḍalaiḥ adreḥ taṭe tasthuṣī
paśyanti paśupa indra nandanam asau indīvaraiḥ āstṛte

original: talpe nyasta-padāmbujeva muditā na spandate rādhikā // RUnm_14.127 //
analyzed: talpe nyasta pada ambujā iva muditā na spandate rādhikā
yathā vā padyāvalyām
tārā abhisāraka caturtha niśā śaśāṅka
kāma amburāśi parivardhana deva tubhyam

original: argho namo bhavatu me saha tena yūnā
analyzed: arghaḥ namaḥ bhavatu me saha tena yūnā
mithyā apavāda vacasā api abhimāna siddhiḥ

original: nīlimā raktimā ceti rāgo'yaṃ dvividho mataḥ // RUnm_14.129 //
analyzed: nīlimā raktimā ca iti rāgaḥ ayam dvividhaḥ mataḥ
tatra nīlimā

original: nīlī-śyāmābhavo rāgo nīlimā kathyate budhaiḥ // RUnm_14.130 //

analyzed: tatra nīlī rāgaḥ
vyaya sambhāvanā hīnaḥ bahis na ati prakāśavān
yathā avalokyate ca eṣa candra āvali mukundayoḥ
yathā
prasanna viśada āśayā vividha mudrayā nirmitam

original: pratāraṇam api tvayā guṇatayā sadā gṛhṇatī /
analyzed: pratāraṇam api tvayā guṇa tayā sadā gṛhṇatī
tathā vyavajahāra sā vraja kula indra candrāvalī

original: sakhībhir api tarkitā tvayi yathā taṭasthety asau // RUnm_14.132 //
analyzed: sakhībhiḥ api tarkitā tvayi yathā taṭa sthā iti asau
atha śyāmā rāgaḥ

original: yaś cireṇaiva sādhyaḥ syāt sa śyāmā-rāga ucyate // RUnm_14.133 //
analyzed: yaḥ cireṇa eva sādhyaḥ syāt sa śyāmārāgaḥ ucyate
yathā
purā kuñje mañjuni cakitā

original: murārer yā pārśve na taruṇi divāpy antaram agāt /
analyzed: murāreḥ yā pārśve na taruṇi divā api antaram agāt
tamālaiḥ sā eva adya dvi guṇita tamisrā ipi muditā

original: tamisrārdhe māniny ahaha bhavatī taṃ mṛgayate // RUnm_14.134 //
analyzed: tamisrā ardhe māninī ahaha bhavatī tam mṛgayate
atha raktimā
tatra kusumbha rāgaḥ

original: kusumbha-rāgaḥ sa jñeyo yaś citte sajjati drutam /
analyzed: kusumbharāgaḥ sa jñeyaḥ yaḥ citte sajjati drutam
anya rāga chavi vyañjī śobhate ca yathocitam
yathā

original: tvayy eva śravaṇāvadhi priya-sakhī yā kṛṣṇa-baddhāntarā
analyzed: tvayi eva śravaṇa avadhi priya sakhī yā kṛṣṇa baddha antarā
yā dṛṣṭe bhujage ipi tāvaka bhuja asāmyāt pramoda unmadā

original: prekṣya tvāṃ purato'dya kām api daśāṃ prātāsti seyaṃ tathā
analyzed: prekṣya tvām puratas udya kām api daśām prātar asti sā iyam tathā

original: na jñāyeta yathā kim eṣa balavān rāgo virāgo'thavā // RUnm_14.137 //
analyzed: na jñāyeta yathā kim eṣa balavān rāgaḥ
sat ādhāra viśeṣeṣu kausumbhaḥ api sthiraḥ bhavet

original: iti kṛṣṇa-praṇayiṣu mlānir asya na yujyate // RUnm_14.138 //
analyzed: iti kṛṣṇa praṇayiṣu mlāniḥ asya na yujyate
atha mañjiṣṭha rāgaḥ
a hārya ūna anya sāpekṣaḥ yaḥ kāntyā varddhate sadā
bhavet māñjiṣṭha rāgā usau rādhā mādhavayoḥ yathā
yathā

original: dhatte drāg anupādhi janma vidhinā kenāpi nākampate
analyzed: dhatte drāk anupādhi janma vidhinā kena api nā ākampate

original: sūte'ty āhita-sañcayair api rasaṃ te cen mitho vartmane /
analyzed: sūta iti āhita sañcayaiḥ api rasam te ced mithas vartmane
ṛddhim sañcinute camatkṛti kara uddāma pramoda uttarām
rādhā mādhavayoḥ ayam nirupamaḥ prema anubandha utsavaḥ
yathā vā vidagdhamādhave

original: mayā te nirbandhān murajayini rāgaḥ parihṛtya
analyzed: mayā te nirbandhāt mura jayini rāgaḥ parihṛtya

original: mayi snigdhe kintu prathaya paramāśīs tatim imām /
analyzed: mayi snigdhe kintu prathaya parama āśīḥ tatim imām
mukha āmoda udgāra grahila matiḥ adyā eva hi yatas
pradoṣa ārambhe syām vimala vanamālā madhukarī

original: pūrva-pūrvas tu yo bhāvaḥ somābhādau sa rājate /
analyzed: pūrva pūrvaḥ tu yaḥ bhāvaḥ soma ābha ādau sa rājate

original: tathā bhīṣma-sutādau ca śrī-harer mahiṣī-gaṇe // RUnm_14.142 //
analyzed: tathā bhīṣma suta ādau ca śrī hareḥ mahiṣī gaṇe

original: ya uttarottaro dviyo rādhikādau sa dīvyati /
analyzed: yaḥ uttarottaraḥ rādhikā ādau sa dīvyati

original: tathā śrī-satyabhāmāyāṃ lakṣmaṇāyām api kvacit // RUnm_14.143 //
analyzed: tathā śrī satyabhāmāyām lakṣmaṇāyām api kvacid
ittham bhedena bhāvānām sarva gokula subhruvām
ātma pakṣa vipakṣa ādi bhedāḥ pūrvam udīritāḥ

original: aparā api bhāvānāṃ jñeyās tāḥ prajñayā budhaiḥ // RUnm_14.145 //
analyzed: aparāḥ api bhāvānām jñeyāḥ tāḥ prajñayā budhaiḥ
atha anurāgaḥ

original: sadānubhūtam api yaḥ kuryān nava-navaṃ priyam /
analyzed: sadā anubhūtam api yaḥ kuryāt nava navam priyam

original: rāgo bhavan nava-navaḥ so'nurāga itīryate // RUnm_14.146 //
analyzed: rāgaḥ bhavat nava navaḥ saḥ anurāgaḥ iti īryate
yathā dāna kelikaumudyām
prapannaḥ panthānam hariḥ asakṛt asmad nayanayoḥ

original: apūrvo'yaṃ pūrvaṃ kvacid api na dṛṣṭo madhurimā /
analyzed: apūrvaḥ iyam pūrvam kvacid api na dṛṣṭaḥ madhurimā

original: pratīke'py ekasya sphurati muhur aṅgasya sakhi yā
analyzed: pratīkepī ekasya sphurati muhur aṅgasya sakhi yā

original: śriyas tasyāḥ pātuṃ lavam api samarthā na dṛg iyam // RUnm_14.147 //
analyzed: śriyaḥ tasyāḥ pātum lavam api samarthā na dṛś iyam
yathā vā

original: ko'yaṃ kṛṣṇa iti vyudasyati dhṛti yas tanvi karṇaṃ viśan
analyzed: kaḥ uyam kṛṣṇaḥ iti vyudasyati dhṛti yaḥ tanvi karṇam viśan

original: rāgāndhe kim idaṃ sadaiva bhavatī tasyorasi krīḍati /
analyzed: rāga andhe kim idam sadā eva bhavatī tasya urasi krīḍati

original: hāsyaṃ mā kuru mohite tvam adhunā nyastāsya haste mayā
analyzed: hāsyam mā kuru mohite tvam adhunā nyastā asya haste mayā

original: satyaṃ satyam asau dṛgaṅganam agād adyaivaa vidyun-nibhaḥ // RUnm_14.148 //
analyzed: satyam satyam asau dṛś aṅganam agāt vidyut nibhaḥ
paraspara vaśībhāvaḥ prema vaicittyakam tathā
aprāṇini api janma āptau lālasa ābharaḥ unnataḥ

original: vipralambhe'sya visphūrtir ity ādyāḥ syur iha kriyāḥ // RUnm_14.149 //
analyzed: vipralambha isya visphūrtiḥ iti ādyāḥ syuḥ iha kriyāḥ
atra paraspara vaśībhāvaḥ yathā
samārambham pārasparika vijayāya
ra pūrvā kā iyam vām agha damana saṃrambha laharī

original: mano-hastī bandhas tava yad anayā rāga-nigaḍai-
analyzed: manaḥ hastī bandhaḥ tava yat anayā rāga nigaḍaiḥ
asyāḥ prema utsava nava guṇaiḥ citta hariṇaḥ

original: prema-vaicittya-saṃjñas tu vipralambhaḥ sa kathyate // RUnm_14.151 //
analyzed: prema vaicittya saṃjñaḥ tu vipralambhaḥ sa kathyate
aprāṇinī api janma lālasā bharo
yathā dāna kelikaumudyām
tapasyāmah kṣāmodari varayitum venuṣu januḥ

original: vareṇyam manyethāḥ sakhi tad akhilānāṃ sujanuṣām /
analyzed: vareṇyam manyethāḥ sakhi tat akhilānām su januṣām
tapaḥ stomena uccais yat iyam urarñkṛtya muralī

atha vipralambhe visphūrtiḥ yathā

original: brūyās tvaṃ mathurādhvanīna mathurānāthaṃ tam ity uccakaiḥ
analyzed: brūyāḥ tvam mathurā adhvanīna mathurā nātham tam iti uccakais

original: sandeśaṃ vraja-sundarī kam api te kācin mayā prāhiṇot /

original: tatra kṣmāpati-pattane yadi gataḥ svacchanda gacchādhunā
analyzed: tatra kṣmāpati pattane yadi gataḥ svacchanda gaccha adhunā

original: kiṃ kliṣṭām api visphuran diśi diśi kliśnāsi hā me sakhīm // RUnm_14.153 //
analyzed: kim kliṣṭām api visphuran diśi diśi kliśnāsi hā me sakhīm
atha bhāvaḥ
