original: yāvad-āśraya-vṛttiś ced bhāva ity abhidhīyate // RUnm_14.154 //
analyzed: yāvat āśraya vṛttiḥ ced bhāvaḥ iti abhidhīyate
yathā

original: rādhāyā bhavataś ca citta-jatunī svedair vilāpya kramāt
analyzed: rādhāyāḥ bhavataḥ ca citta jatunī svedaiḥ vilāpya kramāt
yuñjan adri nikuñja kuñjara pate nirdhūta bheda bhramam
citrāya svayam anvarañjayat iha brahmāṇḍa harmya udare
mukunda mahiṣī vṛndaiḥ api asau ati durlabhaḥ

original: varāmṛta-svarūpa-śrīḥ svaṃ svarūpaṃ mano nayet // RUnm_14.157 //
analyzed: vara amṛta svarūpa śrīḥ svam svarūpam manaḥ nayet

original: sa rūḍhaś cādhirūḍhaś cety ucyate dvividho budhaiḥ // RUnm_14.158 //
analyzed: sa rūḍhaḥ ca adhirūḍhaḥ ca iti ucyate dvividhaḥ budhaiḥ
tatra rūḍhaḥ

original: uddīptā sāttvikā yatra sa rūḍha iti bhaṇyate // RUnm_14.159 //
analyzed: uddīptā sāttvikā yatra sa rūḍhaḥ iti bhaṇyate
kalpa kṣaṇa tvam khinna tvam ārti śaṅkayā
moha ādi abhāve pi ātma ādi sarva vismaraṇam sadā
kṣaṇasya kalpa etya ādyāḥ yatra yoga viyogayoḥ
tatra nimeṣa asaha tā
yathā śrī daśame

original: gopyaś ca kṛṣṇam upalabhya cirād abhīṣṭaṃ
analyzed: gopyaḥ ca kṛṣṇam upalabhya cirāt abhīṣṭam
yad prekṣaṇe dṛśiṣu pakṣma kṛtam śapanti
dṛgbhiḥ hṛdīkṛtam alam parirabhya sarvāḥ

original: tad-bhāvam āpur api nitya-yujāṃ durāpam // RUnm_14.163 //
analyzed: tad bhāvam āpuḥ api nitya yujām durāpam
āsanna jana tā hṛd viloḍanam yathā

original: sakhyaḥ prokṣya kurūn guru-kṣiti-bhṛtām āghūrṇayantī śiraḥ
analyzed: sakhyaḥ prokṣya kurūn guru kṣitibhṛtām āghūrṇayantī śiraḥ

original: svasthā viślathayanty aśeṣa-ramaṇīr āplāvya sarvaṃ janam /
analyzed: svasthāḥ viślathayanti aśeṣa ramaṇīḥ āplāvya sarvam janam
gopīnām anurāga sindhu laharī satya antaram vikramaiḥ

original: rākramya stimitāṃ vyadhād api parāṃ vaikuṇṭha-kaṇṭha-śriyam // RUnm_14.164 //
analyzed: rākramya stimitām vyadhāt api parām vaikuṇṭha kaṇṭha śriyam
kalpa kṣaṇa tvam yathā
śarad jyotsnī rāse vidhiḥ ajani rūpā api nimiṣā

original: datikṣudrā tāsāṃ yad ajani na tad vismaya-padam /
analyzed: dati kṣudrā tāsām yat ajani na tat vismaya padam
sukha utseka ārambhe nimiṣa lava kalpām iva daśām
mahā kalpa akalpā api ahaha labhate kāla kalanā
tad saukhye pi ārti śaṅkayā khinna tvam
yathā śrī daśame
yat te sujāta caraṇa amburuham staneṣu
bhītāḥ śanais priya dadhīmahi karkaśeṣu

original: tenāṭavīm aṭasi tad vyathate na kiṃ svit;
analyzed: tena aṭavīm aṭasi tat vyathate na kim svid

original: kūrpādibhir bhramati dhīr bhavad-āyuṣāṃ naḥ // RUnm_14.166 //
analyzed: kūrpa ādibhiḥ bhramati dhīḥ bhavat āyuṣām naḥ
moha ādi abhāve pi sarva vismaraṇam
yathā ekādaśe
tāḥ na avidat mayi anuṣaṅga baddha
dhiyaḥ svam ātmānam adaḥ tathā idam
yathā samādhau munayaḥ ubdhi toye
nadyaḥ praviṣṭāḥ iva nāma rūpe
kṣaṇa kalpa tā
yathā tatra eva
tāḥ tāḥ kṣapāḥ preṣṭhatamena nītā
mayā eva vṛndāvana gocareṇa
kṣaṇārdha vat tāḥ punar aṅga tāsām
hīnāḥ mayā kalpa samāḥ babhūvuḥ
ādya śabdāt iha proktā kṛṣṇa āvirbhāva kāri tā

original: sambhoga-bhede vispaṣṭaṃ sā purastāt pravakṣyate // RUnm_14.169 //
analyzed: sambhoga bhede vispaṣṭam sā purastāt pravakṣyate
atha adhirūḍhaḥ
rūḍha uktebhyaḥ anubhāvebhyaḥ kām api āptāḥ viśiṣṭa tām
yatra anubhāvāḥ dṛśyante saḥ udhirūḍhaḥ nigadyate
yathā śiva vākyam

original: lokātīatam ajāṇḍa-koṭigam api traikālikaṃ yat sukhaṃ
analyzed: aja aṇḍa koṭi gam api traikālikam yat sukham

original: duḥkhaṃ ceti pṛthag yadi sphuṭam ubhe te gacchataḥ kuṭatām /
analyzed: duḥkham ca iti pṛthak yadi sphuṭam ubhe te gacchataḥ kuṭa tām

original: naivābhāsa-tulāṃ śive tad api tat kuṭa-dvayaṃ rādhikā-
analyzed: na evā ābhāsa tulām śive tat api tat kuṭa dvayam rādhikā
prema udyat sukha duḥkha sindhu bhavayoḥ vindeta bindvoḥ api

original: modano mādanaś cāsāv adhirūḍho dvidhocyate // RUnm_14.172 //
analyzed: modanaḥ mādanaḥ ca asau adhirūḍhaḥ dvidhā ucyate
tatra modanaḥ

original: modanaḥ sa dvayor yatra sāttvikoddīpta-sauṣṭhavam // RUnm_14.173 //
analyzed: modanaḥ sa dvayoḥ yatra sāttvika uddīpta sauṣṭhavam
yathā lalitamādhave
ātanvan kalakaṇṭha nādam atulam stambha śriyā ujjṛmbhitaḥ
bhūyiṣṭha ucchalat aṅkuraḥ phalitavān sveda ambu muktāphalaiḥ
udyat bāṣpa maranda bhāga vicalaḥ upi utkampavān vibhramaiḥ
rādhā mādhavayoḥ virājati cirāt ullāsa kalpadrumaḥ
hareḥ yatra sa kāntasya vikṣobha bhara kāri tā

original: rādhikā-yūtha evāsau modano na tu sarvataḥ /
analyzed: rādhikā yūthaḥ eva asau modanaḥ na tu sarvatas

original: yaḥ śrīmān hlādinī-śakteḥ suvilāsaḥ priyo varaḥ // RUnm_14.176 //
analyzed: yaḥ śrīmān hlādinī śakteḥ suvilāsaḥ priyaḥ varaḥ
tatra sa kāntasya hareḥ kṣobha bhara kāri tā yathā

original: hanta stambha-karambitā bhuvi kuror bhadrā sarasvaty abhū-
analyzed: hanta stambha karambitā bhuvi kuroḥ bhadrā sarasvatī

original: dbāṣpaṃ bhāskarajā mumoca tarasā satyābhraman narmadā /
analyzed: dbāṣpam bhāskara jā mumoca tarasā satyā abhramat narmadā

original: bheje bhīṣma-sutā ca varṇa-vikṛtiṃ gāmbhīrya-bhāg apy asau
analyzed: bheje bhīṣma sutā ca varṇa vikṛtim gāmbhīrya bhāj api asau
kṛṣṇa udanvati rādhika adbhuta nadī prema ūrmibhiḥ saṃvṛte
advaitāt girijām hara ardha   sakhyāt priya uraḥ sthitām
lakṣmīm acyuta citta bhṛṅga nalinīm satyām ca saubhāgyataḥ
mādhuryāt madhura īśa jīvita sakhīm candrāvalīm ca kṣipan

original: paśyāruddha hariṃ prasārya laharīṃ rādhānurāgāmbudhiḥ // RUnm_14.178 //
analyzed: paśya āruddha harim prasārya laharīm rādhā anurāga ambudhiḥ
praviśleṣa daśāyām mohanaḥ bhavet

original: yasmin viraha-vaivaśyāt sūddīptā eva sāttvikāḥ // RUnm_14.179 //
analyzed: yasmin viraha vaivaśyāt su uddīptāḥ eva sāttvikāḥ
yathā
udyat vepathu vādyamāna daśanā kaṇṭha sthala antar luṭha
jjalpā gokula maṇḍalam vidadhatī bāṣpaiḥ nadīmātṛkam
rādhā kaṇṭakitena kaṇṭaki phalam gātreṇa dhikkurvatī

original: citraṃ tad-ghana-rāga-rāśibhir api śvetī-kṛtā vartate // RUnm_14.180 //
analyzed: citram tat ghanarāga rāśibhiḥ api śvetīkṛtā vartate
atrā anubhāvāḥ govinda kāntā āśliṣṭā api mūrcchanā
asahya duḥkha svīkārāt api tad sukha kāma tā
brahmāṇḍa kṣobha kāri tvam tiraścām api rodanam
sva bhūtaiḥ api tad saṅga tṛṣṇā mṛtyu pratiśravāt
divya unmāda ādayaḥ api anye vidvadbhiḥ anukīrtitāḥ
prāyas vṛndāvana īśvaryām mohanā iyam udañcati
samyak vilakṣaṇam yasya kāryam sañcāri mohataḥ
tatra kāntā āśliṣṭe api harau mūrcchā kāri tvam
yathā padyāvalyām
ratna chāyā ācchurita jaladhau mandire dvārakāyā
rukmiṇyā api prabala pulaka udbhedam āliṅgitasya
viśvam pāyāt masṛṇa yamunā tīra vānīra kuñje
rādhā kelī parimala bhara dhyāna mūrcchā murāreḥ
asahya duḥkha svīkārāt tad sukha kāma tā

original: syān naḥ saukhyaṃ yad api balavad goṣṭham āpte mukunde
analyzed: syāt naḥ saukhyam yat api balavat goṣṭham āpte mukunde

original: yady alpāpi kṣatir udayate tasya māgāt kadāpi /
analyzed: yadi alpā api kṣatiḥ udayate tasya mā agāt kadāpi

original: aprāpte'smin yad api nagarād ārtir ugrā bhaven naḥ
analyzed: aprāpte ismin yat api nagarāt ārtiḥ ugrā bhavet naḥ

original: saukhyaṃ tasya sphurati hṛdi cet tatra vāsaṃ karotu // RUnm_14.185 //
analyzed: saukhyam tasya sphurati hṛdi ced tatra vāsam karotu
brahmāṇḍa kṣobha kāri tvam yathā

original: nāraṃ cukrośa cakraṃ phaṇi-kulam abhavad vyākulaṃ svedam ūhe
analyzed: nāram cukrośa cakram phaṇi kulam abhavat vyākulam svedam ūhe

original: vṛndaṃ vṛndārakāṇāṃ pracura-mudam amucann aśru vaikuṇṭha-bhājaḥ /
analyzed: vṛndam vṛndārakāṇām pracura mudam amucan aśru vaikuṇṭha bhājaḥ

original: rādhāyāś citram īśa bhramati diśi diśi prema-niḥśvāsa-dhūme
analyzed: rādhāyāḥ citram īśa bhramati diśi diśi prema niḥśvāsa dhūme

original: pūrṇānande'py uṣitvā bahir idam abahiś cārtam āsīd ajāṇḍam // RUnm_14.186 //
analyzed: pūrṇānanda ipi uṣitvā bahis idam a bahis ca ārtam āsīt aja aṇḍam
yathā vā

original: aurva-stomāt kaṭur api kathaṃ durbalenorasā me
analyzed: aurvastomāt kaṭuḥ api katham durbalena urasā me

original: tāpaḥ prauḍho hari-virahajaḥ sahyate tan na jāne /
analyzed: tāpaḥ prauḍhaḥ hari viraha jaḥ sahyate tat na jāne

original: niṣkrāntā ced bhavati hṛdayād yasya dhūma-cchaṭāpi
analyzed: niṣkrāntā ced bhavati hṛdayāt yasya dhūma chaṭā api

original: brahmāṇḍānāṃ sakhi kulam api jvālayā jājvalīti // RUnm_14.187 //
analyzed: brahmāṇḍānām sakhi kulam api jvālayā jājvalīti
tiraścām api rodanam
yathā padyāvalyām
yāte dvāravatī puram muraripau tad vastra saṃvyānayā
kālindī taṭa kuñja vañjula latām ālāmbya sa utkaṇṭhayā
udgītam guru bāṣpa gadgada galat tāra svaram rādhayā

original: yenāntarjalacāribhir jalacarair apy utkam utkūjitam // RUnm_14.188 //
analyzed: yena antar jalacāribhiḥ jalacaraiḥ api utkam utkūjitam
mṛtyu svīkārāt sva bhūtaiḥ api tad saṅga tṛṣṇā
yathā tatra eva

original: pañcatvaṃ tanur etu bhūta-nivahāu svāṃśe viśantu sphuṭaṃ
analyzed: pañcatvam tanuḥ etu bhūta nivahau sva aṃśe viśantu sphuṭam

original: dhātāraṃ praṇipatya hanta śirasā tatrāpi yāce varam /
analyzed: dhātāram praṇipatya hanta śirasā tatra api yāce varam
tad vāpīṣu payaḥ tadīya mukure jyotiḥ tadīya aṅgana

original: vyomni vyoma tadīya-vartmani dharā tat-tāla-vṛnte'nilaḥ // RUnm_14.189 //
analyzed: vyomni vyoma tadīya vartmani dharā tad tālavṛnta inilaḥ
atha divya unmādaḥ
etasya mohana ākhyasya gatim kām api upeyuṣaḥ

original: bhramābhā kāpi vaicitrī divyonmāda itīryate // RUnm_14.190 //
analyzed: bhrama ābhā kā api vaicitrī divya unmādaḥ iti īryate
udghūrṇā citra jalpa ādyāḥ tad bhedāḥ bahavaḥ matāḥ
tatra udghūrṇā
syāt vilakṣaṇam udghūrṇā nānā vaivaśya ceṣṭitam
yathā

original: śayyāṃ kuñja-gṛhe kvacid vitanute sā vāsa-sajjāyitā
analyzed: śayyām kuñja gṛhe kvacid vitanute sā

original: nīlābhraṃ dhṛta-khaṇḍitā vyavahṛtiś caṇḍī kvacit tarjati /
analyzed: nīla abhram dhṛta khaṇḍitā vyavahṛtiḥ caṇḍī kvacid tarjati
āghūrṇati abhisāra sambhramavatī dhvānte kvacid dāruṇe

original: rādhā te virahodbhrama-pramathitā dhatte na kāṃ vā daśām // RUnm_14.193 //
analyzed: rādhā te viraha udbhrama pramathitā dhatte na kām vā daśām
mathurā nagaram kṛṣṇe labdhe lalita mādhave

original: udghūrṇeyaṃ tṛtīyāṅke rādhāyāḥ sphuṭam īritā // RUnm_14.194 //
analyzed: udghūrṇā iyam tṛtīya aṅke rādhāyāḥ sphuṭam īritā
atha citrajalpaḥ
preṣṭhasya suhṛd āloke gūḍha roṣa abhijṛmbhitaḥ
bhūri bhāva mayaḥ jalpaḥ yaḥ tīvra utkaṇṭhita antimaḥ
citrajalpaḥ daśa aṅgaḥ ūyam prajalpaḥ parijalpitam
vijalpa ujjalpa saṃjalpāḥ avajalpa ubhijalpitam

original: ājalpaḥ pratijalpaś ca sujalpaś ceti kīrtitāḥ // RUnm_14.196 //
analyzed: ājalpaḥ pratijalpaḥ ca sujalpaḥ ca iti kīrtitāḥ
eṣa bhramaragīta ākhyaḥ daśame prakaṭīkṛtaḥ

original: api cec citrajalpo'yaṃ manāk tad api kathyate // RUnm_14.198 //
analyzed: api ced citra jalpā uyam manāk tat api kathyate
tatra prajalpaḥ
asūyā īrṣyā mada yujā yova dhīraṇa mudrayā

original: priyasyākauśalodgāraḥ prajalpaḥ sa tu kīrtyate // RUnm_14.199 //
analyzed: priyasya a kauśala udgāraḥ prajalpaḥ sa tu kīrtyate
yathā
madhupa kitava bandho mā spṛśa aṅghrim sapatnyāḥ
kuca vilulita mālā kuṅkuma śmaśrubhiḥ naḥ
vahatu madhupatiḥ tad māninīnām prasādam

original: yadu-sadasi viḍambyaṃ yasya dūtas tvam īdṛk // RUnm_14.200 //
analyzed: yadu sadasi viḍambyam yasya dūtaḥ tvam īdṛś
atha parijalpitam
prabhoḥ nirdaya tā śāṭhya cāpala ādi upapādanāt
sva vicakṣaṇa tā vyaktiḥ bhaṅgyā syāt parijalpitam
yathā
sakṛt adhara sudhām svām mohinīm pāyayitvā
sumanasaḥ iva sadyas tatyaja ismān bhavādṛś
paricarati katham tat pāda padmam nu padmā

original: hy api bata hṛta-cetā hy uttamaḥ-śloka-jalpaiḥ // RUnm_14.202 //
analyzed: hi api bata hṛta cetāḥ hi uttamaḥśloka jalpaiḥ
atha vijalpaḥ
vyaktayā asūyayā gūḍha māna mudrā antarālayā

original: aghadviṣi kaṭākṣoktir vijalpo viduṣāṃ mataḥ // RUnm_14.203 //
analyzed: agha dviṣi kaṭākṣa uktiḥ vijalpaḥ viduṣām mataḥ
yathā

original: kim iha bahu ṣaḍaṅghre gāyasi tvaṃ yadūnām
analyzed: kim iha bahu ṣaṣ aṅghre gāyasi tvam yadūnām
adhipatim a gṛhāṇām agratas naḥ purāṇam
vijayasakha sakhīnām gīyatām tad prasaṅgaḥ
kṣapita kuca rujaḥ te kalpayanti iṣṭam iṣṭāḥ
atha ujjalpaḥ
hareḥ kuhaka tā ākhyānam garva garbhitayā īrṣyayā

original: sāsūyaś ca tad-ākṣepo dhīrair ujjalpa īryate // RUnm_14.205 //
analyzed: sa asūyaḥ ca tad ākṣepaḥ dhīraiḥ ujjalpaḥ īryate
yathā

original: divi bhuvi ca rasāyāṃ kāḥ striyas tad-durāpāḥ
analyzed: divi bhuvi ca rasāyām kāḥ striyaḥ tad durāpāḥ
kapaṭa rucira hāsa bhrū vijṛmbhasya yāḥ syuḥ

original: caraṇa-raja upāste yasya bhūtir vayaṃ kā
analyzed: caraṇarajaḥ upāste yasya bhūtiḥ vayam kā

original: api ca kṛpaṇa-pakṣe hy uttamaḥ-śloka-śabdaḥ // RUnm_14.206 //
analyzed: api ca kṛpaṇa pakṣe hi uttamaḥśloka śabdaḥ
atha saṃjalpaḥ
sa ulluṇṭhayā gahanayā kayā api ākṣepa mudrayā
tasya akṛtajña tā ādi uktiḥ saṃjalpaḥ kathitaḥ budhaiḥ
yathā

original: visṛja śirasi pādaṃ vedmy ahaṃ cāṭu-kārair
analyzed: visṛja śirasi pādam vedmi aham cāṭu kāraiḥ
anunaya viduṣaḥ tebhyaḥ etya dautyaiḥ mukundāt
svakṛte iha visṛṣṭa apati apati anya lokā

original: vyasṛjad akṛta-cetāḥ kiṃ nu sandheyam asmin // RUnm_14.208 //
analyzed: vyasṛjat akṛta cetāḥ kim nu sandheyam asmin
atha avajalpaḥ

original: yatra serṣyaṃ bhiyevoktā so'vajalpaḥ satāṃ mataḥ // RUnm_14.209 //
analyzed: yatra sa īrṣyam bhiyā iva uktā saḥ uvajalpaḥ satām mataḥ
yathā
mṛgayuḥ iva kapi indram vivyadhe lubdha dharmā
striyam akṛta virūpām strī jitaḥ kāmayānām

original: balim api balim attvāveṣṭayad dhvāṅkṣa-vad yas
analyzed: balim api balim attvā aveṣṭayat dhvāṅkṣavat yaḥ

original: tad alam asita-sakhyair dustyajas tat-kathārthaḥ // RUnm_14.210 //
analyzed: tat alam asita sakhyaiḥ dustyajaḥ tad kathā arthaḥ
atha abhijalpitam

original: bhaṅgyā tyāgaucitī tasya khagānām api khedanāt /
analyzed: bhaṅgyā tyāga aucitī tasya khagānām api khedanāt

original: yatra sānuśayaṃ proktā tad bhaved abhijalpitam // RUnm_14.211 //
analyzed: yatra sa anuśayam proktā tat bhavet abhijalpitam
yathā
yad anucarita līlā karṇa pīyūṣa vipruṣ
sakṛt adana vidhūta dvandva dharmāḥ vinaṣṭāḥ
sapadi gṛha kuṭumbam dīnam utsṛjya dīnā

original: bahava iha vihaṅgā bhikṣu-caryāṃ caranti // RUnm_14.212 //
analyzed: bahavaḥ iha vihaṅgāḥ bhikṣu caryām caranti
atha ājalpaḥ

original: jaihmyaṃ tasyārtidatvaṃ ca nirvedād yatra kīrtitam /
analyzed: jaihmyam tasya ārti da tvam ca nirvedāt yatra kīrtitam

original: bhaṅyānya-sukhadatvaṃ ca sa ājalpa udīritaḥ // RUnm_14.213 //
analyzed: ca saḥ ājalpaḥ udīritaḥ
yathā
vayam ṛtam iva jihma vyāhṛtam śraddadhānāḥ
kulika rutam iva ājñāḥ kṛṣṇa vadhvaḥ hariṇyaḥ
dadṛśuḥ asakṛt etat tat nakha sparśa tīvra
smara rujaḥ upamantrin bhaṇyatām anya vārtā
atha pratijalpaḥ
dustyaja dvandva bhāve smin prāptiḥ nā arhā iti anuddhatam
dūta sammānanena uktam yatra sa pratijalpakaḥ
yathā

original: priya-sakha punar āgāḥ preyasā preṣitaḥ kiṃ
analyzed: priya sakha punar āgāḥ preyasā preṣitaḥ kim
varaya kim anurundhe mānanīyā asi meṅga
nayasi katham iha asmān dustyaja dvandva pārśvam

original: satatam urasi saumya śrīr vadhūḥ sākam āste // RUnm_14.216 //
analyzed: satatam urasi saumya śrīḥ vadhūḥ sākam āste
atha sujalpaḥ
yatra ārjavāt sa gāmbhīryam sa dainyam saha cāpalam

original: sotkaṇṭhaṃ ca hariḥ pṛṣṭaḥ sa sujalpo nigadyate // RUnm_14.217 //
analyzed: sa utkaṇṭham ca hariḥ pṛṣṭaḥ sa sujalpaḥ nigadyate
yathā
api bata madhupuryām āryaputra udhunā āste

original: smarati sa pitṛ-gehān saumya bandhūṃś ca gopān /
analyzed: smarati sa pitṛ gehān saumya bandhūn ca gopān

original: kvacid api sa kathāṃ naḥ kiṅkarīṇāṃ gṛṇīte
analyzed: kvacid api sa kathām naḥ kiṅkarīṇām gṛṇīte

original: bhujam aguru-sugandhaṃ mūrdhny adhāsyat kadā nu // RUnm_14.218 //
analyzed: bhujam aguru sugandham mūrdhni adhāsyat kadā nu
atha mādanaḥ
sarva bhāva udgama ullāsī parāt paraḥ

original: rājate hlādinī-sāro rādhāyām eva yaḥ sadā // RUnm_14.219 //
analyzed: rājate hlādinī sāraḥ rādhāyām eva yaḥ sadā
yathā
ā sṛṣṭeḥ akṣayiṣṇum hṛdaya vidhu maṇi drāvaṇam vakrimāṇam
pūrṇa tve api udvahantam nija ruci ghaṭayā sādhvasam dhvaṃsayantam
tanvānam śam pradoṣe dhṛta nava nava tā sampadam mādana tvā
naumi rādhā danuja vijayinoḥ adbhutam bhāva candram
atra īrṣyāyāḥ ayogye pi prabala īrṣyā vidhāyi tā
sat ābhoge pi tad gandha mātra ādhāra stava ādayaḥ
atha ayogyā ipi īrṣyā
yathā dāna kelikaumudyām
viśuddhābhiḥ sārdham vraja hariṇa netrābhiḥ aniśam

original: tvam addhā vidveṣaṃ kim iti vanamāle racayasi /
analyzed: tvam addhā vidveṣam kim iti vanamāle racayasi

original: tṛṇīkurvaty asmān vapur agharipor āśikham idaṃ
analyzed: tṛṇīkurvatī asmān vapuḥ agha ripoḥ ā śikham idam

original: pariṣvajyāpāda mahati hṛdaye yā viharasi // RUnm_14.222 //
analyzed: pariṣvajya apāda mahati hṛdaye yā viharasi
yathā śrī daśame
pūrṇāḥ pulindyaḥ uru gāya pada abja rāga
śrī kuṅkumena dayitā stana maṇḍitena
tad darśana smara rujaḥ tṛṇa rūṣitena
limpantyaḥ ānana kuceṣu juhuḥ tad ādhim
yathā vā
duṣkaram mālatī
komaleyam akarot tapaḥ purā
hanta goṣṭha pati nandana upamam
yā tamālam amalā upagūhate

original: yoga eva bhaved eṣa vicitraḥ ko'pi mādanaḥ /
analyzed: yogaḥ eva bhavet eṣa vicitraḥ kopi mādanaḥ
yad vilāsāḥ virājante nitya līlāḥ sahasradhā
mādanasya gatiḥ suṣṭhu madanasya iva durgamā

original: na nirvaktuṃ bhavec chakyā tenāsau munināpy alam // RUnm_14.226 //
analyzed: na nirvaktum bhavet śakyā tena asau muninā api alam
kim ca
rāga anurāga tām ādau snehaḥ prāpya eva satvaram

original: mānatvaṃ praṇayatvaṃ ca kvacit paścāt prapadyate // RUnm_14.227 //
analyzed: māna tvam praṇaya tvam ca kvacid paścāt prapadyate
ataeva atra śāstreṣu śrūyate rādhikā ādiṣu
pūrva rāga prasaṅge api prakaṭam rāga lakṣaṇam

original: sphuranti vraja-devīṣu parā bhāva-bhidāś ca yāḥ /
analyzed: sphuranti vraja devīṣu parāḥ bhāva bhidāḥ ca yāḥ

original: tās tarkāygocaratyā na samyag iha varṇitāḥ // RUnm_14.229 //
analyzed: tāḥ na samyak iha varṇitāḥ
sādhāraṇyām ratau eva dhūmāyita tayā matāḥ
jvalitāḥ tu rati premṇoḥ dīptāḥ sneha ādi pañcasu

original: rūḍhe bhāve tathoddīptāḥ sudīptā mohanādiṣu // RUnm_14.230 //
analyzed: rūḍhe bhāve tathā uddīptāḥ su dīptāḥ mohana ādiṣu
iyam prāyika tā kintu śreṣṭha madhya ādi bhārataḥ

original: deśa-kāla-janādīnāṃ kvāpy eṣāṃ syād viparyayam // RUnm_14.231 //
analyzed: deśa kāla jana ādīnām kvāpi eṣām syāt viparyayam
ādyā prema antimām tatra anurāga antām samañjasā

original: ratir bhāvāntimāṃ sīmāṃ samarthaiva prapadyante // RUnm_14.232 //
analyzed: ratiḥ bhāva antimām sīmām samarthā eva prapadyante
ratiḥ narma vayasyānām anurāga antimām sthitim

original: teṣv eva subalādīnāṃ bhāvāntām eva gacchati // RUnm_14.233 //
analyzed: teṣu eva subala ādīnām bhāva antām eva gacchati
iti śrī śrī ujjvala nīlamaṇau
sthāyibhāva prakaraṇam
atha śṛṅgārabheda prakaraṇam

original: sa vipralambhaḥ sambhoga iti dvedhojjvalo mataḥ // RUnm_15.1 //
analyzed: sa vipralambhaḥ sambhogaḥ iti dvedhā ujjvalaḥ mataḥ
tatra vipralambhaḥ

original: yūnor ayuktayor bhāvo yuktayor vā tayor mithaḥ /
analyzed: yūnoḥ ayuktayoḥ bhāvaḥ yuktayoḥ vā tayoḥ mithas
abhīṣṭa āliṅgana ādīnām anavāptau prakṛṣyate
sa vipralambhaḥ vijñeyaḥ sambhoga unnati kārakaḥ
tathā ca uktam

original: na vinā vipralambhena sambhogaḥ puṣṭim aśnute /
analyzed: na vinā vipralambhena sambhogaḥ puṣṭim aśnute

original: kāṣāyite hi vastrādau bhūyān evābhivardhate // RUnm_15.3 //
analyzed: kāṣāyite hi vastra ādau bhūyān eva abhivardhate

original: pūrva-rāgas tathā mānaḥ prema-vaicittyam ity api /
analyzed: pūrva rāgaḥ tathā mānaḥ prema vaicittyam iti api

original: pravāsaś ceti kathito vipralambhaś catur-vidhaḥ // RUnm_15.4 //
analyzed: pravāsaḥ ca iti kathitaḥ vipralambhaḥ caturvidhaḥ
tatra pūrvarāgaḥ
ratiḥ yā saṅgamāt pūrvam darśana śravaṇa ādi jā

original: tayor unmīlati prājñaiḥ pūrva-rāgaḥ sa ucyate // RUnm_15.5 //
analyzed: tayoḥ unmīlati prājñaiḥ pūrvarāgaḥ saḥ ucyate
tatra darśanāt

original: sākṣāt kṛṣṇasya citre ca syāt svapnādau ca darśanam // RUnm_15.6 //
analyzed: sākṣāt kṛṣṇasya citre ca syāt svapna ādau ca darśanam
tatra sākṣāt
yathā padyāvalyām
indīvara udara sahodara medura śrīḥ
vāsaḥ dravat kanaka vṛnda nibham dadhānaḥ
āmukta mauktika manohara hāra vakṣāḥ
kā oyam yuvā jagat anaṅga mayam karoti
citre yathā vidagdhamādhave

original: śiśiraya dṛśau dṛṣṭvā divyaṃ kiśoram itīkṣitaḥ
analyzed: dṛśau dṛṣṭvā divyam kiśoram iti īkṣitaḥ
parijalpana girām viśrambhāt tvam vilāsa phala aṅkitaḥ

original: śiva śiva kathaṃ jānīmas tvām avakra-dhiyo vayaṃ
analyzed: śiva śiva katham jānīmaḥ tvām avakra dhiyaḥ vayam
nibiḍa baḍavā vahni jvālā kalāpa vikāsinam
svapne yathā
svapne dṛṣṭvā sahacari sarit kāsarī śyāma nīrā
tīre tasyāḥ kvaṇita madhupā mādhavaī kuñja śālā
tasyām kāntam kapiśa jaghanaḥ dhvānta rāśiḥ śarīrī

original: citraṃ candrāvalim api sa māṃ pātum icchann arautsīt // RUnm_15.9 //
analyzed: citram candra āvalim api sa mām pātum icchan arautsīt
atha śravaṇam

original: vandi-dūtī-sakhī-vaktrād gītādeś ca śrutir bhavet // RUnm_15.10 //
analyzed: bhavet
tatas vandivaktrāt yathā
paṭhati magadha rāja nirjaya arthām
sakhi viruda āvalim atra vandi varye
vada katham iva lakṣmaṇe tanute
pulaka kulena vilakṣaṇā kila āsīt
dūtī vaktrāt yathā
āviṣkṛte tava mukunda mayā prasaṅge
tārā āvalī pulakita aṅga latā nata akṣī
śuśrūṣuḥ api a laghu gadgada ruddha kaṇṭhī

original: praṣṭuṃ tavākṣamata sā na kathā-viśeṣam // RUnm_15.12 //
analyzed: praṣṭum tava akṣamata sā na kathā viśeṣam
sakhīvaktrāt yathā
yāvat unmada cakora locanā
mad mukhāt tava kathām upāśṛṇot
tāvat añcati dinam dinam sakhī
kṛṣṇa śārad anadīrya tānavam
gītāt yathā
nayane praṇayan udaśruṇī
mama sadyas sadasi kṣitīśituḥ
upavīṇayati pravīṇa dhīḥ

original: kam udaśruḥ sakhi vaiṇiko muniḥ // RUnm_15.14 //
analyzed: kam udaśruḥ sakhi vaiṇikaḥ muniḥ
purā uktāḥ hetavaḥ rati janmani

original: atra te pūrva-rāge'pi jñeyā dhīrair yathocitam // RUnm_15.15 //
analyzed: atra te pūrva rāga ipi jñeyāḥ dhīraiḥ yathocitam
api mādhava rāgasya prāthamye sambhavati api

original: ādau rāge mṛgākṣīṇāṃ prokte syāc cārutādhikā // RUnm_15.16 //
analyzed: ādau rāge mṛga akṣīṇām prokte syāt cāru tā adhikā

original: atra sañcāriṇo vyādhiḥ śaṅkāsūyā śramaḥ klamaḥ /
analyzed: atra sañcāriṇaḥ vyādhiḥ śaṅkā asūyā śramaḥ klamaḥ
nirveda autsukya dainyāni cintā nidrā prabodhanam
viṣādaḥ jaḍa tā unmadaḥ moha mṛtyā ādayaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: prauḍhaḥ samañjasaḥ sādhāraṇaś ceti sa tu tridhā // RUnm_15.18 //
analyzed: prauḍhaḥ samañjasaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ ca iti sa tu tridhā
tatra prauḍhaḥ
samartha arati rūpaḥ tu prauḍhaḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: lālasādir iha prauḍhe maraṇāntā daśā bhavet /
analyzed: lālasa ādiḥ iha prauḍhe maraṇa antā daśā bhavet
tad tad sañcāri bhāvānām utkaṭa tvāt anekadhā
tathā api prāktanaiḥ asya daśā avasthā samāsatas

original: proktās tad-anurodhena tāsāṃ lakṣaṇam ucyate // RUnm_15.20 //
analyzed: proktāḥ tad anurodhena tāsām lakṣaṇam ucyate
lālasa udvega jāgaryāḥ tānavam jaḍimā atra tu

original: vaiyagryaṃ vyādhir unmādo moho mṛtyur daśā daśa // RUnm_15.21 //
analyzed: vaiyagryam vyādhiḥ unmādaḥ mohaḥ mṛtyuḥ daśā daśa

original: prauḍhatvāt pūrva-rāgasya prauḍhāḥ sarvā daśā api // RUnm_15.22 //
analyzed: prauḍha tvāt pūrvarāgasya prauḍhāḥ sarvāḥ daśāḥ api
tatra lālasaḥ
abhīṣṭa lipsayā gāḍha gṛdhnu tā lālasaḥ mataḥ
atra autsukyam capalatā ghūrṇā śvāsa ādayaḥ tathā
yathā

original: tvam avasitān niṣkrāmantī punaḥ praviśanty asau
analyzed: tvam avasitāt niṣkrāmantī punar praviśantī asau
jhaṭiti ghaṭikā madhye vārān śatam vraja sīmani
agaṇita guru trāsā śvāsān vimucya vimucya kim

original: kṣipasi bahuśo nīpāraṇye kiśori dṛśor dvayam // RUnm_15.24 //
analyzed: kṣipasi bahuśas nīpa araṇye kiśori dṛśoḥ dvayam
yathā vā vidagdhamādhave

original: dūrād apy anuṣaṅgataḥ śrutim ite tvan-nāma-dheyākṣare
analyzed: dūrāt api anuṣaṅgataḥ śrutim ite tvad nāmadheya akṣare

original: sonmādaṃ madirekṣaṇā viruvatī dhatte muhur vepathum /
analyzed: sa unmādam madirā īkṣaṇā viruvatī dhatte muhur vepathum

original: āḥ kiṃ vā kathanīyam anyad-asite daivād varāmbhodhare
analyzed: āḥ kim vā kathanīyam anyat asite daivāt vara ambhodhare

original: dṛṣṭe taṃ parirabdhum utsuka-matiḥ pakṣa-dvayīm icchati // RUnm_15.25 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭe tam parirabdhum utsuka matiḥ pakṣa dvayīm icchati
atha udvegaḥ
udvegaḥ manasaḥ kampaḥ tatra niḥśvāsa cāpale
stambhaḥ cintā aśru vaivarṇya sveda ādayaḥ udīritāḥ
yathā vidagdhamādhave

original: cintā-santatir adya kṛntati sakhi svāntasya kiṃ te dhṛtiṃ
analyzed: cintā santatiḥ adya kṛntati sakhi svāntasya kim te dhṛtim

original: kiṃvā siñcati tāmram ambaram ati-svedāmbhasāṃ ḍambaraḥ /
analyzed: kiṃvā siñcati tāmram ambaram ati sveda ambhasām ḍambaraḥ

original: kampaś campaka-gauri lumpati vapuḥ-sthairyaṃ kathaṃ vā balāt
analyzed: kampaḥ campaka gauri lumpati vapuḥ sthairyam katham vā balāt

original: tathyaṃ brūhi na maṅgalā parijane saṅgopanāṅgīkṛtiḥ // RUnm_15.27 //
analyzed: tathyam brūhi na maṅgalā parijane saṅgopana aṅgīkṛtiḥ
atha jāgaryā
nidrā kṣayaḥ tu jāgaryā stambha śoṣa gada ādi kṛt
yathā

original: śyāmaṃ kañcana kāñcanojjvala-paṭaṃ sandarśya nidrā kṣaṇaṃ
analyzed: śyāmam kañcana kāñcana ujjvala paṭam sandarśya nidrā kṣaṇam

original: mām ājanma sakhī vimucya calitā ruṣṭeva nāvartate /
analyzed: mām ājanma sakhī vimucya calitā ruṣṭā iva na āvartate

original: cintāṃ prohya sakhi prapañcaya matiṃ tasyās tvam āvartane
analyzed: cintām prohya sakhi prapañcaya matim tasyāḥ tvam āvartane

original: nānyaḥ svāpnika-taskaropaharaṇe śakto janas tāṃ vinā // RUnm_15.29 //
analyzed: na anyaḥ svāpnika taskara upaharaṇe śaktaḥ janaḥ tām vinā
atha tānavam
tānavam kṛśa tā gātre daurbalya bhramaṇa ādi kṛt
yathā
cyute valaya sañcaye prabala rikta tā dūṣaṇa
vyayāya nihita ūrmika āvaliḥ api skhalati añjasā

original: niśamya muralī-kalaṃ sakhi sakṛd viśākhe tanu-
analyzed: niśamya muralī kalam sakhi sakṛt viśākhe tanu
stava asita caturdaśī śaśi kalā kṛśa tvam yayau

original: kaiścit tu tānava-sthāne vilāpaḥ paripaṭhyate // RUnm_15.32 //
analyzed: kaiścid tu vilāpaḥ paripaṭhyate
yathā
atrā āsīt navanīpa bhūruha taṭe kurvan vihāram hari
ścakre tāṇḍavam atra mitra sahitaḥ caṇḍāṃśu jā rodhasi

original: paśyantī latikāntare kṣaṇam ahaṃ vyagrā nilīya sthitaṃ
analyzed: paśyantī latikā antare kṣaṇam aham vyagrā nilīya sthitam

original: sakhyaḥ kiṃ kathayāmi dagdha-vidhinā kṣiptāsmi dāvopari // RUnm_15.33 //
analyzed: sakhyaḥ kim kathayāmi dagdha vidhinā kṣiptā asmi dāva upari
atha jaḍimā
iṣṭa aniṣṭa a parijñānam yatra praśneṣu anuttaram
darśana śravaṇa abhāvaḥ jaḍimā sā abhidhīyate
atra akāṇḍe pi huṅkāra stambha śvāsa bhrama ādayaḥ
yathā
akāṇḍe huṅkāram racayasi śṛṇoṣi priya sakhī

original: kulānāṃ nālāpaṃ dṛtir iva muhur niḥśvasiṣi ca /
analyzed: kulānām na ālāpam dṛtiḥ iva muhur niḥśvasiṣi ca
tatas śaṅke paṅkeruha mukhi yayau vaiṇava kalā

original: madhulī te pāli śruti-caṣakayoḥ prāghūṇikatām // RUnm_15.35 //
analyzed: madhulī te pāli śruti caṣakayoḥ prāghūṇika tām
atha vaiyāgryam
vaiyāgryam bhāva gāmbhīrya vikṣobha asaha tā ucyate

yathā vidagdhamādhave

original: pratyāhṛtya muniḥ kṣaṇaṃ viṣayato yasmin mano dhitsate
analyzed: pratyāhṛtya muniḥ kṣaṇam viṣayataḥ yasmin manaḥ dhitsate

original: bālāsau viṣayeṣu dhitsati tataḥ pratyāharantī manaḥ /
analyzed: bālā asau viṣayeṣu dhitsati tatas pratyāharantī manaḥ

original: yasya sphūrti-lavāya hanta hṛdaye yogī sumutkaṇṭhate
analyzed: yasya sphūrti lavāya hanta hṛdaye yogī

original: mugdheyaṃ kila tasya paśya hṛdayān niṣkrāntim ākāṅkṣati // RUnm_15.37 //
analyzed: mugdhā iyam kila tasya paśya hṛdayāt niṣkrāntim ākāṅkṣati
atha vyādhiḥ
abhīṣṭa alābhataḥ vyādhiḥ pāṇḍima uttāpa lakṣaṇaḥ
atra śīta spṛhā moha niḥśvāsa patana ādayaḥ
yathā
dava damana tayā niśamya bhadrā
madana dava jvalitā dadhe hṛdi tvām
dvi guṇita davathu vyathā vidagdhā
mura hara bhasma mayī iva pāṇḍuḥ āsīt
atha unmādaḥ
sarva avasthāsu sarvatra tad manaska tayā sadā

original: atasmiṃs tu tad iti bhrāntir unmāda iti kīrtyate /
analyzed: tu   iti      iti kīrtyate
atra iṣṭa dveṣa niḥśvāsa nimeṣa viraha ādayaḥ
yathā vidagdhamādhave
vitanvānaḥ tanvā marakata rucīnām rucivatām
paṭāt niṣkrāntaḥ abhūt dhṛta śikhaṇḍaḥ nava yuvā

original: bhruvaṃ tena kṣiptvā kim api hasatonmādita-mateḥ
analyzed: bhruvam tena kṣiptvā kim api hasatā unmādita mateḥ

original: śaśī vṛtto vahniḥ param ahaha vahnir mama śaśī // RUnm_15.41 //
analyzed: śaśī vṛttaḥ vahniḥ param ahaha vahniḥ mama śaśī

mohaḥ vicitta tā proktaḥ naiścalya patana ādi kṛt
yathā
nāsā śvāsa parāṅmukhī vighaṭite dṛṣṭī snuṣāyāḥ katham

original: hā dhik kṛṣṇa-tilān mamārpaya kare kuryām apāmārjanam /
analyzed: hā dhik kṛṣṇa tilān mama arpaya kare kuryām apāmārjanam

original: ity ārohati karṇayoḥ parisaraṃ kṛṣṇeti karṇa-dvaye
analyzed: iti ārohati karṇayoḥ parisaram kṛṣṇā iti karṇa dvaye

original: kampenācyuta tatra sūtritavatī tvām eva hetuṃ sakhī // RUnm_15.43 //
analyzed: kampena acyuta tatra sūtritavatī tvām eva hetum sakhī
atha mṛtyuḥ

original: tais taiḥ kṛtaiḥ pratīkārair yadi na syāt samāgamaḥ /
analyzed: taiḥ taiḥ kṛtaiḥ pratīkāraiḥ yadi na syāt samāgamaḥ
kandarpa bāṇa kadanāt tatra syāt maraṇa udyamaḥ
tatra sva priya vastūnām vayasyāsu samarpaṇam
yathā

original: rādhā rodhasi ropitāṃ mukulinīm āliṅgya mal-līlatāṃ
analyzed: rādhā rodhasi ropitām mukulinīm āliṅgya mallī latām
hāram hīra mayam samarpya lalitā haste praśasta śriyam

original: mūrcchām āpnuvatī praviśya madhupair gītāṃ kadambāṭavīṃ
analyzed: mūrcchām āpnuvatī praviśya madhupaiḥ gītām kadamba aṭavīm

original: nāma vyāharatā hareḥ priya-sakhī-vṛndena sandhukṣitā // RUnm_15.46 //
analyzed: nāma vyāharatā hareḥ priya sakhī vṛndena sandhukṣitā
yathā vā vidagdhamādhave

original: akāruṇyaḥ kṛṣṇo yadi mayi tavāgaḥ katham idaṃ
analyzed: akāruṇyaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ yadi mayi tava āgaḥ katham idam

original: mudhā mā rodīr me kuru param imām uttara-kṛtim /
analyzed: mudhā mā rodīḥ me kuru param imām uttarakṛtim
tamālasya skandhe vinihita bhuja vallariḥ iyam

original: yathā vṛndāraṇye ciram avicalā tiṣṭhati tanuḥ // RUnm_15.47 //
analyzed: yathā vṛndāraṇye ciram avicalā tiṣṭhati tanuḥ
atha samañjasaḥ
bhavet samañjasa rati svarūpaḥ yam samañjasaḥ
atra abhilāṣa cintā smṛti guṇa saṅkīrtana udvegāḥ

original: savilāpā unmāda-vyādhi-jaḍatā mṛtiś ca tāḥ kramaśaḥ // RUnm_15.49 //
analyzed: sa vilāpāḥ unmāda vyādhi jaḍa tā mṛtiḥ ca tāḥ kramaśas
tatra abhilāṣaḥ
vyavasāyaḥ abhilāṣaḥ syāt priya saṅgam alipsayā
yathā

original: yad iha sakhi subhadrā-sakhyam ākhyāya dhūrte
analyzed: yat iha sakhi subhadrā sakhyam ākhyāya dhūrte
vrajasi pituḥ agārāt devekī mandirāya

original: racayasi bata satye maṇḍane ca prayatnaṃ
analyzed: racayasi bata satye maṇḍane ca prayatnam

original: sphuṭam ajani tad antar vastu gūḍhaṃ tavādya // RUnm_15.51 //
analyzed: sphuṭam ajani tat antar vastu gūḍham tava adya
atha cintā
abhīṣṭa avāpti upāyānām dhyānam cintā prakīrtitā
yathā
niḥśvāsaḥ te kamala vadane mlāpayati oṣṭha bimbam
śayyāyām ca kraśima kalitā ceṣṭate deha yaṣṭiḥ

original: dvandvaṃ cākṣṇor vikirati ciraṃ rukmiṇi śyāma ambho
analyzed: dvandvam ca akṣṇoḥ vikirati ciram rukmiṇi śyāma ambho

original: na śvo-bhāviny upayama-vidhau śobhate vikriyeyam // RUnm_15.53 //
analyzed: na śvas bhāvinī upayama vidhau śobhate vikriyā iyam
atha smṛtiḥ
anubhūta priya ādīnām arthānām cintanam smṛtiḥ
atra kampa aṅga vaivaśya bāṣpa niḥśvasita ādayaḥ
yathā
plutam pureṇa apām nayana kamala dvandvam abhitas
dhṛta utkampam sātrājiti kuca ratha aṅga dvayam api

original: ślathārambhaṃ caitad bhuja-visala-yugaṃ tat tava mana-
analyzed: ślatha ārambham ca etat bhuja visala yugam tat tava mana
s taḍāge ismin kṛṣṇa dvirada patiḥ antar viharati
atha guṇa kīrtanam
saundarya ādi guṇa ślāghā guṇa kīrtanam ucyate
atra vepathu romāñca kaṇṭha gadgadikā ādayaḥ
yathā

original: yāntyas tṛṣṇāpi yuvatayo yeṣu ghūrṇāṃ bhajante
analyzed: yāntyaḥ tṛṣṇā api yuvatayaḥ yeṣu ghūrṇām bhajante

original: yāny ācamya svayam api bhavān romaharṣaṃ prayāti /
analyzed: yāni ācamya svayam api bhavān romaharṣam prayāti
gandham teṣām tava madhupate rūpa sampad madhūnām

original: dūre vindan mama na hi dhṛtiḥ citta-bhṛṅgas tanoti // RUnm_15.57 //
analyzed: dūre vindan mama na hi dhṛtiḥ citta bhṛṅgaḥ tanoti
ṣaṭ udvega ādayaḥ pūrvam prauḍhe tasmin udāhṛtāḥ

original: sāmañjasyād rater atra kintu tāḥ syur yathocitam // RUnm_15.58 //
analyzed: sāmañjasyāt rateḥ atra kintu tāḥ syuḥ yathocitam
atha sādhāraṇaḥ
sādhāraṇa rati prāyaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ iti īritaḥ

original: atra proktā vilāpāntāḥ ṣaḍ-daśāntāś ca komalāḥ // RUnm_15.59 //
analyzed: atra proktāḥ vilāpa antāḥ ṣaṣ daśā antāḥ ca komalāḥ
atha abhilāṣaḥ
yathā prathama skandhe
etāḥ param strī tvam apāsta peśalam
nirasta śaucam bata sādhu kurvate
yāsām gṛhāt puṣkara locanaḥ patiḥ

original: na jātv apaity āhṛtibhir hṛdi spṛśan // RUnm_15.60 //
analyzed: na jātu apaiti āhṛtibhiḥ hṛdi spṛśan

original: cintādīnāṃ tathānyāsām ūhyā dhīrair udāhṛtiḥ // RUnm_15.61 //
analyzed: cintā ādīnām tathā anyāsām ūhyā dhīraiḥ udāhṛtiḥ
pūrva rāge kāma lekha sraj ādikam
vayasi ādi kareṇa atra kṛṣṇena asya ca kāntayā
tatra kāma lekhaḥ

original: sa lekhaḥ kāma-lekhaḥ syāt yaḥ sva-prema-prakāśakaḥ /
analyzed: sa lekhaḥ kāma lekhaḥ syāt yaḥ sva prema prakāśakaḥ

original: yuvatyā yūni yūnā ca yuvatyāṃ saṃprahīyate // RUnm_15.63 //
analyzed: yuvatyā yūni yūnā ca yuvatyām saṃprahīyate

original: nirakṣaraḥ sākṣaraś ca kāma-lekho dvidhā bhavet // RUnm_15.64 //
analyzed: nirakṣaraḥ sākṣaraḥ ca kāmalekhaḥ dvidhā bhavet
tatra nirakṣaraḥ
varṇa vinyāsa rahitaḥ bhavet eṣa nirakṣaraḥ
yathā
kisalaya śikhare viśākhikāyā
nakhara śikhā likhita uyam ardhacandraḥ
dadhat iha madana ardhacandra bhāvam

original: hṛdi mama hanta kathaṃ haṭhād viveśa // RUnm_15.66 //
analyzed: hṛdi mama hanta katham haṭhāt viveśa
atha sa akṣaram

original: gāthāmayī lipir yatra svahastāṅkaiṣa sākṣaraḥ // RUnm_15.67 //
analyzed: gāthā mayī lipiḥ yatra sva hasta aṅkā eṣa sa akṣaraḥ
yathā jagannātha vallabhe

original: suiraṃ vijjhasi hiaaṃ lambha-i maaṇo kkhu dujjasaḥ baliaṃ /
analyzed: su iram hiaam lambhai maaṇaḥ kkhu dujjasaḥ baliam

original: dīsasi saaladisāsuṃ dīsa-i maaṇo ṇa kuttābi // RUnm_15.68 //
analyzed: dīsasi saala disā asum dīsai maaṇaḥ ṇa

original: (suciraṃ bidhyasi hṛdayaṃ labhate madanaḥ khalu duryaśo balīyaḥ /
analyzed: su ciram bidhyasi hṛdayam labhate madanaḥ khalu duryaśaḥ balīyaḥ

original: dṛśyase sakala-diśāsu dṛśyate madano na kutrāpi //)
analyzed: dṛśyase sakala diśāsu dṛśyate madanaḥ na kutra api
bandha ubja tantunā rāgaḥ kim vā kastūrikā masī

original: nāsāgre vara-mauktika-śriyam adhād asrasya sā bindunā // RUnm_15.120 //
analyzed: nāsā agre vara mauktika śriyam adhāt asrasya sā bindunā
atha dānam

original: vyājena bhūṣaṇādīnāṃ pradānaṃ dānam ucyate // RUnm_15.121 //
analyzed: vyājena bhūṣaṇa ādīnām pradānam dānam ucyate
yathā

original: kāmo nāma suhṛn mamāsti bhavatīm ākarṇya mat-preyasīṃ
analyzed: kāmaḥ nāma suhṛd mama asti bhavatīm ākarṇya mad preyasīm

original: hāras tena tavārpito'yam urasi prāpnotu saṅgotsavam /
analyzed: hāraḥ tena tava arpitaḥ iyam urasi prāpnotu saṅga utsavam

original: ity unnamya karaṃ muradviṣi vadaty udbhinna-sāndra-smitā
analyzed: iti unnamya karam muradviṣi vadati udbhinna sāndra smitā

original: padmā māna-vinigrahāt praṇayinā tenodbhaṭaṃ cumbitā // RUnm_15.122 //
analyzed: padmā māna vinigrahāt praṇayinā tena udbhaṭam cumbitā
atha natiḥ

original: kevalaṃ dainyam ālambya pādapāto natir matā // RUnm_15.123 //
analyzed: kevalam dainyam ālambya pādapātaḥ natiḥ matā
yathā
kṣiti luṭhita śikhaṇḍa āpīḍam ārāt mukunde
racayati ratikānta stomakānte praṇāmam
nayana jaladharābhyām kurvatī bāṣpa vṛṣṭim
vara tanuḥ iha māna grīṣma nāśam śaśaṃsa
atha upekṣā
sāma ādau tu parikṣīṇe syāt upekṣā avadhīraṇam

original: upekṣā kathyate kaiścit tūṣṇīmbhāvatayā sthitiḥ // RUnm_15.125 //
analyzed: upekṣā kathyate kaiścid tūṣṇīmbhāva tayā sthitiḥ
tat dvayam yathā

original: sūnur vallabha eṣa vallavapates tatrāpi vīrāgraṇī-
analyzed: sūnuḥ vallabhaḥ eṣa vallava pateḥ tatra api vīrāgraṇī
smara maṇḍalī vijayinā rūpeṇa vibhrājitaḥ

original: sakhyaḥ samprati rūkṣatā pṛthur iyaṃ tenātra na śreyase
analyzed: sakhyaḥ samprati rūkṣa tā pṛthuḥ iyam tena atra na śreyase

original: dūre paśyata yāti niṣṭhura-manāḥ kā yuktir atrocitā // RUnm_15.126 //
analyzed: dūre paśyata yāti niṣṭhura manāḥ kā yuktiḥ atra ucitā
māne muhur api ati durnivāre
vācaṃyama vratam aham tarasā agrahīṣam
bāṣpam tatas vikiratī nijagāda padmā

original: pauṣpaṃ rajaḥ patitam atra dṛśor mameti // RUnm_15.127 //
analyzed: pauṣpam rajaḥ patitam atra dṛśoḥ mama iti
athavā
prasādana vidhim muktvā vākyaiḥ anya artha sūcakaiḥ

original: prasādanaṃ mṛgākṣīṇām upekṣeti smṛtā budhaiḥ // RUnm_15.128 //
analyzed: prasādanam mṛga akṣīṇām upekṣā iti smṛtā budhaiḥ
yathā

original: dhammille nava-mālatī paricitā savye ca śabda-grahe
analyzed: dhammille nava mālatī paricitā savye ca śabdagrahe

original: mallī sundari dakṣiṇe tu katarat puṣpaṃ tava bhrājate /
analyzed: mallī sundari dakṣiṇe tu katarat puṣpam tava bhrājate

original: āghreyaṃ paricetum ity upahite vyājena nāsā-puṭe
analyzed: āghreyam paricetum iti upahite vyājena nāsāpuṭe

original: gaṇḍodyat-pulakā vihasya hariṇā candrāvalī cumbitā // RUnm_15.129 //
analyzed: gaṇḍa udyat pulakā vihasya hariṇā candra āvalī cumbitā
atha rasa antaram
ākasmika bhaya ādīnām prastutiḥ syāt rasa antaram

original: yādṛcchikaṃ buddhi-pūrvam iti dvedhā tad ucyate // RUnm_15.130 //
analyzed: yādṛcchikam buddhi pūrvam iti dvedhā tat ucyate
tatra yādṛcchikam

original: upasthitam akasmād yat tad yādṛcchikam ucyate // RUnm_15.131 //
analyzed: upasthitam akasmāt yat tat yādṛcchikam ucyate
yathā

original: api gurubhir upāyair adya sāmādibhir yā
analyzed: api gurubhiḥ upāyaiḥ adya sāma ādibhiḥ yā

original: lavam api na mṛgākṣī māna-mudrām abhāṅkṣīt /
analyzed: lavam api na mṛga akṣī māna mudrām abhāṅkṣīt

original: harim iha parirebhe sā svayaṃgrāham agre
analyzed: harim iha parirebhe sā svayaṃgrāham agre
nava jaladhara nādaiḥ bhīṣitā paśya bhadrā
yathā vā
upāyeṣu vyartha unnatiṣu bata sāma ādiṣu sakhe

original: sakhīnāṃ cāturye gatavati ca sadyaḥ śithilatām /
analyzed: sakhīnām cāturye gatavati ca sadyas śithila tām
viśākhāyāḥ kopa jvara haraṇa mantra pratinidhim
sa cītkāram rūkṣa svanitam akarot ukṣa danujaḥ
atha buddhi pūrvam

original: buddhi-pūrvaṃ tu kāntena pratyutpanna-dhiyā kṛtam // RUnm_15.134 //
analyzed: buddhi pūrvam tu kāntena pratyutpanna dhiyā kṛtam
yathā

original: pāṇau pañcamukhena duṣṭa-kṛmiṇā daṣṭo'smi roṣād iti
analyzed: pāṇau pañcamukhena duṣṭa kṛmiṇā daṣṭaḥ asmi roṣāt iti

original: vyājāt kūṇita-locanaṃ vraja-patau vyābhujya vaktraṃ sthite /
analyzed: vyājāt kūṇita locanam vraja patau vyābhujya vaktram sthite

original: sadyaḥ projjhita-roṣa-vṛttir asakṛt kiṃ vṛttam ity ākulā
analyzed: sadyas projjhita roṣa vṛttiḥ asakṛt kim vṛttam iti ākulā

original: jalpantī smita-bandhur āsyam amunā gāndharvikā cumbitā // RUnm_15.135 //
analyzed: jalpantī smita bandhuḥ āsyam amunā gāndharvikā cumbitā
yathā vā

original: nyastaṃ dāma kṛtāgasādya hariṇā dṛṣṭvā puro rādhayā
analyzed: nyastam dāma kṛta āgasā adya hariṇā dṛṣṭvā puras rādhayā

original: kṣiptenābhihataḥ sa tena kapaṭī duḥkhīva bhugnānanaḥ /
analyzed: kṣiptena abhihataḥ sa tena kapaṭī duḥkhī iva bhugna ānanaḥ

original: mīlann eva niṣedivān bhuvi tataḥ sadyas tayā vyagrayā
analyzed: mīlan eva niṣedivān bhuvi tatas sadyas tayā vyagrayā

original: pāñibhyāṃ dhṛta-kandharaḥ sthita-mukho bimboṣṭham asyāḥ papau
analyzed: pāñibhyām dhṛta kandharaḥ sthita mukhaḥ bimba uṣṭham asyāḥ papau
deśa kāla balena eva muralī śravaṇena ca

original: vināpy upāyaṃ māno'sau līyate vraja-subhruvām // RUnm_15.137 //
analyzed: vinā api upāyam mānā asau līyate vraja subhruvām
tatra deśa balena yathā
alaṅkīrṇam candra āvaliḥ ali ghaṭā jhaṅkṛti bharaiḥ

original: puro vṛndāraṇyaṃ kim api kalayantī kusumitam /
analyzed: puras vṛndāraṇyam kim api kalayantī kusumitam

original: hariṃ ca smerāsyaṃ priyaka-taru-mūle priyam itaḥ
analyzed: harim ca smera āsyam priyaka taru mūle priyam itas

original: skhalan-mānā sakhyām adiśata satṛṣṇaṃ dṛśam asau // RUnm_15.138 //
analyzed: skhalat mānā sakhyām adiśata sa tṛṣṇam dṛśam asau
kāla balena yathā
śaradi madhura mūrtiḥ paśya kānti chaṭābhiḥ
snapayati ravi kanyā tīra vanyām sudhāṃśuḥ
iti niśi niśamayya vyāhṛtim dūtikāyāḥ

original: smita-rucibhir atānīt tatra rādhā prasādam // RUnm_15.139 //
analyzed: smita rucibhiḥ atānīt tatra rādhā prasādam
muralī śabdena yathā
yadi roṣam na hi muñcasi

original: na muñca mama devi nātra nirbandhaḥ /
analyzed: na muñca mama devi na atra nirbandhaḥ
phutkṛti vidhūta mānaḥ

original: sa bhavatu vijayī harer veṇuḥ // RUnm_15.140 //
analyzed: sa bhavatu vijayī hareḥ veṇuḥ
yathā vā

original: mānasyopādhyāyi prasīda sakhi rundhi me śruti-dvandvam /
analyzed: mānasya upādhyāyi prasīda sakhi rundhi me śruti dvandvam

original: ayam uccāṭana-mantraṃ siddho veṇur vane paṭhati // RUnm_15.141 //
analyzed: ayam uccāṭana mantram siddhaḥ veṇuḥ vane paṭhati

original: tāratamyaṃ tu mānasya hetoḥ syāt tāratamyataḥ /
analyzed: tāratamyam tu mānasya hetoḥ syāt tāratamyataḥ

original: syāl laghur madhyamaś cāsau mahiṣṭhaś cety atas tridhā // RUnm_15.142 //
analyzed: syāt laghuḥ madhyamaḥ ca asau mahiṣṭhaḥ ca iti atas tridhā

original: susādhyaḥ syāl laghur māno yatna-sādhyasya madhyamaḥ /
analyzed: su sādhyaḥ syāt laghuḥ mānaḥ yatna sādhyasya madhyamaḥ

original: duḥsādhyaḥ syād upāyena mahiṣṭhaḥ preyasāpy ayam // RUnm_15.143 //
analyzed: duḥsādhyaḥ syāt upāyena mahiṣṭhaḥ preyasā api ayam
kṛṣṇe roṣa uktayaḥ tāsām vāmaḥ durlīla śekharaḥ
govardhana taṭa araṇya bāṭa pāṭaccara ādayaḥ
iti mānaḥ
atha prema vaicittyam
priyasya sannikarṣe api prema unmāda bhramāt bhavet

original: yā viśleṣa-dhiyārtis tat prema-vaicittyam ucyate // RUnm_15.147 //
analyzed: yā viśleṣa dhiyā ārtiḥ tat prema vaicittyam ucyate
yathā
ābhīra indra sute sphurati api puras tīvra anurāga utthayā
viśleṣa jvara sampadā vivaśa dhīḥ atyantam udghūrṇitā

original: kāntaṃ me sakhi darśayeti daśanair udgūrṇa-śasyāṅkurā
analyzed: kāntam me sakhi darśaya iti daśanaiḥ udgūrṇa śasya aṅkurā

original: rādhā hanta tathā vyaceṣṭate yataḥ kṛṣṇo'py abhūd vismitaḥ // RUnm_15.148 //
analyzed: rādhā hanta tathā vyaceṣṭate yatas kṛṣṇaḥ api abhūt vismitaḥ
yathā vā vidagdhamādhave

original: samajani davād vitrastānāṃ kim ārta-ravo gavāṃ
analyzed: samajani davāt vitrastānām kim ārta ravaḥ gavām

original: mayi kim abhavad vaiguṇyaṃ vā niraṅkuśam īkṣitam /
analyzed: mayi kim abhavat vaiguṇyam vā niraṅkuśam īkṣitam

original: vyaraci nibhṛtaṃ kiṃ vāhūtiḥ kayācid abhīṣṭayā
analyzed: vyaraci nibhṛtam kim vā āhūtiḥ kayācid abhīṣṭayā

original: yad iha sahasā mām atyākṣīd vane vanajekṣaṇaḥ // RUnm_15.149 //
analyzed: yat iha sahasā mām atyākṣīt vane vanaja īkṣaṇaḥ

original: vilāsam anurāgas tu kutracit kam api vrajam /
analyzed: vilāsam anurāgaḥ tu kutracid kam api vrajam

original: pārśve santam api preṣṭhaṃ hāritaṃ kurute sphuṭam // RUnm_15.150 //
analyzed: pārśve santam api preṣṭham hāritam kurute sphuṭam
suṣṭhu udāharatā paṭṭa mahiṣī gīta vibhramam

original: spaṣṭaṃ muktā-phale caitad vopadevena varṇitam // RUnm_15.151 //
analyzed: spaṣṭam muktāphale ca etat vā upadevena varṇitam
iti prema vaicittyam
atha pravāsaḥ
pūrva saṅga tayoḥ yūnoḥ bhavet deśa antara ādibhiḥ

original: vyavadhānaṃ tu yat prājñaiḥ sa pravāsa itīryate // RUnm_15.152 //
analyzed: vyavadhānam tu yat prājñaiḥ sa pravāsaḥ iti īryate
tad janya vipralambhā uyam pravāsa tvena kathyate
harṣa garva mada vrīḍāḥ varjayitvā samīritāḥ
śṛṅgāra yogyāḥ sarve api pravāse vyabhicāriṇaḥ

original: sa dvidhā buddhi-pūrvaḥ syāt tathiavābuddhi-pūrvakaḥ // RUnm_15.154 //
analyzed: sa dvidhā buddhi pūrvaḥ syāt
atra buddhi pūrvaḥ
dūre kārya anurodhena gamaḥ syāt buddhi pūrvakaḥ
kāryam kṛṣṇasya kathitam sva bhakta prīṇana ādikam

original: kiñcid dūre sudūre ca gamanād apy ayaṃ dvidhā // RUnm_15.156 //
analyzed: kiñcid dūre su dūre ca gamanāt api ayam dvidhā
tatra ādyaḥ
dṛṣṭim nidhāya surabhī nikuramba vīthyām
kṛṣṇā iti varṇa yugala abhyasena rasajñām
śuśrūṣaṇe muralini svanitasya karṇau

original: cittaṃ mukhe tava nayaty ahar adya rādhā // RUnm_15.157 //
analyzed: cittam mukhe tava nayati ahar adya rādhā
atha dvitīyaḥ

original: bhāvī bhavaṃś ca bhūtaś ca tirvidhaḥ sa tu kīrtyate // RUnm_15.158 //
analyzed: bhāvī bhavan ca bhūtaḥ ca tirvidhaḥ sa tu kīrtyate
tatra bhāvī
yathā uddhava sandeśe

original: eṣa kṣattā vrajanarapateḥ ājñayā gokule asmin
analyzed: eṣa kṣattā vraja narapateḥ ājñayā gokule asmin
bāle prātar nagara gataye ghoṣaṇām ātanoti

original: duṣṭam bhūyaḥ sphurati ca balādīkṣaṇaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ me
analyzed: duṣṭam bhūyas sphurati ca balā dīkṣaṇam dakṣiṇam me

original: tena svāntaṃ sphuṭati caṭulam hanta bhāvyaṃ na jāne // RUnm_15.159 //
analyzed: tena svāntam sphuṭati caṭulam hanta bhāvyam na jāne
bhavan yathā lalitamādhave
bhānoḥ bimbe tvaritam udayaprasthataḥ prasthitā isau
yātrā ānandīm paṭhati muditaḥ syandane gāndineyaḥ

original: tāvat tūrṇaṃ sphuṭa khura-puṭaiḥ kṣauṇi-pṛṣṭaṃ khananto
analyzed: tāvat tūrṇam sphuṭa khura puṭaiḥ kṣauṇi pṛṣṭam khanantaḥ

original: yāvan nāmī hṛdaya bhavato ghoṭakāḥ sphoṭakā syuḥ // RUnm_15.160 //
analyzed: yāvat nāmī bhavataḥ ghoṭakāḥ sphoṭakā syuḥ
bhūtaḥ yathā uddhava sandeśe

original: kāmaṃ dūre sahacari varīvarti yat kaṃsavairī
analyzed: kāmam dūre sahacari varīvarti yat kaṃsa vairī

original: na idam lokottaramapi vipaddurdinaṃ me dunoti /
analyzed: na idam loka uttaram api vipad durdinam me dunoti

original: āśākīlo hṛdi kila vṛtaḥ prāṇarodhī tu yo me
analyzed: āśākīlaḥ hṛdi kila vṛtaḥ prāṇa rodhī tu yaḥ me
saḥ uyam pīḍām nibiḍa vaḍavā vahni tīvraḥ stanoti
atra śrī yadusiṃhena preyasīhiḥ amuṣya ca

original: preṣaṇaṃ kriyate premṇā sandeśasya parasparam // RUnm_15.162 //
analyzed: preṣaṇam kriyate premṇā sandeśasya parasparam
yathā uddhava sandeśe
soḍhavyam te katham api balāt cakṣuṣī mudrayitvā
tīvra uttāpam hata manasija uddāma vikrānta cakram

original: dvitraireva priyasakhi dinaiḥ sevyatāṃ devi śavye
analyzed: dvitraiḥ eva priya sakhi dinaiḥ sevyatām devi śavye
yāsyāmi tvad praṇaya caṭula bhrū yuga āḍambarāṇām
tathā padyāvalyām
kālindyāḥ pulinam pradoṣa marutaḥ ramyāḥ śaśaṅka aṃśavaḥ

original: santāpaṃ na harantu nāma nitarāṃ kurvanti kasmāt punaḥ /
analyzed: santāpam na harantu nāma nitarām kurvanti kasmāt punar
sandiṣṭam vraja yoṣitām iti hareḥ saṃśṛṇvataḥ ntaḥpure
niḥśvāsāḥ prasṛtāḥ jayanti ramaṇī saubhāgya garva chidaḥ
atha a buddhi pūrvaḥ
pāratntrya udbhavaḥ yaḥ tu proktaḥ saḥ buddhi pūrvakaḥ
divya a divya ādi janitam pāratantryam anekadhā
yathā lalitamādhave
ānītā asi mayā manoratha śata vyagreṇa nirbandhataḥ
pūrṇam śārada purṇimā parimalaiḥ vṛnda aṭavī maṇḍalam
sadyas sundari śaṅkhacūḍa kapaṭa prāpta udayena adhunā

original: daivenādya virodhinā katham itas tvaṃ hanta dūrīkṛtā // RUnm_15.166 //
analyzed: daivena adya virodhinā katham itas tvam hanta dūrīkṛtā
cintā atra jāgara udvegau tānavam malina aṅga tā

original: pralāpo vyādhir unmādo moho mṛtyur daśā daśa // RUnm_15.167 //
analyzed: pralāpaḥ vyādhiḥ unmādaḥ mohaḥ mṛtyuḥ daśā daśa
tatra cintā
yathā haṃsa dūte
yadā yātaḥ gopī hṛdaya madanaḥ nanda sadanān
mukundaḥ gāndinyāḥ tanayam anuvindan madhupurīm
tadā amānkṣīt cintā sariti ghana ghūrṇā paricayaiḥ
agādhāyām bādhā maya payasi rādhā virahiṇī
atha jāgaraḥ
yathā padyāvalyām

original: yāḥ paśyanti priyaṃ svapne dhanyāstāḥ sakhi yoṣitaḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ paśyanti priyam svapne dhanyāḥ tāḥ sakhi yoṣitaḥ

original: asmākaṃ tu gate kṛṣṇe gatā nidrāpi vairiṇī // RUnm_15.169 //
analyzed: asmākam tu gate kṛṣṇe gatā nidrā api vairiṇī
atha udvegaḥ
yathā haṃsa dūte

original: mano me hā kaṣṭaṃ jvalati kimahaṃ hanta karavai
analyzed: manaḥ me hā kaṣṭam jvalati kim aham hanta karavai

original: na pāraṃ nāvāraṃ kimapi kalayāmy asya jaladheḥ /
analyzed: na pāram na avāram kim api kalayāmi asya jaladheḥ

original: iyaṃ vande mūrdhnā sapadi tamupāyaṃ kathaya māṃ
analyzed: iyam vande mūrdhnā sapadi tam upāyam kathaya mām
parāmṛṣye yasmāt hṛti kaṇikayā āpe kṣaṇikayā
atha tānavam yathā
udañcat vaktra ambhoruha vikṛtiḥ antar kaluṣitā
sat āhāra abhāva glapita kuca kokāḥ yadupate
viśuṣyantī rādhā tava viraha tāpāt anudinam
nidāghe kulyā iva kraśima paripākam prathayati
atha malina aṅga tā
hima visara viśīrṇa ambhoja tulya ānana śrīḥ
khara marut aparajyat bandhujīva upama oṣṭhī
agha hara śarad arka uttāpita indīvara akṣī
tava viraha vipatti mlāpitā āsīt viśākhā
atha pralāpaḥ
yathā lalitamādhave
kva nanda kula candramāḥ kva śikhi candraka alaṅkṛtiḥ
kva mandra muralī ravaḥ kva nu sura indra nīla dyutiḥ
kva rāsa rasa tāṇḍavī kva sakhi jīva rakṣā oṣadhiḥ

original: nidhir mama suhṛttamaḥ kva bata hanta hā dhig-vidhim // RUnm_15.173 //
analyzed: nidhiḥ mama suhṛttamaḥ kva bata hanta hā dhik vidhim
atha vyādhiḥ
yathā tatra eva

original: uttāpī puṭa-pākato æpi garala-grāmād api kṣobhaṇo
analyzed: uttāpī garala grāmāt api kṣobhaṇaḥ

original: dambholer api duḥsahaḥ kaṭur alaṃ hṛn-magna-śūlyād api
analyzed: dambholeḥ api duḥsahaḥ kaṭuḥ alam hṛd magna śūlyāt api

original: tīvraḥ prauḍha-visūcikāni-cayato æpy uccair mamāyaṃ balī
analyzed: tīvraḥ pi uccais mama ayam balī

original: marmāṇy adya bhinatti gokula-pater viśleṣa-janmā jvaraḥ // RUnm_15.174 //
analyzed: marmāṇi adya bhinatti gokula pateḥ viśleṣa janmā jvaraḥ
atha unmādaḥ
bhramati bhavana garbhe nirnimittam hasantī
prathayati tava vārtām cetana acetaneṣu

original: lutḥati ca bhuvi rādhā kampitāṅgī murāre
analyzed: ca bhuvi rādhā kampita aṅgī murāre
viṣama viraha kheda udgāri vibhrānta cittā
yathā vā
adya akāṇḍikam aṭṭahāsa paṭalam nirmāti gharmāmbu bhāj
cītkāram kurute camatkṛti parā sa utkaṇṭham ākasmikam
ākrandam vitanoti gharghara ghana udghoṣam kila a tarkitam

original: rādhā mādhava-viprayoga-rabhasād anyeva tīvrād abhūt // RUnm_15.176 //
analyzed: rādhā mādhava viprayoga rabhasāt anyā iva tīvrāt abhūt
atha mohaḥ
nirundhe dainya abdhim harati guru cintā paribhavam
vilumpati unmādam sthagayati balāt bāṣpa laharīm
idānīm kaṃsāre kuvalaya dṛśaḥ kevalam idam
vidhatte sācivyam tava viraha mūrcchā sahacarī
atha mṛtyuḥ
yathā haṃsa dūte
aye rāsakrīḍā rasika mama sakhyām nava navā

original: purā baddhā yena praṇayalaharī hanta gahanā /
analyzed: purā baddhā yena praṇaya laharī hanta gahanā

original: sa cen muktāpekṣastvamapi dhig imāṃ tulaśakalaṃ
analyzed: sa ced mukta apekṣaḥ tvam api dhik imām tulaśa kalam
yat etasyāḥ nāsā nihitam idam adyā api calati

original: pravāsa-vipralambhe'smin daśās tās tā harer api /
analyzed: pravāsa vipralambhe ismin daśāḥ tāḥ tāḥ hareḥ api
atrā upalakṣaṇāya ekam udāharaṇam īryate
yathā
krīḍā ratna gṛhe viḍambita payaḥ phena āvalī mārdane
talpe na icchati rājñām sutāḥ
kintu dvāravatī patiḥ vraja giri droṇī vila antaḥśilā

original: paryaṅkopari rādhikā-rati-kalāṃ dhyāyan muhuḥ klāmyati // RUnm_15.180 //
analyzed: paryaṅka upari rādhikā rati kalām dhyāyan muhur klāmyati
proktānām prema bhedānām vividha tvāt daśāḥ api

original: vividhāḥ syur ihety etā bhūma-bhītyā na kīrtitāḥ // RUnm_15.181 //
analyzed: vividhāḥ syuḥ iha iti etāḥ bhūma bhītyā na kīrtitāḥ
etāḥ tu prema bhedānām anubhāva tayā daśāḥ

original: sādhāraṇyaḥ samastānāṃ prāyaśaḥ sambhavanty api // RUnm_15.182 //
analyzed: sādhāraṇyaḥ samastānām prāyaśas sambhavanti api
kintu atrā eva adhirūḍhasya mohana tvam apeyuṣaḥ
asādhāraṇa rūpāḥ tu tad prasaṅge purā uditāḥ
vipralambham param kecid karuṇā abhidham ucire

original: sa pravāsa-viśeṣatvān naivātra pṛthag īritaḥ // RUnm_15.184 //
analyzed: sa pravāsa viśeṣa tvāt na eva atra pṛthak īritaḥ
iti vipralambha bhedāḥ
atha saṃyoga viyoga sthitiḥ
hareḥ līlā viśeṣasya prakaṭasya anusārataḥ
varṇitā viraha avasthā goṣṭha vāma bhruvām asau
vṛndāraṇye viharatā sadā rāsa ādi vibhramaiḥ

original: hariṇā vraja-devīnāṃ viraho'sti na karhicit // RUnm_15.186 //
analyzed: hariṇā vraja devīnām virahaḥ usti na karhicit
tathā ca pādme pātālakhaṇḍe mathurāmāhātmye
go gopa gopikā saṅge yatra krīḍati kaṃsa hā
iti
iti saṃyoga viyoga sthitiḥ
atha sambhogaḥ
darśana āliṅgana ādīnām ānukūlyāt niṣevayā

original: yūnor ullāsam ārohan bhāvaḥ sambhoga ucyate // RUnm_15.188 //
analyzed: yūnoḥ ullāsam ārohan bhāvaḥ sambhogaḥ ucyate

original: manīṣibhir ayaṃ mukho gauṇaś ceti dvidhoditaḥ // RUnm_15.189 //
analyzed: manīṣibhiḥ ayam mukhaḥ gauṇaḥ ca iti dvidhā uditaḥ
tatra mukhyaḥ

original: mukhyo jāgrad-avasthāyāṃ sambhogaḥ sa caturvidhaḥ // RUnm_15.190 //
analyzed: mukhyaḥ jāgrat avasthāyām sambhogaḥ sa caturvidhaḥ
tān pūrva rāgataḥ mānāt pravāsa dvayataḥ kramāt
jātān saṃkṣipta saṅkīrṇa sampanna ṛddhimataḥ viduḥ
tatra saṅkṣiptaḥ
yuvānau yatra saṃkṣiptān sādhvasa vrīḍita ādibhiḥ

original: upacārān niṣevete sa saṃkṣipta itīritaḥ // RUnm_15.192 //
analyzed: upacārāt niṣevete sa saṃkṣiptaḥ iti īritaḥ
tatra nāyakena kṛtaḥ
yathā saptaśatyām
rakkhau vaḥ
hariṇaḥ paḍhama samāgama sajjha sa bebellio hattho
līlā abhitulita śailaḥ rakṣatu vaḥ rādhikā stana sparśe
hareḥ prathama samāgama sādhvasa vevellitaḥ hastaḥ
nāyikāyāḥ yathā
cumbe paṭa āvṛta mukhī nava saṅgama bhū
dāliṅgane kuṭilita aṅga latā tadā āsīt
avyakta vāc ajani keli kathāsu rādhā
modam tathā api vidadhe madhusūdanasya
atha saṅkīrṇaḥ
yatra saṅkīryamāṇāḥ syuḥ vyalīka smaraṇa ādibhiḥ

original: upacārāḥ sa saṅkīrṇaḥ kiñcit taptekṣu-peśalaḥ // RUnm_15.195 //
analyzed: upacārāḥ sa saṅkīrṇaḥ kiñcid tapta ikṣu peśalaḥ
yathā
sa asūyā jalpita sudhāni sa matsarāṇi
manaḥ parāma ramaṇīya dṛś iṅgitāni
kaṃsa dviṣaḥ sphurat amanda mukhāni anaṅga
vikrīḍitāni saha rādhikayā jayanti
yathā vā
vaktram kiñcid avāñcitam vivṛṇute na ati prasāda udayam
dṛṣṭiḥ bhugna taṭā vyanakti śanakais īrṣyā avaśeṣa chaṭām

original: rādhāyāḥ sakhi sūcayaty aviśadā vāg apy asūyākalāṃ
analyzed: rādhāyāḥ sakhi sūcayati a viśadā vāc api asūyā kalām

original: mānantaṃ bruvatī tathāpi madhurā kṛṣṇaṃ dhinoty ākṛtiḥ // RUnm_15.197 //
analyzed: mā anantam bruvatī tathā api madhurā kṛṣṇam dhinoti ākṛtiḥ
atha sampannaḥ

original: pravāsāt saṅgate kānte bhogaḥ sampanna īritaḥ /
analyzed: pravāsāt kānte bhogaḥ sampannaḥ īritaḥ

original: dvidhā syād āgatiḥ prādurbhāvaś ceti sa saṅgamaḥ // RUnm_15.198 //
analyzed: dvidhā syāt āgatiḥ prādurbhāvaḥ ca iti sa saṅgamaḥ
tatra āgatiḥ
laukika vyavahāreṇa syāt āgamanam āgatiḥ
yathā uddhava sandeśe
mā manda akṣam kuru guru janāt dehalīm geha madhyā
dehi klāntā divasam akhilam hanta viśleṣatā usi
eṣa smeraḥ milati mṛdule vallavī citta hārī
atha prādurbhāvaḥ
preṣṭhānām prema saṃrambha vihvalānām puras hariḥ

original: āvirbhavaty akasmād yat prādurbhāvaḥ sa ucyate // RUnm_15.201 //
analyzed: āvirbhavati akasmāt yat prādurbhāvaḥ saḥ ucyate
yathā śrī daśame
tāsām āvirabhūt śauriḥ smayamāna mukha ambujaḥ
yathā vā haṃsa dūte

original: ayi svapno dūre viramatu samakṣaṃ śṛṇu haṭhā-
analyzed: ayi svapnaḥ dūre viramatu samakṣam śṛṇu haṭhā
mā bhūḥ iha sakhi manaḥ vibhrama dhiyā
vayasyaḥ te govardhana vipinam āsādya kutukā
da kāṇḍe yat bhūyas smara kalaha pāṇḍityam atanot
rūḍha ākhya bhāva jātaḥ yam sambhogaḥ vaipralambhikaḥ
nirbhara ānanda purāṇām parama avadhiḥ iṣyate
dviguṇā viraha ārtiḥ syāt sphuraṇe veṇu rāga je
prādurbhāve bhavati atra sarva abhīṣṭa sukha utsavaḥ
atha samṛddhimān
durlabha ālokayoḥ yūnoḥ pāratantryāt viyuktayoḥ

original: upabhogātireko yaḥ kīrtyate sa samṛddhimān // RUnm_15.206 //
analyzed: upabhoga atirekaḥ yaḥ kīrtyate sa samṛddhimān
yathā lalitamādhave

original: dagdhaṃ hanta dadhānayā vapur idaṃ yasyāvalokāśayā
analyzed: dagdham hanta dadhānayā vapuḥ idam yasya avaloka āśayā

original: soḍhā marma-vipāṭane paṭur iyaṃ pīḍātivṛṣṭir mayā /
analyzed: soḍhā marma vipāṭane paṭuḥ iyam pīḍā ati vṛṣṭiḥ mayā

original: so'yaṃ jīvita-bandhur indu-vadane bhūyaḥ samāliṅgitaḥ // RUnm_15.207 //
analyzed: saḥ ayam jīvita bandhuḥ indu vadane bhūyas samāliṅgitaḥ
yathā vā

original: tavātra parimṛgyatā kim api lakṣma sākṣād iyaṃ
analyzed: tava atra parimṛgyatā kim api lakṣma sākṣāt iyam
mayā tvam upasāditā nikhila loka lakṣmīḥ asi
yathā jagati cañcatā caṇaka muṣṭi sampattaye

original: janena patitā puraḥ kanaka-vṛṣṭir āsādyate // RUnm_15.208 //
analyzed: janena patitā puras kanaka vṛṣṭiḥ āsādyate
iti madhura rasa paripāka vivekaḥ
atha gauṇa sambhogaḥ
channa prakāśa bhedena kaiścid eṣām dvi rūpa tā

original: iṣṭāpy atra na hi proktā nātyullāsakarī yataḥ // RUnm_15.209 //
analyzed: iṣṭā api atra na hi proktā na ati ullāsa karī yatas
atha gauṇaḥ
svapne prāpti viśeṣaḥ usya hareḥ gauṇaḥ iti īryate
svapnaḥ dvidhā atra sāmānya viśeṣa tvena kīrtitaḥ

original: sāmānyaḥ sa tu yaḥ pūrvaṃ kathito vyabhicāriṣu /
analyzed: sāmānyaḥ sa tu yaḥ pūrvam kathitaḥ vyabhicāriṣu

original: viśeṣaḥ khalu jāgaryā nirviśeṣao mahādbhutaḥ // RUnm_15.211 //
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ khalu jāgaryāḥ nirviśeṣaḥ mahā adbhutaḥ

original: bhāvautkaṇṭhye-mayo hy eṣa caturdhā pūrvavan mataḥ // RUnm_15.212 //
analyzed: bhāva autkaṇṭhya īmayaḥ hi eṣa caturdhā pūrvavat mataḥ
tatra svapne saṅkṣiptaḥ yathā
vihāram kurvāṇaḥ taraṇi tanayā tīra vipine
vidagdhānām cūḍāmaṇiḥ anudinam cumbati mukham

original: mama svapne ko'pi priya-sakhi balīyān nava-yuvā // RUnm_15.213 //
analyzed: mama svapne kaḥ api priya sakhi balīyān nava yuvā
atha svapne saṅkīrṇaḥ yathā

original: sakhi kruddhā mā bhūr laghur api na doṣaḥ sumukhi me
analyzed: sakhi kruddhā mā bhūḥ laghuḥ api na doṣaḥ su mukhi me

original: na mānāgni-jvālām aśamayam ahaṃ tām asamaye /
analyzed: na māna agni jvālām aśamayam aham tām asamaye

original: sa dhūrtas te svapne rasa-vṛṣṭiṃ mayi tathā
analyzed: sa dhūrtaḥ te svapne rasa vṛṣṭim mayi tathā

original: yato vistīrṇāpi svayam iyam ayāsīd upaśamam // RUnm_15.214 //
analyzed: yatas vistīrṇā api svayam iyam ayāsīt upaśamam
atha svapne sampannaḥ
yathā haṃsa dūte
prayātaḥ mām hitvā yadi kaṭhina cūḍāmaṇiḥ asau

original: paryātu svacchandaṃ mama samayadharmaḥ kila gatiḥ /
analyzed: paryātu svacchandam mama samaya dharmaḥ kila gatiḥ

original: idaṃ soḍhuṃ kā vā prabhavati yataḥ svapnakapaṭā-
analyzed: idam soḍhum kā vā prabhavati yatas svapna kapaṭā

original: dihāyāto vṛndāvanabhuvi kalān māṃ ramayati // RUnm_15.215 //
analyzed: dihā āyātaḥ vṛndāvana bhuvi kalān mām ramayati
atha svāpna samṛddhimān
yathā lalitamādhave

original: cirād adya svapne mama vividha-yatnād upagate
analyzed: cirāt adya svapne mama vividha yatnāt upagate
prapede govindaḥ sakhi nayanayoḥ akṣaṇa bhuvam

original: gṛhītvā hā hanta tvaritam atha tasminn api rathaṃ
analyzed: gṛhītvā hā hanta tvaritam atha tasmin api ratham

original: kathaṃ pratyāsannaḥ sa khalu puruṣo rāja-puruṣaḥ // RUnm_15.216 //
analyzed: katham pratyāsannaḥ sa khalu puruṣaḥ rāja puruṣaḥ

original: tulya-svarūpa evāyaṃ prodyan yūnor dvayor api /
analyzed: tulya svarūpaḥ eva ayam prodyan yūnoḥ dvayoḥ api

original: ūṣā-niruddhayor yadvat kvacit svapno'py abādhitaḥ // RUnm_15.217 //
analyzed: ūṣā niruddhayoḥ yadvat kvacid svapnaḥ api abādhitaḥ
atas eva hi siddhānām svapne pi parama adbhute

original: prāptāni maṇḍanādīni dṛśyante jāgare'pi ca // RUnm_15.218 //
analyzed: prāptāni maṇḍana ādīni dṛśyante ca
vyatītya turyām api saṃśritānām
tām pañcamīm prema mayīm avasthām
na sambhavati eva hari priyāṇām
svapnaḥ rajaḥ vṛtti vijṛmbhitaḥ yaḥ

original: ity eṣa hari-bhāvasya vilāsaḥ ko'pi peśala /
analyzed: iti eṣa hari bhāvasya vilāsaḥ kaḥ pi peśala

original: citra-svapnam ivātanvan kṛṣṇaḥ saṅgamayaty alam // RUnm_15.220 //
analyzed: citra svapnam iva ātanvan kṛṣṇaḥ saṅgamayati alam
atha eteṣu nirūpyante tad viśeṣāḥ su peśalāḥ

original: ye'nubhāva-daśām asyāḥ prāpnuvanti rateḥ sphuṭam // RUnm_15.221 //
analyzed: yenubhāva daśām asyāḥ prāpnuvanti rateḥ sphuṭam

original: te tu sandarśanaṃ jalpaḥ sparśanaṃ vartma-rodhanam /
analyzed: te tu sandarśanam jalpaḥ sparśanam vartma rodhanam
naukhelā līlayā cauryam ghaṭṭaḥ kuñja ādi līna tā
madhu pānam vadhū veśa dhṛtiḥ kapaṭa supta tā
dyūta krīḍā paṭa ākṛṣṭiḥ cumba āśleṣau nakha arpaṇam
bimba adhara sudhā pānaḥ samprayoga ādayaḥ matāḥ
tatra sandarśanam
yathā lalitamādhave
cala akṣi guru lokataḥ sphurati tāvat antar bhayam

original: kula-sthitir alaṃ tu me manasi tāvad unmīlati /
analyzed: kula sthitiḥ alam tu me manasi tāvat unmīlati
calat makara kuṇḍala sphurita phulla gaṇḍa sthalam

original: na yāvad aparokṣatām idam apaiti vaktrāmbujam // RUnm_15.225 //
analyzed: na yāvat a parokṣa tām idam apaiti vaktra ambujam
atha jalpaḥ

original: jalpaḥ parasparaṃ goṣṭhī vitathoktiś ca kathyate // RUnm_15.226 //
analyzed: jalpaḥ parasparam goṣṭhī vitatha uktiḥ ca kathyate
atra parasparaḥ goṣṭhī
yathā dāna kelikaumudyām
dharṣaṇe nakula strīṇām bhujaṅga īśaḥ kṣamaḥ katham

original: yad etā daśanair eṣa daśan nāpnoti maṅgalam // RUnm_15.227 //
analyzed: yat etāḥ daśanaiḥ eṣa daśat na āpnoti maṅgalam
aprauḍha dvija rāja rāja dalikā labdhā vibhūtim rucām
navyām ātmani kṛṣṇavartma vilasat dṛṣṭiḥ viśākha añcitā
kandarpasya vidagdha tām vidadhati netra añcalasya tviṣā

original: tvaṃ rādhe śiva-mūrtir ity urasi māṃ bhogīndram aṅgīkuru // RUnm_15.228 //
analyzed: tvam rādhe śiva mūrtiḥ iti urasi mām bhogi indram aṅgīkuru
vitathā uktiḥ
yathā tatra eva

original: asminn adrau kati na hi mayā hanta hārādi-vittaṃ
analyzed: asmin adrau kati na hi mayā hanta hāra ādi vittam
hāram hāram hariṇa nayanā grāhitā jaina dīkṣām
yāḥ kāku ukti sthagita vadanāḥ patra dānena dīnāḥ
tūrṇam dūrāt anujagṛhire prauḍha vallī sakhībhiḥ
atha sparśanam yathā

original: na kuru śapatham asya sparśato dūṣitoccair
analyzed: na kuru śapatham asya sparśataḥ dūṣita uccais
asi bhuja bhujagena tvam bhujaṅga adhipasya
tanuḥ anupama kampā svedam abhyudgirantī

original: kapaṭini paritas te paśya romāñcitāsti // RUnm_15.230 //
analyzed: kapaṭini paritas te paśya romāñcitā asti
atha vartma rodhanam
yathā vidagdhamādhave
parītam śṛṅgeṇa sphuṭatara śilā śyāmala rucam
valat vetram vaṃśa vyatikara lasat mekhalam amum
atikramya uttuṅgam dharaṇidharam agre katham itas

original: tvayā gantuṃ śakyā taraṇi-duhitus tīra-saraṇī // RUnm_15.231 //
analyzed: tvayā gantum śakyā taraṇi duhituḥ tīra saraṇī
atha rāsaḥ yathā
hariḥ nava ghana ākṛtiḥ prativadhū dvayam madhyatas
tad aṃsa vilasat bhujaḥ bhramati citram ekaḥ upī asau

original: vadhūś ca taḍid-ujjvalā prati-harid vayaṃ madhyataḥ
analyzed: vadhūḥ ca taḍit ujjvalā vayam madhyatas
sakhī dhṛta kara ambujā naṭati paśya rāsa utsave
atha vṛndāvana krīḍā
sthala kamala malīnām stauti gītaiḥ padam te
rada tati mati namrā vandate kundarājī
adharam anubhajantī lambate bimba mālā

original: vilasati tava vaśyā paśya vṛndāṭavīyam // RUnm_15.233 //
analyzed: vilasati tava vaśyā paśya vṛndāṭavī iyam
yamunā jala keliḥ yathā
vyātyukṣīyudhi rādhayā ghana rasaiḥ paryukṣyamāṇasya te

original: mālyaṃ bhaṅgam avāpa vīra tilako yātaḥ kilādṛśyatām /
analyzed: mālyam bhaṅgam avāpa vīra tilakaḥ yātaḥ kila adṛśya tām

original: vaktrendau pratimā-cchalena śaraṇaṃ labdhaḥ sakhīṃ kaustubhas
analyzed: vaktra indau pratimā chalena śaraṇam labdhaḥ sakhīm kaustubhaḥ

original: tan mā bhūś cakito vimukta-cikuraṃ nārdaty asau tvad-vidham // RUnm_15.234 //
analyzed: tat mā bhūḥ cakitaḥ vimukta cikuram nā ardati asau tvadvidham
yathā vā padyāvalyām
jala keli tarala kara tala
mukta punar pihita rādhikā vadanaḥ
jagat avatu koka yūnoḥ
vighaṭana saṅghaṭana kautukī kṛṣṇaḥ
atha naukhelā
yathā padyāvalyām
muktā taraṅga nivahena pataṅga putrī

original: navyā ca naur iti vacas tava tathyam eva /
analyzed: navyā ca nauḥ iti vacaḥ tava tathyam eva
śaṅkā nidānam idam eva mama atimātram

original: tvaṃ cañcalo yad iha mādhava nāviko'si // RUnm_15.236 //
analyzed: tvam cañcalaḥ yat iha mādhava nāvikaḥ asi
atha līlā cauryam
atha vaṃśī cauryam
yathā padyāvalyām

original: nīcair nyāsād atha caraṇayor nūpura mūkayantī
analyzed: nīcais nyāsāt atha caraṇayoḥ nūpura mūkayantī
dhṛtvā dhṛtvā kataka valayāni utkṣipantī bhuja ante
mudrām akṣṇoḥ cakitam śaśvat ālokayantī

original: smitvā smitvā harati muralīm aṅkato mādhavasya // RUnm_15.238 //
analyzed: smitvā smitvā harati muralīm aṅkataḥ mādhavasya
atha vastra cauryam yathā

original: chadāvali-vṛtaiva naḥ sapadi kācid ekā vrajaṃ
analyzed: chada āvali vṛtā eva naḥ sapadi kācid ekā vrajam
praviśya jaratīḥ iha ānayatu ghora karma uddhatāḥ

original: ayaṃ guṇa-nidhis taror upari tābhir abhyarcyatām
analyzed: ayam guṇa nidhiḥ taroḥ upari tābhiḥ abhyarcyatām
atha puṣpacauryam yathā

original: ayi jñātaṃ jñātaṃ harasi hariṇākṣi pratidinaṃ
analyzed: ayi jñātam jñātam harasi hariṇa akṣi pratidinam

original: tvam eva pracchannā mama sumanasāṃ mañjarim itaḥ /
analyzed: tvam eva pracchannā mama sumanasām mañjarim itas

original: cirād diṣṭyā cauri tvam iha vidhṛtādya svayam ato
analyzed: cirāt diṣṭyā cauri tvam iha vidhṛtā adya svayam ato

original: guhākārām ārāt praviśa vasatiṃ prauḍhibhir alam // RUnm_15.240 //
analyzed: guhākārām ārāt praviśa vasatim prauḍhibhiḥ alam
atha ghaṭṭaḥ
yathā dāna kelikaumudyām
ghaṭṭa adhirājam avamatya vivādam eva
yūyam yat ācaratha śulkam adityamānāḥ

original: manye vidhitsatha tad atra gires taṭeṣu
analyzed: manye vidhitsatha tat atra gireḥ taṭeṣu
durgeṣu hanta viṣameṣu raṇa abhiyogam
atha kuñja ādi līna tā
yathā vidagdhamādhave
śaṅke saṅkulita antara ādya nibiḍa krīḍā anubandha icchayā

original: kuñje vañjula-śākhinaḥ śaśimukhī līnā varīvarti sā /
analyzed: kuñje vañjula śākhinaḥ śaśi mukhī līnā varīvarti sā

original: no ced eṣa tad-aṅghri-saṅgama-vinābhāvād akāle kathaṃ
analyzed: no ced eṣa tad aṅghri saṅgama vinābhāvāt akāle katham
atha madhu pānam yathā
mukha vidhum uditam madhudviṣā usau
madhu caṣake madhuram samīkṣya mugdhā
adiśata dṛśam eva tatra pātum

original: na tu vadanaṃ muhur arthitāpi tena // RUnm_15.243 //
analyzed: na tu vadanam muhur arthi tā api tena
atha vadhū veśa dhṛtiḥ
yathā uddhava sandeśe

original: keyaṃ śyāmā sphurati sarale gopakanyā kimarthaṃ
analyzed: kā iyam śyāmā sphurati sarale gopa kanyā kimartham

original: prāptā sakhyaṃ tava mṛgayate nirmitāsau vayasyā /
analyzed: prāptā sakhyam tava mṛgayate nirmitā asau vayasyā

original: āliṅgāmūṃ muhuriti tathā kurvatī māṃ viditvā
analyzed: āliṅga amūm muhur iti tathā kurvatī mām viditvā

original: nārīveśam hriyamupayayau māninī yatra rādhā // RUnm_15.244 //
analyzed: nārī veśam hriyam upayayau māninī yatra rādhā
kapaṭa supta tā
yathā karṇāmṛte
stoka stoka nirudhyamāna mṛdula prasyandi manda smitam
prema udbheda nirargala prasṛmara pravyakta roma udgamam
śrotum śrotra manoharam vraja vadhū līlā mithas jalpitam
mithyā svāpam upāsmahe bhagavataḥ krīḍā nimīlat dṛśaḥ
atha dyūta krīḍā

original: jitvā dyūta-paṇaṃ daśaty aghahare gaṇḍaṃ mudā dakṣiṇaṃ
analyzed: jitvā dyūta paṇam daśati agha hare gaṇḍam mudā dakṣiṇam

original: sā vāmaṃ ca daśeti tatra rabhasād akṣaṃ kṣipanty abhyadhāt /
analyzed: sā vāmam ca daśa iti tatra rabhasāt akṣam kṣipantī abhyadhāt

original: ājñāṃ sundari te yatheti hariṇā vāme ca daṣṭe tataḥ
analyzed: ājñām sundari te yathā iti hariṇā vāme ca daṣṭe tatas

original: saṃrambhād iva sā bhujā-latikayā kaṇṭhe babandha priyam // RUnm_15.246 //
analyzed: saṃrambhāt iva sā bhujā latikayā kaṇṭhe babandha priyam
atha paṭṭākṛṣṭiḥ
yathā lalitamādhave
dhanyaḥ saḥ ayam maṇiḥ avirala dhvānta puñje nikuñje

original: smitvā smitvā mayi kuca-paṭīṃ kṛṣṭavaty unmadena /
analyzed: smitvā smitvā mayi kuca paṭīm kṛṣṭavati unmadena
gāḍham gūḍha ākṛtiḥ api tayā mad mukha akuta vedī

original: niṣṭhīvan yaḥ kiraṇa-laharīṃ hrepayāmāsa rādhām // RUnm_15.247 //
analyzed: niṣṭhīvan yaḥ kiraṇa laharīm hrepayāmāsa rādhām
atha cumbaḥ yathā
kapaṭa caṭulita bhruvaḥ samantā
rabhasāt vidhūyamānam
danuja ripuḥ acumbat ambuja akṣyāḥ
kamalam iva anila kampi cañcarīkaḥ
atha āśleṣaḥ yathā
nava jāguḍa varṇayā upagūḍhaḥ
sphurat abhra dyutiḥ etayā unmadena
harati sma hariḥ hiraṇya vallī
parivīta aṅga tamāla maṅgalāni
atha nakhakṣatam yathā

original: na kucāv imau gatijitā tayā hṛtaṃ
analyzed: na kucau imau gati jitā tayā hṛtam
gajataḥ prasahya sakhi kumbhayoḥ yugam
kṣatam atra nāgadamano yat arpaya
tparam aṅgaja aṅkuśa vareṇa tad kṣaṇam
atha bimba adhara sudhā pānam yathā
na hi sudhākara bimba sudhākaram
kuru mukham karabha ūru kara āvṛtam
adhara raṅgaṇam aṅga vara aṅgane
pibatu nīpa vanī bhramaraḥ tava
atha samprayogaḥ yathā
drāk dos maṇḍala pīḍana uddhura dhiyaḥ proddāma vaijātyayā
nirbandhāt adhara amṛtāni pibataḥ sītkāra pūrṇa āsyayā
kandarpa utsava paṇḍitasya maṇi atiḥ ākrānta kuñja antayā

original: sārdhaṃ rādhikayā harer nidhuvana-krīḍā-vidhir vardhate // RUnm_15.252 //
analyzed: sārdham rādhikayā hareḥ nidhuvana krīḍā vidhiḥ vardhate
vidagdhānām mithas līlā vilāsena yathā sukham

original: na tathā samprayogeṇa syād evaṃ rasikā viduḥ // RUnm_15.253 //
analyzed: na tathā samprayogeṇa syāt evam rasikāḥ viduḥ
yathā
balena parirambhaṇe nakha śikhābhiḥ ullekhanam
haṭhāt adhara khaṇḍane bhuja yugena bandha kriyām
dukūla dalane hatiḥ kuvalayena kurvāṇayā

original: ratād api sukhaṃ harer adhikam ādadhe rādhayā // RUnm_15.254 //
analyzed: ratāt api sukham hareḥ adhikam ādadhe rādhayā
yathā vā
saṃvyānasya caṭula tām karṇa utpalena āhatiḥ
krīḍeyam vraja nāgarī rati guroḥ gāndharvikāyāḥ tathā

original: bhūyiṣṭhaṃ suratotsavād api navāsvādaṃ vitene sukham // RUnm_15.255 //
analyzed: bhūyiṣṭham surata utsavāt api nava āsvādam vitene sukham
ataeva śrī gītagovinde
pratyūha pulaka aṅkureṇa nibiḍa leśa nimeṣeṇa ca
krīḍā ākūta vilokita idhara sudhā pāne kathā kelibhiḥ
ānanda adhigamena manmatha kalā yuddhe pi yasmin abhut

original: udbhūtaḥ sa tayor babhūva suratārambhaḥ priyambhāvukaḥ // RUnm_15.256 //
analyzed: udbhūtaḥ sa tayoḥ babhūva surata ārambhaḥ priyambhāvukaḥ
yathā
prāṇeśa sundara uttaṃsa nāgarāṇām śikhāmaṇeḥ
vṛndāvana vidho goṣṭha yuvarāja manohara

original: ity ādyā vraja-devīnāṃ preyasī praṇayoktayaḥ // RUnm_15.258 //
analyzed: iti ādyāḥ vraja devīnām preyasī praṇaya uktayaḥ
atula tvāt apāra tvāt āptā usau durvigāhatām

original: spṛṣṭaḥ paraṃ taṭasthena rasābdhir madhuro mayā //o//
analyzed: spṛṣṭaḥ param taṭa sthena rasa abdhiḥ madhuraḥ mayā
ayam ujjvala nīla maṇiḥ gahana mahā ghoṣa sāgara prabhavaḥ
bhajatu tava makara kuṇḍala parisara sevā ocitīm devaḥ o
iti sambhoga bhedāḥ
iti śrī śrī ujjvala nīlamaṇau śṛṅgārabheda prakaraṇam
sampūrṇaḥ yam śrī śrī larūpa gosvāmi
